T02D1412:353b-0: @353b # // dpal bde mchog gi rgya cher bshad pa tshig don rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba /
T02D1412:353b-1: dpal bde mchog mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1412:353b-2: kun 'gro kun snying nam mkha'i dbus gyur mchog zhi ba //
T02D1412:353b-3: he ru ka dpal mchog tu mya ngan 'das pa de nyid dngos //
T02D1412:353b-4: thabs dang shes rab las byung rab gsal nye bar 'bar ba'i 'od //
T02D1412:353b-5: nyi gzhon phun tshogs bde mchog zhabs btud de nyid bshad par bya //
T02D1412:353b-6: 'grel pa dag gis rgyud rgyal ni //
T02D1412:353b-7: ma lus rnam par ma bkrol zhes //
T02D1412:353b-8: rtsa ba'i rgyud las bdag gis ni //
T02D1412:353b-9: gtam du dris pa bzhin du thos //
T02D1412:353b-10: bdag ni shin tu blo dman yang //
T02D1412:353b-11: bla mas byin gyis brlabs pa dang //
T02D1412:353b-12: bshad rgyud yang dag rtogs pa yis //
T02D1412:353b-13: de don rtsom phyir nyes pa med //
T02D1412:353b-14: rgyud kyi brjod par bya ba ni gang /
T02D1412:353b-15: dgos pa'i dgos pa ni gang zhig / de nas
T02D1412:353b-16: zhes bya ba nas bka' stsal to zhes bya ba'i
T02D1412:353b-17: bar gyis rjod par byed pa'i rgyud yin la /
T02D1412:353b-18: de nas brjod par bya ba ni rgyu'i rgyud dang thabs kyi rgyud dang /
T02D1412:353b-20: de la rgyu'i rgyud ni le'u nyi shu rtsa drug
T02D1412:353b-21: pa las ston pa'i gang zag rnam pa gsum mo
T02D1412:353b-22: // thabs kyi rgyud ni bskyed rdzogs gnyis so //
T02D1412:353b-23: 'bras bu'i rgyud ni sku gsum mo //
T02D1412:353b-24: de la gtso bor thabs kyi rgyud gsungs pa nas de brjod par bya ste /
T02D1412:353b-25: de la le'u dang po'i tshigs bcad gcig gis rgyud kyi dgos pa bstan to //
T02D1412:353b-26: tshig bcad phyed kyis mtshan bstan to //
T02D1412:353b-27: tshigs bcad phyed dang gnyis kyis ni rgyud kyi gleng gzhi bstan to //
T02D1412:353b-28: tshigs bcad gnyis kyis ni lus rnam gzhag bstan /
T02D1412:353b-29: le'u dang po'i lhag mas ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo
T02D1412:353b-30: dang zhi ba'i btung ba dang pho nya'i gtsang sbra
T02D1412:353b-31: gnas dang bcas pa mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1412:353b-32: le'u gnyis pas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bstan to //
T02D1412:353b-33: le'u gsum pas slob ma dbang bskur ba bstan to //
T02D1412:353b-34: le'u bzhi pas lha dgod pa bstan to //
T02D1412:353b-35: de ltar le'u gsum pa dang bzhi pas bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa gsungs so //
T02D1412:353b-36: le'u lnga pas rkang pa brgyad pa'i gsal byed btu ba bstan to //
T02D1412:353b-37: le'u drug pas dpa' bo drug gi sngags btu ba bstan to //
T02D1412:353b-38: le'u bdun pas rkang pa brgyad pa'i dbyangs yig btu ba bstan //
T02D1412:353b-39: le'u brgyad pas snying po bzhi dang go cha'i lha mo drug gi sngags btu ba bstan /
T02D1412:354a-1: dgu pas rtsa ba'i sngags kyi phrin las lnga bcu bstan //
T02D1412:354a-2: le'u bcu pas snying po sngags kyi mchog dang 'jig rten pa'i sngags grub pa bstan //
T02D1412:354a-3: le'u bcu gcig pas dngos grub kyi bzas kyi kha zas skye ba bdun pa bstan //
T02D1412:354a-4: le'u bcu gnyis pa nye ba'i snying po'i phrin las bstan //
T02D1412:354a-5: le'u bcu gsum pas go cha'i sngags kyi phrin las bstan //
T02D1412:354a-6: de ltar le'u lnga pa nas bcu gsum pa'i bar gyis bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bzlas pa bstan to //
T02D1412:354a-7: le'u bzhi pas dngos grub kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs kyi 'khor lo bstan //
T02D1412:354a-8: le'u bco lnga pa nas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar gyis tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i yan lag bstan to //
T02D1412:354a-9: le'u bco lnga pas dag byed kyi lha mo'i yi ge'i brda bstan /
T02D1412:354a-10: bcu drug pas dag byed kyi lha mo'i brda'i mtshan nyid bstan /
T02D1412:354a-11: bcu bdun pas dbang gi lha mo'i mtshan nyid bstan /
T02D1412:354a-12: bco brgyad pas dpa' bo'i lha mo'i mtshan nyid bstan /
T02D1412:354a-13: bcu dgu pas bka' bsgo ba'i mtshan nyid bstan /
T02D1412:354a-14: nyi shu pas dbang gi lha mo'i brda bstan /
T02D1412:354a-15: nyi shu rtsa gcig pas dpa' bo'i lha mo'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1412:354a-16: rtsa gnyis pa las bkas gnang ba'i lha mo'i brda dang /
T02D1412:354a-17: rtsa gsum pa las kun spyod ma'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1412:354a-18: rtsa bzhi pa las de'i brda dang /
T02D1412:354a-19: rtsa lnga pa las lha mo lnga'i lus la dpa' bo dang dpa' mo dgod pa'i sngags so //
T02D1412:354a-20: le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa nas rtsa dgu'i bar
T02D1412:354a-21: gyis le'u dang po'i rdzogs rim rgyas par bshad pa
T02D1412:354a-22: las / rtsa drug pas rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu gsum bstan /
T02D1412:354a-23: rtsa bdun pas sbyor ba dang dngos gzhi dang rjes gsum bstan /
T02D1412:354a-24: rtsa brgyad pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i gzhan don bstan //
T02D1412:354a-25: rtsa dgu pas dbang bzhi pa bstan //
T02D1412:354a-26: le'u sum cu pas bskyed pa'i rim pa srung ba'i 'khor lo bstan to //
T02D1412:354a-27: sum cu rtsa gcig nas bzhi bcu pa'i bar gyis
T02D1412:354a-28: dngos grub len pa'i rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i
T02D1412:354a-29: 'khor lo bstan // bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa nas
T02D1412:354a-30: lnga bcu'i bar gyis dngos grub len pa'i gsang sngags
T02D1412:354a-32: le'u gcig pas bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'i thabs bstan pa'o //
T02D1412:354a-33: de ltar na le'u lnga ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin la //
T02D1412:354a-34: le'u bcu gsum ni bskyed pa'i rim pa yin //
T02D1412:354a-35: le'u bcu gnyis ni gnyis ka'i yan lag tshogs kyi 'khor lo yin la //
T02D1412:354b-0: mtshan ma thob nas dngos @354b grub len pa ni le'u nyi shu yin la //
T02D1412:354b-1: thabs kyi kha skong ba ni le'u nga gcig pa yin no //
T02D1412:354b-2: de ltar na thabs 'bras bu bcas pa ni brjod par bya ba yin la //
T02D1412:354b-3: thos bsam sgom gyis de khong du chud pa nyi dgos pa yin la //
T02D1412:354b-4: tshan ma thob nas dngos grub gsum bskyed pa ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa yin no //
T02D1412:354b-5: 'brel ba ni de'i bdag nyid dang thabs dang thabs las byung ba'o //
T02D1412:354b-6: de'i bsdus pa'i don ni thabs dang bskyar ba'i cho ga dang dngos grub len pa'i kha bskang ba'o //
T02D1412:354b-7: bskyed rdzogs gnyis ni thabs yin la /
T02D1412:354b-8: tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni bskyar ba'i cho ga yin la /
T02D1412:354b-9: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i 'khor lo ni 'bras bu dngos grub len pa yin la /
T02D1412:354b-10: le'u nga gcig pa ni kha bskang ba'i man ngag go //
T02D1412:354b-11: da ni yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste /
T02D1412:354b-12: rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u 'bum pa dang /
T02D1412:354b-13: rgyud phyi ma shlo ka 'bum pa rdzogs pa'i rjes
T02D1412:354b-14: la le'u nga gcig pa ston par bzhed nas da
T02D1412:354b-15: nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin
T02D1412:354b-16: no // de yang dpa' bo dang dpa' mo brjod
T02D1412:354b-17: kyi mi lang ba bas phyag 'tshal nas bdud rtsi
T02D1412:354b-18: rnam pa lngas mchod de bstod nas gsol ba btab
T02D1412:354b-20: de nas zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1412:354b-21: de yang thob mar rgyud kyi brjod bya ston par bzhed nas //
T02D1412:354b-22: gsang ba bshad bya ba zhes gsungs te //
T02D1412:354b-23: gsang ba'i don ni gnyis te //
T02D1412:354b-26: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i gsang ba ni gnyis te /
T02D1412:354b-27: dpa' bo gcig pu bsgom pa dang /
T02D1412:354b-29: de ci'i phyir gsang ba yin zhe na //
T02D1412:354b-30: dpal mchog dang po las ye shes sems dpa' snying gar bcug pas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1412:354b-31: rgyud rdo rje rtse mo las kyang /
T02D1412:354b-32: gsang chen theg pa 'di ru ni //
T02D1412:354b-33: zhugs pa gang dang gang yin pa //
T02D1412:354b-36: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni phyag rgya bzhi dang thabs bzhi dang ldan pas gsang ba'o //
T02D1412:354b-37: ci'i phyir gsang pa yin zhe na //
T02D1412:354b-38: tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po
T02D1412:354b-39: dang nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba rnams kyis ma
T02D1412:354b-40: goms par bde ba stong pa nyid ma rtogs pa'i
T02D1412:354b-41: phyir ro // de yang 'di nyid las /
T02D1412:354b-42: lha dang mi yi bde ba ni //
T02D1412:354b-43: bsdus byas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi //
T02D1412:354b-44: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
T02D1412:355a-2: kha sbyor las kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D1412:355a-3: dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul yin pas na gsang
T02D1412:355a-5: bshad bya zhes bya ba ni sgra'i dgos pa bstan pa ste /
T02D1412:355a-6: sngon dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams kyis khong du chud pa yin yang /
T02D1412:355a-7: da ltar rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rtogs pa'o //
T02D1412:355a-8: de'i rjod par byed pa ji ltar yin zhe na //
T02D1412:355a-9: mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min //
T02D1412:355a-10: zhes bya ba gsungs te rgyud le'u 'bum pa las 'dir mdor bsdus pa dang /
T02D1412:355a-11: shlo ka 'bum pa las mdor bsdus pas na rgyas
T02D1412:355a-12: par min pa ste ltos sa gnyis nas phyi ma'i
T02D1412:355a-13: phyi ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1412:355a-14: brjod par bya ba de nyid gsal bar bstan pa ni //
T02D1412:355a-15: he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor //
T02D1412:355a-17: mtshan nyid pa sku gsum gyi rang bzhin yin yang
T02D1412:355a-18: de'i rgyu ba bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi thabs la dpal
T02D1412:355a-19: he ka zhes bya ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D1412:355a-20: sems dpa' brdar btags pa yin no //
T02D1412:355a-21: yang dag sbyor zhes bya ba ni shes rab ston to //
T02D1412:355a-22: dngos kyi yum sa bcu gnyis pa'i stong pa nyid shes rab yin la //
T02D1412:355a-23: de'i rgyud bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi shes rab la btsun mo zhes brdar btags pa yin no //
T02D1412:355a-25: shes rab ni du zhes na //
T02D1412:355a-26: bskyed pa'i rim pa dpa' bo gcig pu dang /
T02D1412:355a-27: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i thabs dang shes rab dang /
T02D1412:355a-28: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1412:355a-30: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1412:355a-31: phyag rgya chen po'i thabs dang shes rab bo //
T02D1412:355a-32: de'i mtshan nyid phyis bshad par bya'o //
T02D1412:355a-33: yang dag sbyor zhes bya ba ni bya'o //
T02D1412:355a-34: yang dag sbyor zhes bya ba ni rna mnyam par sbyor ba'i don yin //
T02D1412:355a-35: rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral
T02D1412:355a-36: ba'i bde ba rtogs pa mngon sum skye ba dang
T02D1412:355a-37: / chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid phyag rgya chen
T02D1412:355a-38: po mngon sum du mthong bas yul ji lta ba
T02D1412:355a-39: bzhin gyi rnam par shes pa skyes pas mnyam par
T02D1412:355a-40: / sbyor zhes bya'o // sa bcu gcig pa'i ye
T02D1412:355a-41: shes kyi chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid dang mnyam
T02D1412:355a-42: par sbyor ba ni 'dir ma yin no //
T02D1412:355a-44: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa //
T02D1412:355a-46: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi 'dod pa'i don ni 'jig
T02D1412:355a-47: rten pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa'i khams kyi yon tan
T02D1412:355b-0: dang / thun mong gi dngos grub bsam gtan @355b dang //
T02D1412:355b-1: gzugs med kyi ting nge 'dzin dang //
T02D1412:355b-2: mchog gi dngos grub sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes so //
T02D1412:355b-3: sangs rgyas kyi gzhan don sku gnyis kyi mdzad pa
T02D1412:355b-4: ni 'dir rgyu'i skabs yin pas brjod par mi bya'o
T02D1412:355b-5: // dgos pa de bla na med pa'i rgyud thams
T02D1412:355b-6: cad kyi thun mong yin na bde bar gshegs pas
T02D1412:355b-7: da ltar gyi rgyud gang zhig gsungs pa snyam du
T02D1412:355b-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtog pa la //
T02D1412:355b-9: phyi ma las kyang phyi ma ste //
T02D1412:355b-10: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02D1412:355b-11: zhes mtshan gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1412:355b-12: mtshan ni rdo rje'i tshig yin pas brjod bya rnam pa gsum du gyur pa yin te //
T02D1412:355b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos dbyings su rtogs pa dang /
T02D1412:355b-14: spyan ras gzigs kyis sngags su rtogs pa dang 'jam dpal gyis chos su rtogs pa'o //
T02D1412:355b-15: de la dbyibs ni rtsa ba'i 'khor lo byang chub kyi sems phab pas dga' ba bzhi sdom pa'o //
T02D1412:355b-16: sngags ni dbugs 'byung rngub kyis 'khor lo srog aa
T02D1412:355b-17: wa dh'u t'ir bcug pas mi rtog pa'i sdom pa'o
T02D1412:355b-18: // chos nyid stong pa nyid la sgyu ma'i ye shes skyes pas bde ba chen pos sdom pa'o //
T02D1412:355b-19: ci'i phyir phyi ma'i phyi ma yin zhe na //
T02D1412:355b-20: le'u 'bum pa ni rtsa ba'i rgyud yin la //
T02D1412:355b-21: shlo ka 'bum pa nas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i
T02D1412:355b-22: phyir phyi ma yang le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa
T02D1412:355b-23: ni phyi ma'i phyi ma yin pas so //
T02D1412:355b-24: sprul pa'i sku ci'i phyir bde mchog ma yin zhe na //
T02D1412:355b-25: de ni rjod par byed pa ma yin te //
T02D1412:355b-26: la las gzugs kyi rnam par rtog pas chos ston pa dang /
T02D1412:355b-27: la la sgra'i rnam par rtog pas chos ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1412:355b-28: de la gzugs kyi rnam par rtog pa la mos pa la lha'i sku bsgom pa dang /
T02D1412:355b-29: sgra'i rnam par rtog pa la mos pa sngags bzlas pas bcos ma yin te //
T02D1412:355b-31: rang bzhin ma grub rtog pa'i phyir //
T02D1412:355b-32: phyir rol bcos mang rab tu sbyar //
T02D1412:355b-34: ston pa ni su zhig / gnas ni gang du //
T02D1412:355b-35: dus ni nam gyi tshe 'khor ni su dag dang /
T02D1412:355b-36: chos ni ci zhig bstan snyam pa la bcom ldan 'das kyi gleng gzhi gsungs pa ni //
T02D1412:355b-37: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02D1412:355b-39: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin //
T02D1412:355b-40: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //
T02D1412:355b-41: de la gsang ba ni dga' ba'i gnas so //
T02D1412:355b-42: mchog ni mchog dga'i gnas so //
T02D1412:355b-43: dgyes pa'i lhan cig skyes dga'i gnas so //
T02D1412:356a-0: @356a * // 'dzam bu'i gling gru gsum na bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1412:356a-1: thams cad bdag nyid ni gcig ste /
T02D1412:356a-2: gdul bya'i 'khor drag po 'jigs byed dang /
T02D1412:356a-3: nyan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1412:356a-4: sprul pa'i 'khor rigs lnga'i dpa' bo dpa' mo dang /
T02D1412:356a-5: sdud pa po'i 'khor lcang lo can gyi bdag po'o //
T02D1412:356a-6: rtag tu bzhugs zhes bya ba ni dus de gnyis
T02D1412:356a-7: ldan gyi dus su drag po 'jigs byed btul ba'i
T02D1412:356a-8: tshe'o // bzhugs zhes bya ba ni gnas dang sbyar
T02D1412:356a-9: na sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ston pa yin la
T02D1412:356a-10: tshe'o // / ston pa dang sbyar na dbang byas
T02D1412:356a-11: pa dang longs spyod pa'i mdzad pa rnams dang ldan
T02D1412:356a-13: mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni //
T02D1412:356a-14: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i sku ste 'bras bu'i he ru ka zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1412:356a-16: rtog pa med pa'i zhi gnas kyi nam mkha' bsam
T02D1412:356a-17: gtan bzhi dang gzugs med par 'gro ba dang gzung
T02D1412:356a-18: 'dzin dang bral ba'i lhag mthong stong pa nyid kyi
T02D1412:356a-19: nam mkha' ste sa bcu gcig tu 'gro ba'o //
T02D1412:356a-20: kun zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang gzugs med
T02D1412:356a-21: pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa ni 'jig rten gyi
T02D1412:356a-22: mkha' 'gro dur khrod brgyad na gnas pa kun nam
T02D1412:356a-23: / sa bcu gcig rtogs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das
T02D1412:356a-24: pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lo
T02D1412:356a-25: lnga'i dbus na bdag po 'bras bu he ru ka
T02D1412:356a-26: ni gtso bo yin pas dngos zhes bya'o //
T02D1412:356a-27: sems ni snying rje'i dbang gis rgya che ba'i sems can la dmigs pa'am /
T02D1412:356a-28: shes rab kyi dbang gis zab pa'i chos nyid la gzigs pas na sems dpa'o //
T02D1412:356a-29: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / ces bya
T02D1412:356a-30: ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste rgyu'i he
T02D1412:356a-31: ru ka'o // rdo rje ni sa bcu gcig pa'i
T02D1412:356a-32: stong pa nyid de de la sems dpa' ni dag
T02D1412:356a-33: pa'i 'jig rten pa'i ye shes te nyon mongs pa
T02D1412:356a-34: dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral bas na dpa'
T02D1412:356a-35: ru ka'o // ba'o // sgyu ma lta bu dang
T02D1412:356a-36: stong pa nyid ro gcig pas na bde mchog ni
T02D1412:356a-37: ji snyed pa'am ji lta ba mkhyen pa'i ye shes
T02D1412:356a-38: ru ka'o // ba'o // so // 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan dpa' //
T02D1412:356a-39: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku ste bde ba chen po'i ye shes so //
T02D1412:356a-40: rang byung ni sems rang gi 'od gsal nyams su
T02D1412:356a-41: myong ba'i rgyu rkyen las skyes pa yin gyi glo
T02D1412:356a-42: bur gyi rgyu rkyen las ma skyes pas na rang
T02D1412:356b-0: byung ngo // bdud bzhi bcom pas na bcom ldan @356b 'das so //
T02D1412:356b-1: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i bag la nyal spangs pas na dpa' ba'o //
T02D1412:356b-2: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin //
T02D1412:356b-3: zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'i chos te sprul pa'i
T02D1412:356b-4: sku dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dra ba'i sdom pa'am
T02D1412:356b-5: dbyibs dang sngags dang chos kyi bde mchog yin pas
T02D1412:356b-6: na sdom pa'o // phun sum tshogs pa lnga'i gleng
T02D1412:356b-7: gzhi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mngon sum du
T02D1412:356b-8: grub pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la dgongs
T02D1412:356b-9: pa ci yod ce na 'di ni dgongs pas bshad
T02D1412:356b-10: na sdom pa'o // pa yin te / sa'i snying pos dbyings su go ba dang /
T02D1412:356b-11: spyan ras gzigs kyis sngags su go ba dang /
T02D1412:356b-12: 'jam dpal gyis chos su go ba'o //
T02D1412:356b-13: de la dbyings ni las kyi phyag rgya dkyil 'khor
T02D1412:356b-14: bha ga ni gnas yin la de yang mtshan nyid
T02D1412:356b-15: gsum ste / dga' ba 'byung bas gsang pa dang /
T02D1412:356b-17: lhan cig skyes dga' 'byung bas na dgyes pa'o //
T02D1412:356b-18: thams cad bdag nyid 'khor lo ste rtsa drug cu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1412:356b-19: rtag tu bzhugs ni dga' ba bzhi'i dus so //
T02D1412:356b-20: sku gsum ni lkog ma dang snying ga dang lte bar phyin pa'i bde ba'o //
T02D1412:356b-21: ston pa des bshad pa'i 'khor lo bzhi khyab pa ni 'khor ro //
T02D1412:356b-22: sngags ni dkyil 'khor gyi lus kyi gnas na dbugs
T02D1412:356b-23: 'byung rngub gsum gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas na
T02D1412:356b-24: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na'o //
T02D1412:356b-25: thams cad bdag nyid ni dbugs nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o //
T02D1412:356b-26: rtag tu bzhugs ni rlung gnyis 'gog pa'i dus ni srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud pa'o //
T02D1412:356b-27: ston pa po ni rtsa gsum gyi rlung dbus su chud pas mi rtog pa skyes pa'o //
T02D1412:356b-28: des bshad pa'i chos ni dbugs nyi khri chig stong
T02D1412:356b-29: drug brgya'i dra ba sdom pa las bde ba skyes
T02D1412:356b-30: pa'o // de la chos kyi dbang du byas na
T02D1412:356b-31: phyag rgya chen po'i chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas so
T02D1412:356b-32: pa'o // // de yang stong pa nyid dang mtshan
T02D1412:356b-33: ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1412:356b-34: dang ldan pas gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na'o
T02D1412:356b-35: pa'o // // // thams cad bdag nyid ni byang
T02D1412:356b-36: chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun no
T02D1412:356b-37: pa'o // // // // rtag tu bzhugs ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus te /
T02D1412:356b-38: shes rab ye shes yul gyi stong pa nyid dang
T02D1412:356b-39: dbang bzhi pa yul can gyi stong pa nyid mthong
T02D1412:356b-40: ba'i dus so // rtag tu bzhugs ni sems 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'o //
T02D1412:357a-0: ston pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te gong @357a * //
T02D1412:357a-1: bu'i gzugs las 'das par gyur pa sprul pa'i sku
T02D1412:357a-2: dang dngos po med pa yin zhes gsungs pas longs
T02D1412:357a-4: de yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes gsungs pas
T02D1412:357a-5: gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po chos kyi
T02D1412:357a-6: sku'i ston pa des bshad pa'i sems kyi bde mchog
T02D1412:357a-8: de lta bas na ston pa'i gleng gzhi bshad pa las kyi phyag rgya chags lam bsgom pa dang /
T02D1412:357a-10: dam tshig gis phyag rgya grol ba'i lam bstan pa dang /
T02D1412:357a-11: phyag rgya chen po bsgom par rang lhag par gnas pa'i lam bstan pa'o //
T02D1412:357a-12: bshad pa'i rgyud rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang kha sbyor
T02D1412:357a-13: thig le las dkyil 'khor bha ga'i dbang du byas
T02D1412:357a-14: nas 'byung ba bzhi'i rtsa'i dbus su nam mkha'i rtsa
T02D1412:357a-15: gnas su bshad pas 'byung ba lnga dang sbyar ba
T02D1412:357a-16: / dkyil 'khor lus kyi dbang du byas nas rlung lnga ston pa dang /
T02D1412:357a-17: dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang du mdzad nas
T02D1412:357a-18: yi ge bcu drug gis kun brtags pa dang gzhan
T02D1412:357a-19: dbang gi snang ba spangs pa'i yongs su grub pa'i
T02D1412:357a-20: 'od gsal ba'i snang ba bshad pas stong pa nyid
T02D1412:357a-21: bcu drug mtshon pa yin pas bshad pa'i rgyud kyi
T02D1412:357a-22: don la rmongs par mi bya'o //
T02D1412:357a-23: de ltar gleng gzhi bshad nas rgyud kyi lus mdor gzhag par bzhed pa ni /
T02D1412:357a-24: sgra yi tshul la nges 'byung rnams //
T02D1412:357a-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:357a-26: sgra ni rlung dbus ma las 'byung ba'i yi ge h'um ngo //
T02D1412:357a-27: de las 'byung ba ni lha drug cu rtsa gnyis te /
T02D1412:357a-28: sprul pa las 'byung dpa' bo rnams //
T02D1412:357a-29: yan lag drug cu sems kyis sprul //
T02D1412:357a-30: dag pa'i chos kyi sprul pa ni //
T02D1412:357a-31: phag mo'i gzugs su bstan pa yin //
T02D1412:357a-33: dam tshig spyod pa ni rten gyi gang zag rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D1412:357a-35: de yang ji lta bur bsgom par bya zhe na /
T02D1412:357a-36: thog ma dbus mthar rnam par bzhes //
T02D1412:357a-38: thog ma ni gnas pa'i rnal 'byor te tshad med
T02D1412:357a-39: pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang tshogs bsags pa dang
T02D1412:357a-40: / stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1412:357a-41: dbus ni ldang ba 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D1412:357b-0: mchod pa'i rnal 'byor te ting nge 'dzin de rnam pa gsum @357b mo ;
T02D1412:357b-1: / mthar nye bar bsdu ba dang kun du spyod pa ste ldang ba'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1412:357b-2: rnam par gnas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor rgyud
T02D1412:357b-3: la sbyor ba dang dngos gzhi rjes 'jug dge bar
T02D1412:357b-4: gnas pa'o // de'i phan yon ci zhig ce na //
T02D1412:357b-5: 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1412:357b-6: sa bla dang sa 'og dang sa steng gsum du
T02D1412:357b-7: ye shes sems dpa' lus la 'jug pa dang 'ching
T02D1412:357b-8: ba'i tshe ye shes sems dpa' la phar 'jug pa
T02D1412:357b-10: bshad pa'i rgyud rdo rje mkha' 'gro las zab mo'i
T02D1412:357b-11: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dbang du mdzad nas sgra ni
T02D1412:357b-12: aa wa dh'u t'i'i rlung yin la 'byung ba ni
T02D1412:357b-13: dga' ba bzhi'i shes pa yin la dam tshig spyod
T02D1412:357b-14: pa ni skye mched bcu gnyis bde bas khyab pa
T02D1412:357b-15: yin la / spyod yul ni bdag byin gyis rlob
T02D1412:357b-16: pa'i lam las thams cad bde bas khyab par rtogs
T02D1412:357b-17: yin la / pa yin no // rang rig 'od
T02D1412:357b-18: gsal gyi bde ba de dus thams cad du gnas
T02D1412:357b-19: yin la / pa yin no // pas na / thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas //
T02D1412:357b-21: de la dbang bzhi pa'i dus kyi tshe mngon sum
T02D1412:357b-22: du rtogs pa ni 'jig rten gsum du rnyed par
T02D1412:357b-24: de yang thabs gang gis rtogs par bya zhe na /
T02D1412:357b-25: shes rab thabs kyis sbyor ji bzhin //
T02D1412:357b-26: zhes pas phyag rgya bzhi las bde ba stong pa
T02D1412:357b-27: nyid du rtogs par bya'o zhes gsungs pas bshad pa'i
T02D1412:357b-28: rgyud la rmongs par mi bya'o //
T02D1412:357b-29: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D1412:357b-30: thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba bzhin //
T02D1412:357b-31: sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan //
T02D1412:357b-33: bde ba rtog pa med pa lhan cig skyes pa dang /
T02D1412:357b-34: bde ba stong pa nyid du shes pa don gyi
T02D1412:357b-35: lhan cig skyes pa gnyis grub par byed pa'i thabs
T02D1412:357b-36: ni shes rab phyag rgya bzhi dang thabs bzhi ste
T02D1412:357b-37: / de yang phyag rgya bzhi ni las kyi phyag
T02D1412:357b-38: rgya ni lo brgyad nas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bar
T02D1412:357b-39: gyi bud med kyi aa wa dh'u t'i nam mkha'i
T02D1412:357b-40: / rtsa'i reg bya'o // chos kyi phyag rgya ni
T02D1412:357b-41: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yid du mi 'ong ba
T02D1412:357b-42: / rtsa'i reg bya'o // dang / bar ma spangs
T02D1412:357b-43: pa'i gzugs sdug pa dang sgra snyan pa dang dri
T02D1412:357b-44: zhim pa dang reg bya rnams kyis yid du 'ong
T02D1412:357b-45: / rtsa'i reg bya'o // dang / ba'o // dam
T02D1412:357b-46: tshig gi phyag rgya ni sa dang chu dang rlung
T02D1412:357b-47: spangs pa'i rlung me'i drod can no //
T02D1412:358a-0: phyag rgya chen po ni rjes su dpag pa dang lung gis bstan @358a * //
T02D1412:358a-1: pa dang lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa chos nyid mngon sum gyis rtogs pa'o //
T02D1412:358a-2: thabs ni 'khrul 'khor gyis byang chub kyi sems 'dzin
T02D1412:358a-3: par nus pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i phyi'i lus kyi dbang
T02D1412:358a-4: po mngon sum las kyi phyag rgya'i thabs so //
T02D1412:358a-5: chos kyi thabs ni yul 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
T02D1412:358a-6: yid du 'ong ba las skyes pa'i bde ba yid
T02D1412:358a-8: dam tshig phyag rgya'i thabs ni nang gi reg bya
T02D1412:358a-9: bde ba skyes pa'i lus kyi dbang po mngon sum
T02D1412:358a-10: mo // phyag rgya chen po'i thabs ni rang rig
T02D1412:358a-11: pa'i mngon sum gyis chos nyid mthong ba'i rnal 'byor
T02D1412:358a-13: sbyor ji bzhin ni dga' ba gsum la rang bzhin
T02D1412:358a-14: brgyad cu dang bral nas rtog pa med pa'i rnam
T02D1412:358a-16: bde ba stong pa nyid shes pa'i 'od gsal ba'i ye shes so //
T02D1412:358a-17: yul ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum gyi lam gyis rtogs pas na sbyor ji bzhin no //
T02D1412:358a-18: sngags bzlas ni dbugs 'byung rngub aa wa dh'u t'ir bcug pa'o //
T02D1412:358a-19: bsam gtan ni rtog med kyis mthong ba'i stong pa nyid de snang ba'o //
T02D1412:358a-20: sogs ni bla na med pa'i sbyin sreg dang mchod sbyin dang slob dpon no //
T02D1412:358a-23: sgom pa so sor snang bas na //
T02D1412:358a-24: slob dpon sems kyi rgyal po yin //
T02D1412:358a-25: ae wam la sogs gang gsungs pa'o //
T02D1412:358a-27: sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes ni mtshan nyid kyi
T02D1412:358a-28: theg pa ltar goms pa lam du byed pa ma
T02D1412:358a-30: rgyu rkyen bsags pa las byung ba'i ye shes bla
T02D1412:358a-31: ma'i man ngag mngon sum gyi gzhan don gyis bskyed
T02D1412:358a-32: pas na mchog gi ye shes so //
T02D1412:358a-33: rgyud las gsungs pa zhes pa ni le'u 'bum pa dang shlo ka 'bum pa las so //
T02D1412:358a-34: nyan par gyis zhes bya ba ni sdud pa po
T02D1412:358a-35: lag na rdo rje la sems rtse gcig pas nyon
T02D1412:358a-36: cig ces pa'o // de ltar tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1412:358a-37: gnyis kyis le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig gi lus mdor
T02D1412:358a-38: cig ces pa'o // gzhag gsungs nas / de ni
T02D1412:358a-39: le'u dang po rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i mdor bstan gnas
T02D1412:358a-40: dang bcas pa rgyas par bshad par bzhed nas dbugs
T02D1412:358a-42: dri yi zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1412:358b-0: dang po snod gcig tu @358b za ba tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsten pa'i rdzas dang /
T02D1412:358b-1: dbugs 'byung byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D1412:358b-2: bar ma rang byung gi khrag dang /
T02D1412:358b-4: dri ni bshang ba dang ro'i chu ni gci ba dang /
T02D1412:358b-5: bcas pa ni rta dang glang po dang khyi dang ba lang dang mi sha ste lnga'o //
T02D1412:358b-6: de aom a'a: h'um gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs nas
T02D1412:358b-7: rigs lnga'i rang bzhin can gyis ro rdo rje mar
T02D1412:358b-8: bskyed pa'o // rnal 'byor pas dus rtag tu khyad
T02D1412:358b-9: par rigs ldan rnams ni mchod par bya'o zhes bya
T02D1412:358b-10: ba ni thun bzhi'am dus drug tu tshogs kyi 'khor
T02D1412:358b-12: rnal 'byor pa ni rten gyi gang zag go //
T02D1412:358b-13: dus rtag tu zhes pa ni rgyun mi 'chad par dus drug go //
T02D1412:358b-14: khyad par ni rtog pa med pa'i shes pas ro
T02D1412:358b-15: myang ba'i rigs ldan ni lha drug cu rtsa gnyis
T02D1412:358b-16: su bskyed pa'o // mchod pa ni nang du 'khor
T02D1412:358b-17: lo bzhi pa la dkyil 'khor bzhi bsgom pa dang
T02D1412:358b-18: su bskyed pa'o // / lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang lnga la nang gi sbyin sreg dbul ba'o //
T02D1412:358b-19: tshogs kyi 'khor lo de yang gnyis su gyur te
T02D1412:358b-20: bdud rtsi lnga'i ro rdo rje ma la yid nang
T02D1412:358b-21: du chud pas bde ba rtog med kyi 'dod pa'i
T02D1412:358b-23: gal te yid phyir byung na dus drug tu rigs ldan dkyil 'khor la sbyin sreg gis mchod pa'o //
T02D1412:358b-24: ro 'ba' zhig gis tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya'am zhe na /
T02D1412:358b-25: pho nya lhan cig skyes dngos grub //
T02D1412:358b-26: mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste //
T02D1412:358b-28: pho nya ni mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bud med
T02D1412:358b-29: dge bsnyen ma'i sdom pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i
T02D1412:358b-30: sdom pa dang sngags kyi dbang bskur thob pa'o //
T02D1412:358b-32: gzhi ni sa gzhir byas nas su //
T02D1412:358b-33: rnal 'byor pa yis longs spyod bya //
T02D1412:358b-35: lhan cig skyes pa'i dngos grub ni /
T02D1412:358b-36: goms pa las byung ba ma yin pa /
T02D1412:358b-37: bde ba rtog med rgyud tshogs pa las skyes pa'i
T02D1412:358b-38: dga' ba bzhi ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dngos grub
T02D1412:358b-39: po // mchog ni las las skyes pa ste skye
T02D1412:358b-40: ba snga mar gsang sngags kyi sgom pa goms pa'i
T02D1412:358b-41: tshogs lam dang sbyor lam mthong lam sgom lam thob
T02D1412:359a-0: 'bring ni zhing skyes te gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang yul dbus su skyes pa dang @359a * //
T02D1412:359a-1: dbang po tshang ba dang las kyi mtha' ma log pas dge ba la 'jug pa dang /
T02D1412:359a-2: sngags kyi bstan pa la dad pa dang /
T02D1412:359a-3: bstan pa dang phrad pa ste bdag gi 'byor pa lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1412:359a-4: tha ma ni sngags las skyes ma ste rdo rje slob dpon gyi phyag rgyar gyur pas ma dang ;
T02D1412:359a-5: rang dang lhan cig dbang bskur ba'i sring mo dang /
T02D1412:359a-6: rang gis dbang bskur ba'i bu mo dang /
T02D1412:359a-7: slob mas dbang bskur ba'i tsha mo dang /
T02D1412:359a-8: rang gi sgom pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa pho nya ma'o //
T02D1412:359a-9: tshig de rnams ni reg bya rdo rje ma yin
T02D1412:359a-10: la de la gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro
T02D1412:359a-11: dang / reg bya dang ldan pas tshogs kyi 'khor
T02D1412:359a-12: lo'i yul ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yin no
T02D1412:359a-13: dang / zhes bstan to // yid ni nang du chud pa yin /
T02D1412:359a-14: 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya ba la yid ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
T02D1412:359a-15: nang du chud pa ni srog aa wa dh'u t'ir
T02D1412:359a-16: chud pas 'dod yon lnga la shes pa rtog pa
T02D1412:359a-18: 'dod pa'i dngos grub ni bde ba rtog pa med
T02D1412:359a-19: pa bsam gtan gyi sdom pa mi g-yo ba'i las
T02D1412:359a-20: so // gal te rtog pa skye bar gyur na ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1412:359a-21: rang rdzas thig les sangs rgyas dang /
T02D1412:359a-22: byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya //
T02D1412:359a-24: dga' bral du song ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyis phung po lnga'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02D1412:359a-25: dbang po drug gi byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1412:359a-26: 'byung ba lnga'i yul mchod par bya'o //
T02D1412:359a-27: de bzhin du gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro
T02D1412:359a-28: rnams la dga' bral du song na gzugs rdo rje
T02D1412:359a-29: ma la sogs pas phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D1412:359a-31: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las //
T02D1412:359a-32: lha la dmigs pa byed pa dag / rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te //
T02D1412:359a-33: rang gi dam tshig bdag sbyor ba //
T02D1412:359a-35: gzugs brnyan lugs ma la sogs pa //
T02D1412:359a-37: byang chub sems la rab brtson na //
T02D1412:359a-40: las kyi phyag rgya spangs pa yi //
T02D1412:359a-41: 'gro ba'i lam la ji ltar yin //
T02D1412:359a-42: nang du chud par bya zhe na //
T02D1412:359a-43: mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang //
T02D1412:359a-44: thos pa dang ni dran pa yis //
T02D1412:359b-0: @359b mthong ba gzugs rdo rje ma nas reg bya
T02D1412:359b-1: rdo rje ma'i bar du thos pa sgra rdo rje
T02D1412:359b-2: ma dang / dran pa chos kyi rdo rje ma
T02D1412:359b-3: las ma rmongs pa dran pa'i 'du byed sngon nyams
T02D1412:359b-5: de la yid nang du chud pa rtog pa med
T02D1412:359b-6: pa skyes pas rtog pa las grol bar 'gyur ba
T02D1412:359b-7: 'am / yid phyir byung nas rtog pa skyes na
T02D1412:359b-8: dang ba'i dad pas gzugs rdo rje ma la sgos
T02D1412:359b-9: pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mchod par
T02D1412:359b-10: 'am / byed pa / de ltar grol ba'i lam
T02D1412:359b-11: 'di la yang the tshom med par mchod par 'gyur
T02D1412:359b-12: 'am / byed pa / ro // de'i phan yon gsungs pa ni yid nang du chud pas /
T02D1412:359b-13: rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog / dag byed sdig pa 'jig byed pa //
T02D1412:359b-14: bsod nams mchog gi rtog pa med pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs dgu'o //
T02D1412:359b-15: dag ni rgyu kun 'byung dag pa'o //
T02D1412:359b-16: sdig pa 'jig pa ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa zad pa'o //
T02D1412:359b-17: gal te yid phyir 'byung ba la bsod nams kyi tshogs su gyur pa ni /
T02D1412:359b-18: gsang sngags zlos pa'i bzlas brjod dang //
T02D1412:359b-21: gsang sngags zlos pa'i dus drug tu ris drug gi bzlas pa zlos pa'o //
T02D1412:359b-22: bzlas brjod ni dbugs 'byung rngub kyi bzlas pa'o //
T02D1412:359b-23: bsam gtan ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang rnam snang
T02D1412:359b-24: dang padma gar dbang dang he ru ka dang rdo
T02D1412:359b-25: rje nyi ma dang rta mchog gi ting nge 'dzin
T02D1412:359b-26: bsgoms nas dus drug tu bdud rtsi rnam pa drug
T02D1412:359b-28: kyang zhes pa ni yid nang du chud pa las
T02D1412:359b-29: phyir 'byung ba yang bsod nams kyi tshogs su 'gyur
T02D1412:359b-30: ba'o // de skad du yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro las /
T02D1412:359b-31: tho rangs dgun smad gyur pa na //
T02D1412:359b-32: dpyid dang dbyar ni nyi cha gnyis //
T02D1412:359b-33: nyin phyed mkhas pas sogs ka sbyar //
T02D1412:359b-34: srod ni de bzhin ston ka ste //
T02D1412:359b-35: dgun stod mtshan phyed cha yin no //
T02D1412:359b-37: rdo rje 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin shes par byas
T02D1412:359b-38: la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dang sbyar
T02D1412:359b-39: bar bya ste / rdo rje sems dpa' dgun smad de //
T02D1412:359b-40: rnam par snang mdzad thub par dpyid //
T02D1412:359b-41: de zhin rta mchog sos ka ste //
T02D1412:359b-42: dgun nam dbyar na he ru ka / rdo rje nyi ma ston ka la //
T02D1412:360a-2: sos ka mar me bza' bya ste /
T02D1412:360a-3: de bzhin du ni dbyar ka chu //
T02D1412:360a-4: ston gyi dus su mar khu ste //
T02D1412:360a-5: de bzhin dgun stod me tog go //
T02D1412:360a-6: kye ho dgun smad ga pur te //
T02D1412:360a-7: de bzhin dpyid ni bzhi mnyam mo //
T02D1412:360a-8: de rnams sman ni chen po ste //
T02D1412:360a-9: dus drug tu ni yongs shes bya'o //
T02D1412:360a-10: dus mchog 'di dang mnyam med de //
T02D1412:360a-11: sbyong ba kun gyi dam pa yin //
T02D1412:360a-12: rang bzhin de rnams rdzogs par ni //
T02D1412:360a-13: nam zhig rnal 'byor par gyur na //
T02D1412:360a-17: ; so ga dang dbyar dang ston ka dang dgun
T02D1412:360a-18: stod dang dgun smad dang dus drug ni rigs drug
T02D1412:360a-19: gi 'dod pa'i lha kun gsal bar byas la /
T02D1412:360a-20: 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas dran pa'i bde ba dang
T02D1412:360a-21: ldan pa las phyir 'phros pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs
T02D1412:360a-22: bsag par bya'o // dngos grub kyi rgyu gang zhe na /
T02D1412:360a-23: shin tu mnyam gzhag sgrub pa pos //
T02D1412:360a-24: dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bar bya //
T02D1412:360a-26: shin tu mnyam gzhag ni rnal 'byor pa sems rtse gcig pa'o //
T02D1412:360a-27: dam tshig ni rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'i rigs lnga'i
T02D1412:360a-28: dam tshig bcu bzhi dang phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang
T02D1412:360a-29: gi sdom pa rdo rje slob dpon smod pa nas
T02D1412:360a-30: shes rab bud med smod pa'i bar du bcu bzhi
T02D1412:360a-31: dang gsang ba'i bzhi dang shes rab ye shes kyi
T02D1412:360a-32: sdom pa brgyad de bzhi bcu dus drug tu dran
T02D1412:360a-33: pas rtag tu bskyang bar bya'o //
T02D1412:360a-34: bzhi bcu de kho na skyong ngam zhe na /
T02D1412:360a-35: byang chub kyi sems kyi srung ba yin te /
T02D1412:360a-36: kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems bde ba rtog med
T02D1412:360a-37: bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang don dam pa byang
T02D1412:360a-38: chub sems kyi bde ba stong pa nyid shes pa
T02D1412:360a-40: dran pas ni dam tshig bsrung ba yin la /
T02D1412:360a-41: dam tshig gis ni byang chub kyi sems bsrung ba yin no //
T02D1412:360a-42: gal te nyams na ci zhe na /
T02D1412:360a-43: dam tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1412:360a-44: dbang bskur dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
T02D1412:360a-46: dam tshig bsrung ba'i sems med pas nyams na dbang
T02D1412:360a-47: bskur mi thob pa dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis
T02D1412:360a-48: dam tshig nyams na dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur
T02D1412:360b-0: ba'o // 'di skad @360b ston pa yin te /
T02D1412:360b-1: dri'i thig le dang me tog gi tshom bu dang
T02D1412:360b-2: yig 'bru dang phyag mtshan dang lag pa'i phyag rgya
T02D1412:360b-3: chen po gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bzhag nas rnal
T02D1412:360b-4: 'byor ma sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
T02D1412:360b-5: rnal 'byor pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rang bzhin du
T02D1412:360b-6: bskyed nas rang rang gi gnas su rang rang gi
T02D1412:360b-7: phyag rgya dang / sgom pa dang bzlas pa dang
T02D1412:360b-8: ngag gi brda dang lus kyi brda dang bcas pas
T02D1412:360b-9: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rgyu rkyen tshogs pa
T02D1412:360b-10: las lus bde ba dang yid bde ba'i bsam gtan
T02D1412:360b-12: gal te rtog pa byung na dad pa dang dang
T02D1412:360b-13: ba'i sems kyis lha'i 'khor lo la nang gi sbyin
T02D1412:360b-15: yang na rdo rje mkha' 'gro las byung ba ltar go cha drug gi lhar bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1412:360b-16: yang na rgyud bla ma nas byung ba bzhin /
T02D1412:360b-17: mkha' spyod bya yi gzugs can gyis //
T02D1412:360b-18: thugs kyi 'khor lo bsgrub pa dang //
T02D1412:360b-19: sa spyod ma yi gzugs can gyis //
T02D1412:360b-20: gsung gi 'khor lo sgrub pa dang /
T02D1412:360b-21: sa 'og dud 'gro'i gzugs can gyi bong bu'i rnam
T02D1412:360b-22: pas he ru ka sku'i grub pa bsgrub par bya'o
T02D1412:360b-23: // 'jig rten pa'i lus dang ngag gi spyod lam
T02D1412:360b-24: dor nas lus ngag gi brda bya ba yin te
T02D1412:360b-25: // / de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las //
T02D1412:360b-26: de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus //
T02D1412:360b-27: ci 'dod pa yi gos dang rgyan //
T02D1412:360b-28: sna tshogs gos ni bgos nas kyang //
T02D1412:360b-29: me tog phreng ldan kha dri zhim //
T02D1412:360b-30: gang gis lha dang 'dra ba yi //
T02D1412:360b-31: bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs la //
T02D1412:360b-32: skal bzang dag ni phyag rgyas mtshan //
T02D1412:360b-33: tshogs kyi 'khor lo brtag par bya //
T02D1412:360b-35: de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshad nas /
T02D1412:360b-36: zhi ba'i btung ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D1412:360b-37: sbrang rtsi mtshal dang ga pur bcas //
T02D1412:360b-38: tsandan dmar du sbyar ba ni //
T02D1412:360b-39: zhes bya ba gsungs te gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i yul rdo rje mar ston pa yin no ;
T02D1412:360b-40: ; de yang gang zhe na sbrang rtsi ste gci ba dang /
T02D1412:360b-42: ga pur te byang chub sems dang /
T02D1412:360b-43: dmar te sha chen po dang /
T02D1412:360b-44: tsandan te bshang ba dang sbyar ba'i sha lnga dang bsres nas ro mnyam par byas pa'o //
T02D1412:360b-45: de gang du gzhag par bya zhes gsungs te /
T02D1412:361a-0: @361a * // lha drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi dbus thod pa bzhi'i gnas su'o //
T02D1412:361a-1: lha de rnams ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1412:361a-2: thams cad rdo rje'i mtshan ma 'dzin //
T02D1412:361a-4: dpral bar rdo rje'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o //
T02D1412:361a-5: de ltar myang bar bya zhe na /
T02D1412:361a-6: sbom po mtha' ltag rtse sbyar bas ;
T02D1412:361a-8: mthe bong dang srin lag gnyis kyis lce'i steng du ro gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1412:361a-9: ji ltar shes pas zhi ba'i btung bar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1412:361a-10: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu dpyad //
T02D1412:361a-12: rnal 'byor bsam gtan gyi bde ba'o //
T02D1412:361a-13: rig pa ni lce'i dbang po'i mngon sum gyis dga' ba bzhi'i bye brag rtogs pa dang /
T02D1412:361a-14: de yang bdud rtsi lnga'i ro la dang por skyes pa'i bde ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba dang /
T02D1412:361a-16: lhan cig skyes dga' skyes pa'i rjes la bla ma'i
T02D1412:361a-17: mngon sum gyis gzhan don gyi ro'i stong pa nyid
T02D1412:361a-18: rtogs pa rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum skyes pa ni
T02D1412:361a-19: rtag tu dpyad ces bya ba yin te /
T02D1412:361a-21: rnam shes dang ni ye shes kyis /
T02D1412:361a-22: yul gyi rig pa rtag tu dpyad //
T02D1412:361a-24: de ltar na lce'i dbang po'i mngon sum dang /
T02D1412:361a-25: rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum gyi rang bzhin brgyad cu
T02D1412:361a-26: dang bral ba'i ro'i stong pa nyid nyams su myong
T02D1412:361a-27: ba ni zhi ba'i btung ba zhes bya'o //
T02D1412:361a-28: gdan bzhi las chos kyi dbus ni lus kyi dkyil
T02D1412:361a-29: 'khor yin la rdo rje'i mtshams 'dzin pa ni kha
T02D1412:361a-31: sbom po ni gsang ba'i rdo rje srin lag gi
T02D1412:361a-32: ni padma de sbyar ba las byung ba'i byang chub
T02D1412:361a-33: kyi sems rnal 'byor pas rig pa ni zhi ba'i
T02D1412:361a-34: btung ba yin no zhes gsungs te /
T02D1412:361a-35: gzhan gyi don slob ma dbang bskur ba'i don du
T02D1412:361a-36: gsungs pas bshad pa'i rgyud la rmongs par mi bya'o
T02D1412:361a-37: // de ltar shes pas rtog pa med par gyur pas zhi ba'i btung ba myangs na /
T02D1412:361a-38: dngos gru brtag par thob par 'gyur //
T02D1412:361a-41: ri bong 'dzin las rtsva zhi ba //
T02D1412:361a-42: zhes grags pas skyes pa skar ma rgyal dang gza'
T02D1412:361a-43: phur bu la btus nas b'a r'a na s'i'i rig
T02D1412:361a-44: byed kyi gnas su pa gi wang can gyi pags
T02D1412:361a-45: pa la sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bkrus te
T02D1412:361b-0: de'i chu @361b 'thungs na bsam gtan dang po'i ting
T02D1412:361b-1: nge 'dzin thob po zhes rig byed kyi gzhung nas
T02D1412:361b-2: byung bas / dpe de bzhin du bdud rtsi lnga'i
T02D1412:361b-3: ro las shes pa rtog med skyes nas chos kyi
T02D1412:361b-5: gal te shes pa rtog med skyes nas de bsod rnams kyi tshogs su gyur pa ni /
T02D1412:361b-7: dngos grub thams cad 'jug byed yin //
T02D1412:361b-9: mi 'chi bcu phyed ni bdud rtsi lngas dri ma med pa'i de kho na nyid dang /
T02D1412:361b-10: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi de kho na nyid dang /
T02D1412:361b-11: tshe 'phel ba'i de kho na nyid du grub pas na dngos grub thams cad grub ces bshad do //
T02D1412:361b-12: de ltar zhi ba'i btung ba bshad nas da ni pho nya'i gtsang sbra bshad par bya ste /
T02D1412:361b-14: dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi //
T02D1412:361b-16: mchod bzhi ni dpes ston pa yin te /
T02D1412:361b-17: dung can ma dang padma can la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1412:361b-18: yid du 'ong ba'i yul chos kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1412:361b-19: sbyor ba legs pa'i gtum mo me drod can dang /
T02D1412:361b-20: mngon sum gyis mthong ba'i stong pa nyid kyi phyag
T02D1412:361b-21: rgya chen po las bde ba zag pa med pa
T02D1412:361b-22: de bzhin du tha mal pa las kyi phyag rgya'i
T02D1412:361b-23: rnal 'byor ma la yang bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyangs pa'i
T02D1412:361b-24: sa chu gnyis kyi pha rol me rlung gnyis kyi
T02D1412:361b-25: tshu rol na dbus ma nam mkha'i rlung dang kha
T02D1412:361b-26: sbyar nas bde ba rtog pa med pa ni rgyu
T02D1412:361b-27: rkyen gyi tshogs pa las skyes la bla ma'i gdams
T02D1412:361b-28: ngag mngon sum gyi gzhan don la ni reg bya
T02D1412:361b-29: stong pa nyid du rtogs pas rnal 'byor pa'i mngon
T02D1412:361b-30: sum skye ste / de nyid zag pa med pa'i bde ba shes rab ye shes yin pas /
T02D1412:361b-31: dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi //
T02D1412:361b-34: snyoms par 'jug pa dang pos ni rtog pa med pa zhi gnas skye la /
T02D1412:361b-35: snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis pas ni reg bya yul
T02D1412:361b-36: gyi stong pa'i de kho na nyid 'dzin cing rtogs
T02D1412:361b-37: pa'o // 'byung ba bzhi'i dbus ma nam mkha'i rtsa
T02D1412:361b-38: dang sprad pa las ji ltar bde ba skye zhe
T02D1412:361b-40: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las //
T02D1412:361b-41: bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //
T02D1412:362a-2: de la stong pa nyid ji ltar rtogs she na /
T02D1412:362a-3: bla mas slob ma'i rna drung du //
T02D1412:362a-4: rab tu 'bad de bklag par bya //
T02D1412:362a-6: bla ma'i tshig gis stong pa nyid las dran pa'i
T02D1412:362a-7: nges pa drangs nas aa sams [*sems?] ma zhes te
T02D1412:362a-8: nges pa'i shes pa mngon sum gyis zlos kar byed
T02D1412:362a-9: pa ni man ngag yin no //
T02D1412:362a-11: lha dang mi yi bde ba ni //
T02D1412:362a-12: bsdus byas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi //
T02D1412:362a-13: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
T02D1412:362a-15: lha ni tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa'i bsam gtan gyi bde ba'o //
T02D1412:362a-16: mi ni mkhas pa rnams kyis rjes dpag gis stong
T02D1412:362a-17: pa nyid rtogs pa'i yid bde ba bsdus kyang mngon
T02D1412:362a-18: sum gyi bde ba zag pa med pa nyid kyi
T02D1412:362a-19: bcu drug char yang mi phod pa'o //
T02D1412:362a-20: de yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro las //
T02D1412:362a-21: rtsa bcu drug la brten pa'i khams bcu drug /
T02D1412:362a-22: gtum mo drod kyis bzhu nas bde ba zag pa
T02D1412:362a-23: med pa gcig tu shes pas bsgril ba'i rtsa'i skud
T02D1412:362a-24: pa gcig gi bde ba stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i
T02D1412:362a-26: de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang zhi ba'i btung ba dang pho nya'i gtsang sbra bshad nas /
T02D1412:362a-27: ri sul tshang tshing phug rnams dang //
T02D1412:362a-28: chu bo dag gi ngogs dag dang //
T02D1412:362a-29: gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du //
T02D1412:362a-30: der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D1412:362a-32: sgra ji bzhin pa'i gnas bzhi ni bum pa'i dbang
T02D1412:362a-33: bskur ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rten yin
T02D1412:362a-34: no // dbyibs kyi dbang du byas na ri sul ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo //
T02D1412:362a-35: chang tshing phug ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo /
T02D1412:362a-36: chu bo'i ngogs ni chos kyi 'khor lo //
T02D1412:362a-37: dur khrod ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste lus kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1412:362a-38: sngags kyi dbang du byas na ri sul ni lo
T02D1412:362a-39: bcu gnyis ma tshang tshing phug ni bcu drug ma
T02D1412:362a-40: dang / chu bo'i ngogs ni nyi shu ma dang /
T02D1412:362a-41: dur khrod ni rtsa bzhi ma ste bha ga'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1412:362a-42: chos kyi dbang du byas na ri bo ni stong
T02D1412:362a-43: pa nyid dang tshang tshing phug ni mtshan ma med
T02D1412:362a-44: pa dang / chu bo ni smon pa med pa'o //
T02D1412:362a-46: chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1412:362a-47: de skad du yang rgyud bla ma las /
T02D1412:362b-0: dkyil 'khor @362b lus zhes bya ba dang //
T02D1412:362b-1: dkyil 'khor bha ga zhes su bshad //
T02D1412:362b-2: dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings yin te //
T02D1412:362b-3: rnam pa gsum du nges pa yin //
T02D1412:362b-5: le'u dang po'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:362b-7: // / de ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pa bshad nas bskyed pa'i rim pa'i 'khor lo gsungs pa ni /
T02D1412:362b-8: de nas lci ba ma lhung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
T02D1412:362b-9: de la le'u gnyis pas ni slob dpon gyi las bshad pa dang /
T02D1412:362b-10: le'u gsum pas slob ma'i las bshad pa dang /
T02D1412:362b-11: le'u bzhi pas lha dgod pa bshad nas bskyed pa'i rim par gyur pa yin no //
T02D1412:362b-12: de la thog mar gtsang sbra gsum gyis rdzogs pa'i
T02D1412:362b-13: rim pa'i bsnyen pa byas nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'am
T02D1412:362b-14: / yang na phyis 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bsnyen pa
T02D1412:362b-15: la ltos nas bskyed rim gyis bsnyen pa ma gsungs
T02D1412:362b-16: / so // de yang rgyud bla ma las /
T02D1412:362b-17: gtsang sbra gsum gyis bsnyen pa byas nas dkyil 'khor bri zhes gsungs so //
T02D1412:362b-18: sa'i cho ga ci'i phyir ma gsungs she na /
T02D1412:362b-19: bshad pa'i rgyud la ltos pa'am sbyang mi dgos pa'i dbang du mdzad pa yin no //
T02D1412:362b-20: bsnyen pa dang sa'i cho ga'i rjes la dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid bshad par bzhed nas /
T02D1412:362b-21: ba yi lci ba ma lhung bas //
T02D1412:362b-22: dkyil 'khor sa ni legs par byug / ces gsungs te /
T02D1412:362b-23: ba'i rnam lngas byugs pa ni rgyud sde bzhi'i thun mong yin no //
T02D1412:362b-24: khyad par du rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud las dur khrod
T02D1412:362b-25: kyi thal ba dang bdud rtsi rnam pa lngas byugs
T02D1412:362b-26: nas dkyil 'khor rtsom par bstan to //
T02D1412:362b-27: dur khrod kyi thal ba dang mi gtsang bas ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D1412:362b-28: shi ba dang ma shi ba dang gtsang ba dang
T02D1412:362b-29: mi gtsang bar ro mnyam par ston par bzhad pa
T02D1412:362b-30: yin no // dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid bshad nas /
T02D1412:362b-31: tshon gyi mtshan nyid bshad par bzhed nas /
T02D1412:362b-32: dur khrod du ni kun spyod pa //
T02D1412:362b-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:362b-34: kun spyod pa ni mnyam par spyod pa ste rin
T02D1412:362b-35: po che dang tshon rtsi dang dur khrod kyi rdzas
T02D1412:362b-37: ro bsregs pa'i sol ba'i phye ma dang /
T02D1412:362b-38: zhes bya ba ni rus pa'i phye ma dkar po dang /
T02D1412:363a-2: dur khrod so phag ldan pa yi //
T02D1412:363a-3: zhes bya bas mtshos pa las ser po dang /
T02D1412:363a-5: ljang gu ni rus pa dang tshon ljang gu bsres pa'o //
T02D1412:363a-6: dkyil 'khor bzang po bri bar bya //
T02D1412:363a-7: zhes bya ba ni drag po 'jigs byed zhe sdang chen pos 'dul bas na bzang po'o //
T02D1412:363a-8: snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang //
T02D1412:363a-9: gang phyir sems can don 'gyur bas //
T02D1412:363a-10: des na 'di ni bzang po ste //

T02D1412:367b-34: ba ni gos dmar po dang nag pos dkri bar
T02D1412:367b-35: bya'o // rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'o //

T02D1412:368a-33: tog gi tshom bu bkod la sku khrus gsol zhing
T02D1412:368a-34: bdag la dbang bskur bar bya'o //

T02D1412:368b-0: mo drug cu rtsa gnyis la mchod par @368b bya'o
T02D1412:368b-1: ; / de nas bsod nams bsags pa'i rjes gzugs
T02D1412:368b-2: sdu gu dang sgra snyan pa la sogs pa la

T02D1412:368b-4: mar reg bya bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:368b-5: rgyal mtshan dmar dang de bzhin ser //

T02D1412:368b-35: kyi thal bas byugs la legs par bsgril la dkyil

T02D1412:369a-0: @369a * // lha thams cad kyi sngags bzlas pa'i dri'i chus byugs
T02D1412:369a-1: pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo li ge dza: ser
T02D1412:369a-2: po mig la bkod pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba
T02D1412:369a-3: so sor snang bas dbus dang sgo gnas gang du

T02D1412:369a-8: // de'i lag par dza: dza: zhes bya bas thig
T02D1412:369a-9: skud gtad la slob dpon shar du kha bltas te

T02D1412:369a-12: slob dpon byang du kha bltas te tshangs pa'i thig gnyis pa gdab par bya'o //
T02D1412:369a-13: slob dpon me ru gnas nas byang du bltas te shar gyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1412:369a-14: slob dpon rlung du gnas nas lhor bltas te nub phyogs kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1412:369a-15: yang bskor nas de nyid du 'dug la shar du bltas nas byang du thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1412:369a-16: me'i phyogs su 'dug ste nub tu bltas te lho'i thig gdab par bya'o //

T02D1412:369a-25: nas gsum pa dang lnga pa la sgo khyud dang
T02D1412:369a-27: de ltar zur bzhi pa'i thig rdzogs nas bdud rtsi
T02D1412:369a-28: 'khyil ba'i phur bu stod khro bo la smad rdo
T02D1412:369a-29: rje rtse gcig pa dbus su btab la de la

T02D1412:369a-34: de'i phyi rol du gsung gi 'khor lo cha gsum ni padmas bskor la /

T02D1412:369b-18: ga bkang la dbang ldan gyi mtshams su tshon gyi
T02D1412:369b-19: pra brtags nas slob mas kyang ci bde bar bri
T02D1412:369b-20: bar bya'o // sngar bshad pa bzhin du 'khor lo
T02D1412:369b-21: lnga bkod la lha'i yig 'bru'am phyag mtshan nam sku
T02D1412:369b-22: phyag rgya chen por bkod de tshon sna lnga'i sa
T02D1412:369b-23: sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang
T02D1412:369b-24: gu dang dkar po'i rim pas bris la 'dod yon
T02D1412:369b-25: bar bya'o // gyis dmar po'o // rin chen pha gu dkar po /
T02D1412:369b-26: dra ba dra phyed kyis nag po'o //
T02D1412:369b-27: shar du rta babs rdo rjes mtshan pa /
T02D1412:369b-30: byang du sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rta babs bri bar bya'o //
T02D1412:369b-31: de'i logs brgyad du sngar bstan pa bzhin du dur khrod brgyad bri bar bya'o //
T02D1412:369b-32: de nas dgongs ka'i dus su dkyil 'khor gyi sa
T02D1412:369b-33: gzhi kun du dris nye bar byugs la bum pa
T02D1412:369b-34: la sogs pa'i rdzas thams cad bags te phur bu
T02D1412:369b-35: dang mda' la sogs pa bsrung ba'i rdzas rnams kyang
T02D1412:369b-36: bris te / rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgyas dkyil
T02D1412:369b-37: 'khor bslangs la so so'i snying pos lha rnams phab
T02D1412:369b-38: ste dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1412:369b-39: la phyag bya zhing khro bo'i bstod pas bstod de
T02D1412:369b-40: bris te / / bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis
T02D1412:369b-41: bgegs bsal nas lhag pa dang ma tshang ba kha
T02D1412:370a-0: bskang ba'i phyir yi ge bdun @370a * //
T02D1412:370a-1: zlos shing lan bdun bskor ba byas la /
T02D1412:370a-2: sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin du /
T02D1412:370a-3: gnas dang ldang ba nyid dang ni //
T02D1412:370a-4: 'jug dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
T02D1412:370a-5: byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang //
T02D1412:370a-6: ting 'dzin mchod pa nye bar bsdu //
T02D1412:370a-7: zhes bya ba'i bar du byas la /
T02D1412:370a-8: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod nas sbyin sreg dang gtor ma yang bya'o //
T02D1412:370a-9: rgyas pa ni yid 'ong phreng bar blta bar bya'o //
T02D1412:370a-10: le'u gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:370a-12: // / de ltar slob dpon gyi las rnams rdzogs nas /
T02D1412:370a-13: da ni slob ma 'jug pa dang /
T02D1412:370a-14: dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02D1412:370a-15: de nas sgrub pos dngos kun gyis //
T02D1412:370a-16: zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po ni lhag par gnas pa byas pa'i slob ma'o //
T02D1412:370a-17: dngos kun gyis zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'o //
T02D1412:370a-18: dang por slob dpon mnyes par bya //
T02D1412:370a-19: zhes bya ba ni slob dpon dang sgrub pa'i grogs
T02D1412:370a-20: po la 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas tshogs kyi 'khor
T02D1412:370a-21: lo bya'o // 'grub 'dod shin tu mnyam gzhag pas //
T02D1412:370a-22: zhes bya ba ni slob ma sems rtse gcig pa dang bdas pa'o //
T02D1412:370a-23: ci nus pas ni bla ma mchod //
T02D1412:370a-24: ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas ci 'byor ba'i tshogs kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02D1412:370a-25: de ltar thog mar slob dpon mnyes par byas nas
T02D1412:370a-26: slob dpon gyis sgrub pa'i cho ga bya ba yin
T02D1412:370a-27: te / dkyil 'khor bris pa'i nub mo de nyid
T02D1412:370a-28: gzugs rdo rje ma dang sgra rdo rje ma dang
T02D1412:370a-29: te / dri dang / ro dang reg bya rdo
T02D1412:370a-30: rje ma rnams kyis dkyil 'khor mchod par byas nas
T02D1412:370a-31: slob ma dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1412:370a-32: de yang ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1412:370a-33: dril sbyangs me tog spos kyis brgyan //
T02D1412:370a-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i gzugs kyis mchod pa bya ba'am /
T02D1412:370a-35: yang na snga ma de nyid slob dpon gyis las
T02D1412:370a-36: byas nas phyi de nyin slob ma 'jug par 'dod
T02D1412:370a-37: pas / gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs //
T02D1412:370a-38: shes rab yan lag phur bu 'dra //
T02D1412:370a-40: shes rab kyi yan lag dang bcas pas bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D1412:370a-41: bcu gnyis ma dang bcu drug ma dang nyi shu
T02D1412:370b-0: ma'i las kyi phyag rgya dang bcas @370b pas tshad
T02D1412:370b-1: med pa dang / byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1412:370b-2: bsrung ba dang stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang
T02D1412:370b-3: dang por sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang
T02D1412:370b-4: las kyi rgyal mchog bsgoms la slob ma la dbang
T02D1412:370b-5: bskur bar bya'o // de yang ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1412:370b-6: dril sbyangs zhes bya ba ste dge bsten gyi sdom pa dang /
T02D1412:370b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa byin nas sngags kyi
T02D1412:370b-8: lhar bskyed pa ni sbyangs pa'i lus lha mo bcu
T02D1412:370b-9: drug gi gnas su dri'i thig le byas te /
T02D1412:370b-10: me tog sum cu rtsa drug bkod la spos kyis
T02D1412:370b-11: bdugs shing lus kyi 'khor lo'i lha yis brgyan par
T02D1412:370b-12: bya'o // shin tu sgra snyan zhes bya ba ni
T02D1412:370b-13: lo bcu drug ma ste gzugs yid du 'ong sgra
T02D1412:370b-14: snyan pa dri zhim po dang ro dang reg bya
T02D1412:370b-15: yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pas nye bar me
T02D1412:370b-16: tshon pas na sgra snyan zhes bya'o //
T02D1412:370b-17: dril bu dkrol zhes bya ba ni aa wa dh'u t'i'i rtsa'i ming yin no //
T02D1412:370b-18: sgrub pa po yis rnga brdung zhing //
T02D1412:370b-19: zhes bya ba ni nyi shu ma ste longs spyod pa'i gzhir gyur pa'o //
T02D1412:370b-20: de rnams dang bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang zag med kyi bde ba skye bar bya'o //
T02D1412:370b-21: bying rmugs dang rgod pa byung na gnyen pos bzlog pa bzhin du dga' bral bu gyur na /
T02D1412:370b-22: ha ha zhes ni brjod par bya //
T02D1412:370b-23: zhes bya ba ste rlung gi 'khrul 'khor gyen du bzlog pa'i thabs yin no //
T02D1412:370b-24: de ltar bsgrubs zin pa'i rjes la slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga bstan pa ni /
T02D1412:370b-25: de ltar cho ga bzhin bzhin dkyil 'khor //
T02D1412:370b-27: cho ga bzhin du lha drug cu rtsa gnyis bsgom pa'o //
T02D1412:370b-28: dkyil 'khor la 'dod pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya'o //
T02D1412:370b-29: rdo rje slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi nang na gnas
T02D1412:370b-30: bzhin du las kyi slob dpon gyis slob ma yol
T02D1412:370b-31: ba'i rgyab tu yi ge bdun pa bzlas pa'i smad
T02D1412:370b-32: g-yogs dang ; h'um mdzad bzlas pa'i stod g-yogs dang /
T02D1412:370b-33: sgo ba bzhi bzlas pa'i gdong g-yogs dang /
T02D1412:370b-34: rdo rje gtsug tor bzlas pa'i ze'u ka bcings la
T02D1412:370b-35: snyim pa me tog gis bkang nas yol ba'i nang
T02D1412:370b-36: du bcug ste ka stam bho zhes dri bar bya'o
T02D1412:371a-0: // slob mas skal ba dang ldan pa bdag @371a * //
T02D1412:371a-1: lags so zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1412:371a-2: de nas bdun rnam par dag pa byas la sdom
T02D1412:371a-3: pa bzung nas snying gar rdo rje bzhag nas byang
T02D1412:371a-4: chub tu sems bskyed de dpa' bo gcig pu'i lhar
T02D1412:371a-5: bskyed nas mchod de phyi rol gyi bum pa'i chus
T02D1412:371a-7: de nas bskor ba byas nas kyang //
T02D1412:371a-8: zhes pas nang gi 'jug pa ston te lag na
T02D1412:371a-9: rdo rje thogs pa'i slob mas k'a k'a s+ye h'um
T02D1412:371a-10: dza: zhes bya bas shar phyogs kyi sgo nas 'dug
T02D1412:371a-11: pa dang / de nas bskor la byang phyogs kyi
T02D1412:371a-12: sgo nas au l'u k'a s+ye h'um zhes pas gzhug
T02D1412:371a-13: pa dang / pa dang / de nas bskor la
T02D1412:371a-14: nub phyogs kyi sgo nas aom shva n'a s+ye pham
T02D1412:371a-16: de nas bskor te lho phyogs kyi sgo nas aom
T02D1412:371a-17: s'u ka r'a s+ye ho zhes pas dbang du bya
T02D1412:371a-18: ba'o // de nas yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas
T02D1412:371a-19: bcug la a'a kham b'i ra ho zhes smras nas
T02D1412:371a-20: slob ma nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D1412:371a-21: zhugs so zhes brjod du gzhug go //
T02D1412:371a-22: de nas lha'i dam tshig bsgrags pa dang slob dpon gyi dam tshig bsgrags pa ni /
T02D1412:371a-23: kyang zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
T02D1412:371a-24: de'i rjes la ye shes da bab pa ni /
T02D1412:371a-25: slob dpon shin tu mnyam gzhag pas //
T02D1412:371a-27: slob dpon shin tu sems rtse gcig pas sgo dbye
T02D1412:371a-28: ba'i phyag rgyas slob ma'i snying ga dang rang gi
T02D1412:371a-29: snying ga phye nas rang gi snying ga'i zag pa
T02D1412:371a-30: med pa'i rdo rje slob ma'i snying gar bcug la
T02D1412:371a-31: / lus kyi 'khrul 'khor dang ngag dang sems kyi 'khrul 'khor dang /
T02D1412:371a-32: rdzas kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis dbab par bya'o //
T02D1412:371a-33: ma babs na dbang bskur bar mi bya'o //
T02D1412:371a-34: grong khyer dam pa der gzhug bya //
T02D1412:371a-35: zhes bya ba ni sbrul pa'i sku'i ye shes kyi lha de mthong bar gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1412:371a-36: ye shes babs nas sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa mthong bar gyur pa yin no //
T02D1412:371a-37: de ltar gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa ston pa ni ;
T02D1412:371a-38: / lho'i phyogs su bsten nas su /
T02D1412:371a-39: zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi g-yon ngos nas 'jug pa yin no //
T02D1412:371a-40: de la snyim pa me tog dor //
T02D1412:371a-41: zhes bya ba ni pra t'i tstsha ho zhes bya bas dor bar bya'o //
T02D1412:371a-42: gang gi steng du babs pa de blangs la pra
T02D1412:371a-43: ti gri hana stvam ai mam satva ma h'a ba
T02D1412:371b-0: la zhes bya bas bcing bar @371b bya'o //
T02D1412:371b-1: de nas gdong g-yogs bkrol zhing de la rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha bstan par bya'o //
T02D1412:371b-2: de ltar phyi'i 'jug pa lnga dang nang gi 'jug
T02D1412:371b-3: pa brgyad byas nas de'i rjes la dbang bskur bar
T02D1412:371b-4: bya'o // de nas slob dpon legs par ni //
T02D1412:371b-5: mnyam par gzhag ste phyag rgyas mchod //
T02D1412:371b-6: ces pa ni aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa
T02D1412:371b-7: nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko&
T02D1412:371b-8: ham zhes bya bas rjes su chags pa'i ting nge
T02D1412:371b-9: 'dzin bsgoms te / rdo rje dang padma byin gyis
T02D1412:371b-10: brlabs nas slob ma'i kha nas bcug nas slob ma
T02D1412:371b-11: yum gyi mkha' gsang nas bton nas dpa' bo gcig
T02D1412:371b-12: pu yab yum du bskyed de ye shes sems dpa'
T02D1412:371b-13: bcug nas go cha bskon nas chu dang cod pan
T02D1412:371b-14: dang rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming dang rdo
T02D1412:371b-15: rje brtul zhugs dang phyag mtshan gyi brtul zhugs dang
T02D1412:371b-16: 'dzin bsgoms te / / sngags kyi brtul zhugs dang mchod pa lnga'i brtul zhugs sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1412:371b-17: de nas slob ma phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1412:371b-19: rdo rje slob dpon smad pa dang //
T02D1412:371b-20: zhes bya ba bcu la sogs pa phas pham pa
T02D1412:371b-21: bcu bzhi byin nas seng ge'i khri'i kha la bzhag
T02D1412:371b-22: ste / lha drug cu rtsa gnyis lus la bskyed
T02D1412:371b-23: de ye shes sems dpa' bcug pa dang go cha
T02D1412:371b-24: bskon la phyir mi ldog pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D1412:371b-25: gum pas snga ma bzhin du chu dang cod pan
T02D1412:371b-26: dang rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming dang mig
T02D1412:371b-27: dbye ba spangs pa dang me long bstan pa dang
T02D1412:371b-28: ye shes dang mda' gzhu gtad pas sprul pa 'gyed
T02D1412:371b-29: ste / pa'i sku dang / dril bu gsung dang ;
T02D1412:371b-30: yang me long bstan pas thugs dang /
T02D1412:371b-31: rgyud thams cad kyi rjes su gnang ba rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D1412:371b-32: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs dang /
T02D1412:371b-36: rjes su gnang ba byin pa dang /
T02D1412:371b-37: yan lag bcu dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1412:371b-38: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor la bum pa'i dbang bskur ba ni mnyam par gzhag pa ste /
T02D1412:371b-39: phyag rgya mchod ces bya ba ni mdor bshad pa yin no //
T02D1412:371b-40: da ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor la gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ni /
T02D1412:371b-41: de nas slob ma phyi de nyin //
T02D1412:372a-0: @372a * // zhes bya ba smos te rdul tshon gyi lha gshegs
T02D1412:372a-1: su gsol nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo la dbye ste
T02D1412:372a-2: / gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i gsol ba slob mas btab nas /
T02D1412:372a-3: khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya //
T02D1412:372a-4: zhes bya ba'i sdom pa bzhi phog nas rgyud kyi
T02D1412:372a-5: rim pa dang sngags kyi rim pa dang ye shes
T02D1412:372a-6: kyi rim pa sgom du bcug nas /
T02D1412:372a-7: mtshal chen lan gsum bzlas pa yi //
T02D1412:372a-8: de la thig le bya ba yin //
T02D1412:372a-9: zhes bya ba ni gnas gsum du bdud rtsi lnga'i dri'i thig le byas la /
T02D1412:372a-10: mtshal chen dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems slob
T02D1412:372a-11: mas rdo rje'i rtse mo las sam padma'i rtse mo
T02D1412:372a-12: las srin lag gis sam dung chos las blang bar
T02D1412:372a-13: bya'o // slob dpon gyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1412:372a-14: zhal nas zhu ba'i thig le slob ma'i lce la
T02D1412:372a-15: phab nas ro rdo rje ma la dga' ba gsum
T02D1412:372a-16: gyi ting nge 'dzin bskyed pas bsam gtan gyi sdom
T02D1412:372a-17: bya'o // pa dang / bzhi pa ro'i stong pa
T02D1412:372a-18: nyid shes pas zag pa med pa'i sdom pa bskyed
T02D1412:372a-19: nas ngo mtshar bde ba che zhes ched du brjod
T02D1412:372a-20: pa ched du brjod gzhug go //
T02D1412:372a-21: de nas de'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo byas la dkyil
T02D1412:372a-22: 'khor bha ga la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang
T02D1412:372a-23: bskur bar bya'o // pha ma'i thabs dang shes rab
T02D1412:372a-24: las sgyu ma lta bu'i lhar bskyed pas zla ba
T02D1412:372a-25: bskur bar bya'o // sa bcu dang / aa ham 'don pa sngags dang /
T02D1412:372a-27: thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D1412:372a-28: rgyu rkyen gyi tshogs pa las lhar bskyed do zhes
T02D1412:372a-29: me long gi gzugs brnyan bstan nas shes rab kyi
T02D1412:372a-30: dbang bskur ba'i gsol ba 'debs su bcug la /
T02D1412:372a-31: bla ma dang shes rab kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas sdom pa dag kyang mnos te /
T02D1412:372a-32: de yang bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyangs pa'i rdzas dang me
T02D1412:372a-33: tog gi thig les brgyan pa'i las kyi phyag rgya
T02D1412:372a-34: dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i ched du gtad la 'byung
T02D1412:372a-35: ba bzhi'i dbus ma nam mkha'i rtsa dang reg par
T02D1412:372a-36: gyur pas reg bya stong pa nyid kyi ting nge
T02D1412:372a-37: 'dzin rtogs pa ni gdong phye dkyil 'khor bstan zhes
T02D1412:372a-39: gang gi lha gnas gang yin pa //
T02D1412:372a-40: zhes bya ba ni bde ba stong nyid zag med ni lha yin la /
T02D1412:372b-0: de'i gnas ni dud can dang padma can dang ri @372b dags can no //
T02D1412:372b-1: der de yang dag bstan par bya //
T02D1412:372b-2: zhes bya ba ni slob ma de bde ba stong
T02D1412:372b-3: pa nyid kyi tshogs pa de slob dpon gyi mngon
T02D1412:372b-4: sum gyi gzhan don gyi man ngag gis slob ma
T02D1412:372b-5: la nges pa skyes pa ni yang dag par bstan
T02D1412:372b-6: pa'o // slob ma shes rab ye shes kyi dbang
T02D1412:372b-7: bskur ba'i rjes la zhi gnas kyi sgo mo brgyad
T02D1412:372b-8: khri bzhi stong gi sgo nas lhag mthong stong pa
T02D1412:372b-9: nyid brgyad khri bzhi stong gi mngon sum gyi lam
T02D1412:372b-10: ston cing zhes brjod du gnang ba sbyin par bya'o
T02D1412:372b-11: pa'o // // de nas nyi ma 'char kar slob dpon la yon dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1412:372b-12: de nas phyag 'tshal ba dang bskor ba byas la
T02D1412:372b-13: dkyil 'khor bha ga dang bla ma slob dpon la
T02D1412:372b-14: sngags dang phyag rgya'i cho gas phyag bya'o //
T02D1412:372b-15: de nas bla ma dag la yon //
T02D1412:372b-16: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D1412:372b-17: de ltar nges par bya ba ni /
T02D1412:372b-18: sgrub pa po yis rab mnyes bya //
T02D1412:372b-19: zhes pa dbang bskur ba nges par thob pa'i rjes thogs la nges par yon dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1412:372b-20: de nas dbang bskur ba'i phan yon bstan pa ni //
T02D1412:372b-21: de nas de la mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1412:372b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:372b-23: mkha' 'gro ma sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D1412:372b-24: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ye shes kyi lha mo bzhi dang /
T02D1412:372b-25: sgrub pa po lhan cig tu dga' ba bzhi'i ting
T02D1412:372b-26: nge 'dzin spyod pas 'gro ba thams cad zil gyis
T02D1412:372b-28: phan yon gnyis pa ni dbang bskur ba khyad par
T02D1412:372b-29: can 'di grub na 'jig rten gsum po thams cad
T02D1412:372b-30: kyi bar chad bya bar mi zlos shing mi snang
T02D1412:372b-31: ba dang / sa 'og tu 'gro ba dang /
T02D1412:372b-32: nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang /
T02D1412:372b-33: rkang mgyogs dang bcud len la sogs pa rnal 'byor
T02D1412:372b-34: pa 'dod pa tsam gyis dus thams cad du skye
T02D1412:372b-35: bar 'gyur ro // phan yon gsum pa ni gzugs du ma byed pa dang /

T02D1412:379a-40: yang na rkang pa brgyad pa'i 'khrul 'khor bya ste /
