T02D1412:379a-42: ras dkar po la bris la phyi rol nas 'khor
T02D1412:379a-43: lo gsum gyis bskor zhing dug dang lan tshva dang
T02D1412:379a-44: / ske tshe dang tsha ba gsum dang dur khrod
T02D1412:379a-45: kyi sol bas snag tsha byas nas dpa' bo dang
T02D1412:379a-46: dpa' mo thams cad kyi sngags bris la klu brgyad
T02D1412:379a-47: kyi snying gar h'um n'am h'um zhes bya ba dang
T02D1412:379a-48: / / lte bar bcom ldan 'das kyi skyin par
T02D1412:379a-49: h'um n'am h'um sarba n'a ga barsha ma na yashthi
T02D1412:379b-0: sh'i ghram phat ces bya @379b pa bris pa'i 'khrul
T02D1412:379b-1: 'khor grog mkhar gyi sa dang ba'i rnam lnga bsres
T02D1412:379b-2: pa las nor rgyas kyi gzugs gdengs ka bdun dang
T02D1412:379b-3: ldan pa mtho gang gi tshad tsam byas la de'i
T02D1412:379b-5: dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga byas nas ka
T02D1412:379b-6: ra b'i ra'i lcug mas bkab ste gu gul gyi
T02D1412:379b-7: dud pas bdug cing rgyun mi 'chad par chu'i khrus
T02D1412:379b-8: bya'o // de ltar byas na char 'bab par 'gyur
T02D1412:379b-9: ba dang ma babs na nyi ma bdun pa la
T02D1412:379b-10: lus dum bur byas nas bum par bcug nas chu
T02D1412:379b-11: bor bsgyur na char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:379b-12: zlog par byed na snga ma bzhin du 'khrul 'khor
T02D1412:379b-13: bris la nor rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar
T02D1412:379b-14: bcug ste yungs kar gyis brdegs pa'am /
T02D1412:379b-15: yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa la phul pa'i me
T02D1412:379b-16: tog rnying pa gu gul dang bsres pa'i bdug pas
T02D1412:379b-17: rtsa ba'i sngags zlos shing nam mkha' la bdugs na
T02D1412:379b-19: rgya mtsho skems par byed do zhes bya ba klu
T02D1412:379b-20: brgyad gnon pa'i zhal lnga pa mkha' lding gi he
T02D1412:379b-21: ru ka bsgoms na mtshan ma byung ba dang /
T02D1412:379b-22: rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su 'dug par bsams la
T02D1412:379b-23: nyi ma bcu gnyis kyi gzi brjid dang ldan pas
T02D1412:379b-24: gdon mi za bar skems par byed do //
T02D1412:379b-25: kha tv'am ga'i thod pa la padma 'dab ma brgyad
T02D1412:379b-26: pa re re zhing rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags bris
T02D1412:379b-27: la chu bo la kha tv'am gas bsnun na rgyun
T02D1412:379b-28: phyogs las zlog par byed do //
T02D1412:379b-29: dpa' bo zlog par byed do zhes bya ba ni
T02D1412:379b-30: thog babs pa ste lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil du
T02D1412:379b-31: rkang pa brgyad pa'i 'khrul 'khor bsgoms nas sdigs mdzub
T02D1412:379b-32: byas na rdo rje'i thog zlog par byed do //
T02D1412:379b-33: sa g-yo ba zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das zhal bzhi pa /
T02D1412:379b-34: phyag bcu gnyis pa bsgoms nas tri sh'u la rtse
T02D1412:379b-35: gsum pa sa la bsnun na g-yo bar byed do
T02D1412:379b-36: // shing la 'dzegs te gang du 'dod pa der
T02D1412:379b-37: 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sngon du
T02D1412:379b-38: bsnyen pas mtshan ma thob pa dang rkang pa brgyad
T02D1412:379b-39: pa'i 'khru 'khor rkang pa gnyis la bsgoms te /
T02D1412:379b-40: nam mkha' la skas gdang gi phreng ba yod par bsgoms nas 'dzegs na gar 'dod pa der 'gro'o //
T02D1412:379b-41: sngags 'phrog par byed ces pa ni rang la byad
T02D1412:380a-0: byed pa'i sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi steng du @380a
T02D1412:380a-1: * // rkang pa brgyad pa'i 'khrul 'khor dug dang khrag dang /
T02D1412:380a-2: lan tshva dang ske tshes bris la mnan nas ri
T02D1412:380a-3: rab dang gser gyi sa gzhis kyang mnan na sngags
T02D1412:380a-5: dngos grub thams cad 'phrog pa ni sngar bsnyen pa 'bum byas la mtshan ma thob pa dang ;
T02D1412:380a-6: dngos grub 'dod pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la de'i snying
T02D1412:380a-7: gar rkang pa brgyad pa'i 'khrul 'khor bcug nas sbyin
T02D1412:380a-8: sreg bya ba'am chu bor dor ba 'am sa 'og
T02D1412:380a-10: khrag 'dren par byed na zhes bya ba ni spra
T02D1412:380a-11: tshil gyi lingga sor brgyad pa byas la de'i snying
T02D1412:380a-12: gar rkang pa brgyad pa'i 'khrul 'khor khrag dang bcas
T02D1412:380a-13: pa gzhug par bya zhing gsar ba'i gnas su zangs
T02D1412:380a-14: ma'i mo khab btsugs na khrag 'dren par byed do
T02D1412:380a-15: // slar 'o mas bkrus na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:380a-16: gzugs brgya stong phrag du mar byed do zhes bya
T02D1412:380a-17: ba ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro las sman gyi rgyud
T02D1412:380a-19: mi'i thod par ae randa dang smyo byed kyi sa
T02D1412:380a-20: bon btab la bkang ste bskyed nas smin pa dang
T02D1412:380a-21: mar gyi ngo'i nyi shu dgu la dmangs rigs kyi
T02D1412:380a-22: bud med kyi khrag dang bdud rtsi lngas de'i 'bras
T02D1412:380a-23: bu smin pa na bsgos te /
T02D1412:380a-24: srog chags gang yang rung ba'i spu dang skud pa
T02D1412:380a-25: byas la srog chags de'i mgul du btags na de'i
T02D1412:380a-27: 'dod na snang bar 'gyur zhing mi 'dod na mi
T02D1412:380a-28: snang bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gser shing
T02D1412:380a-29: gi sa bon blangs la nyi shu dgu la khra'i
T02D1412:380a-30: thod pa'i nang du sbrul nag po'i zhag gis bsgos
T02D1412:380a-31: te bskyed la smin pa dang blangs la gang gi
T02D1412:380a-32: mgul du bcings na de mi snang bar 'gyur zhing
T02D1412:380a-34: khang bzangs dang shing gi rtse mo la sogs pa
T02D1412:380a-35: phye mar byed do zhes bya ba ni zhal bzhi
T02D1412:380a-36: phyag bcu gnyis pa'i bde mchog bsgoms nas dgra sta
T02D1412:380a-37: la yi ge rkang pa brgyad pa'i 'khrul 'khor bris
T02D1412:380a-38: te bsnun na phye mar 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:380a-39: dug bdud rtsir byed pa ni lag pa g-yon pa'i
T02D1412:380a-40: mthil du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rkang
T02D1412:380a-41: pa brgyad pa'i 'khor lo bkod nas sna bug g-yon
T02D1412:380a-42: pa'i rlung gi sreg na dgu bdud rtsir byed do
T02D1412:380a-43: // bdud rtsi drug tu byed pa ni sgyur ba'am
T02D1412:380b-0: kha @380b ba'i sa bon blangs nas sbrul nag po'i
T02D1412:380b-1: zhag gis byugs te gza' mig dmar gyi zhag la
T02D1412:380b-2: lam gyi bzhi mdor sbrul gyi thod pa yang bkang
T02D1412:380b-3: ste bskyed la de'i khu bas dpral bar thig le
T02D1412:380b-4: byas na bza' btung la bltas pa tsam gyis dug
T02D1412:380b-5: // tu 'gyur ro // zla ba chur byed pa
T02D1412:380b-6: ni sman aarka'i me sbar la padma'i snal ma'i phye
T02D1412:380b-7: ma dang 'o mas lan mang du byugs te sbyin
T02D1412:380b-8: sreg phul ba'i thal bas tsitra ka'i khu ba dang
T02D1412:380b-9: sprus te ri lu grib ma la bskams te sog
T02D1412:380b-10: ma'i nang du bcug la chang gi snod du blugs
T02D1412:380b-11: na 'o ma lta bu'i kha dog tu 'gyur ro
T02D1412:380b-12: // tu 'gyur ro // // ku su ma'i phye
T02D1412:380b-13: ma dang 'dzam bu ra'i 'bras bu'i khu ba dang
T02D1412:380b-14: 'o ma'i nang du blugs na chang 'dra bar 'gyur
T02D1412:380b-16: pa ni tsher ma dang bcas pa'i shing ka ranydza'i
T02D1412:380b-17: phye ma dang na rang ga'i shun pa'i phye ma
T02D1412:380b-18: dang bsres pa'i phye mas bdugs na dri 'phrog par
T02D1412:380b-20: // gang du 'dod pa der thob par byed do
T02D1412:380b-21: zhes bya ba ni ka ranydza dang na rang ga'i
T02D1412:380b-22: phye mas gu gul dang bsres pas gla rtsi la
T02D1412:380b-23: bdugs na gu gul gyi dri bro bar 'gyur ro
T02D1412:380b-25: // // gla rtsi dang bsres pas gu gul la
T02D1412:380b-26: bdugs na gla rtsi'i dri bro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:380b-27: nam mkha' lding gi mdog gis 'gro ba 'byin par byed //
T02D1412:380b-28: ces bya ba ni yantra dang tantra spangs pa'i ting
T02D1412:380b-29: nge 'dzin thams cad brtan pa yin te nam mkha'
T02D1412:380b-30: lding gi mdog ni gsang ba'i rdo rje'o //
T02D1412:380b-31: 'gro ba 'byin pa ni khu ba gyen du bzlog pa'o //
T02D1412:380b-32: shi ba'i dus kyi lha mo dang kun spyod //
T02D1412:380b-33: ces bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems mi nyams pa'i bde ba thob pa'o //
T02D1412:380b-34: de ltar bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1412:380b-35: thob na mi'i mchog de'i dngos grub snga ma thams
T02D1412:380b-36: cad kyi dpal sus kyang 'phrog par mi nus so
T02D1412:380b-37: // rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i dngos
T02D1412:380b-38: grub ces bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems dga'
T02D1412:380b-39: bral du mi gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod na
T02D1412:380b-40: dngos grub thams cad 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur
T02D1412:380b-41: // ro // dran pa tsam gyis gsod par byed
T02D1412:380b-42: de zhes bya ba ni ras sam shing shun la
T02D1412:380b-43: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rkang pa brgyad
T02D1412:380b-44: pa'i 'khrul 'khor bris la dur khrod kyi thal ba
T02D1412:380b-45: dang sol ba las gzugs brnyan byas te /
T02D1412:381a-0: snying gar bcug nas bsgrub bya bkug @381a * //
T02D1412:381a-1: cing mi rus kyi phur bus snying gar btab nas
T02D1412:381a-2: chu tshan blugs te dur khrod kyi sar sbas na
T02D1412:381a-3: nyi ma bdun gyis gsod par byed do //
T02D1412:381a-4: spra tshil gyi dbus su mu zi dang me shel
T02D1412:381a-5: bcug la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas dkris te lan
T02D1412:381a-6: stong phrag gcig tu bskor nas 'phangs na gnas der
T02D1412:381a-8: sa bon rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D1412:381a-9: til gyi mar gyis bskus la rdo rje rtse gcig
T02D1412:381a-10: pa la rkang pa brgyad pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
T02D1412:381a-11: nas bsnun na 'joms par byed do //
T02D1412:381a-12: ser ba 'beb [*bebs] pa ni sgra gcan 'dzin rgyu
T02D1412:381a-13: ba'i dus su rkang pa brgyad pa stong rtsa brgyad
T02D1412:381a-14: bzlas pa'i khrag gi thod pa me la blugs na
T02D1412:381a-16: mdung rtse gsum pa la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas
T02D1412:381a-17: spyi bo la bskor na ser bzlog par byed do
T02D1412:381a-18: // lha thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gar byed du
T02D1412:381a-19: gzhug pa ni rkang pa brgyad pa'i 'khrul 'khor lha
T02D1412:381a-20: rnams kyi snying gar bcug la 'od ma'i gzhu la
T02D1412:381a-21: ka ra b'i ra'i lcug ma'i mda' mtshal chen gyis
T02D1412:381a-22: bskus la thugs kar 'phangs na lha'i gzugs brnyan gar
T02D1412:381a-24: thod pa sha med par btogs pa la srin lag
T02D1412:381a-25: g-yon pa'i khrag gis gzugs brnyan bris la gang gi
T02D1412:381a-26: ming dang spel ba de'i snying gar 'khrul 'khor bris
T02D1412:381a-27: la ming nas bzung ste lan re zhing rkang pa
T02D1412:381a-28: brgyad pa dang spel nas bzlas shing khrag dang mnyes
T02D1412:381a-30: sa ma lus pa rnams la longs spyod ces bya
T02D1412:381a-31: ba ni ba lang gi sha dang bcas pa la
T02D1412:381a-32: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad zlos shing
T02D1412:381a-33: sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro
T02D1412:381a-34: // 'dod na sdud par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni
T02D1412:381a-35: 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyis skyon zhi ba'i sbyin sreg
T02D1412:381a-36: gis rgyal srid kyi g-yeng ba sdud par 'gyur ro
T02D1412:381a-37: // // de la spyod pa ji lta bus bya zhe na /
T02D1412:381a-38: bcom ldan 'das kyi rkang pa brgyad pa 'di zlos pa'i tshe brtul zhugs mi dgos spyod pa dang /
T02D1412:381a-39: smyung ba mi dgos cho ga thams cad ci bde bas las byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:381a-40: gal te khros pas lan cig bzlas pas 'tsho bar
T02D1412:381a-41: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dur khrod kyi ras
T02D1412:381a-42: la mi rus kyi smyu gus dug dang dur khrod
T02D1412:381a-43: kyi sol ba'i khu bas 'khrul 'khor bris la dbus
T02D1412:381b-0: su m'a ra ya phat ces bya ba @381b bri
T02D1412:381b-1: bar bya'o // de nas bsnyen pa 'bum byas la dug dang khrag dang ske tshe dang /
T02D1412:381b-2: lan tshva dang yungs kar dang rkang rjes dang bsres
T02D1412:381b-3: pa las byas pa'i lingga'i snying gar bcug nas las
T02D1412:381b-4: la sbyar ba'i tshe lan cig bzlas na 'chi bar
T02D1412:381b-5: 'gyur zhing / 'o mas bkrus na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:381b-6: dur khrod kyi sol ba la lan cig bzlas pa
T02D1412:381b-7: byas zhes bya ba ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang
T02D1412:381b-8: dgu la ro bsregs pa'i me la shing aarka bsregs
T02D1412:381b-9: la da du ra'i khu bas me bsad la dug
T02D1412:381b-10: dang lan tshva dang bcas pa'i sol ba'i khu ba
T02D1412:381b-11: mi rus kyi smyu gus nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor kyi
T02D1412:381b-12: dbus su rkang pa brgyad pa'i 'khrul 'khor bris la
T02D1412:381b-13: dur khrod kyi thal ba las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan
T02D1412:381b-14: sor brgyad pa'i snying gar ming dang spel ba'i 'khrul
T02D1412:381b-15: 'khor bcug nas dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas
T02D1412:381b-16: gu gul gyis bdug cing dur khrod kyi sol ba'i
T02D1412:381b-17: sta re byas te lingga gtubs na de'i mod la
T02D1412:381b-19: dur khrod kyi thal ba la sngags bzlas te bsnun
T02D1412:381b-20: na de'i mod la sha zas gzung bar 'gyur ro
T02D1412:381b-21: // dur khrod kyi sol ba la sngags lan cig
T02D1412:381b-22: bzlas nas zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'i shing
T02D1412:381b-23: aarka'i thal ba nyi shu rtsa dgu'i mtshan mo spang
T02D1412:381b-24: leb bam rtsig pa la gza' chen po brgyad bris
T02D1412:381b-25: la snying ga'i dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel
T02D1412:381b-26: ba'i 'khrul 'khor bcug la bdud rtsi lnga'i dud pas
T02D1412:381b-27: bdug cing sngags bzlas na gza' chen po brgyad kyis
T02D1412:381b-28: gdon mi za bar gzung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:381b-29: 'o mas bkrus na slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:381b-30: aa ti mukta ka'i lcug ma la lan cig bzlas
T02D1412:381b-31: pa zhes bya ba ni tsandan dmar po'i ri lu
T02D1412:381b-32: byas pa'i bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar dur
T02D1412:381b-33: khrod kyi ras la ro'i sen rtsi dang gi wang
T02D1412:381b-34: gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'khrul 'khor
T02D1412:381b-35: bris la bcug nas dgug pa la sogs pa byas
T02D1412:381b-36: te dri'i chus sku khrus gsol zhing aa ti mukta
T02D1412:381b-37: ka'i lcug ma la sngags lan bdun bzlas te bsnun
T02D1412:381b-38: par bya'o // bsnun pa'i tshe bsgom par bya ba
T02D1412:381b-39: ni gcer bu skra grol ba byang chub kyi sems
T02D1412:381b-40: 'bab cing kha dog nyams shing 'jigs pas brgyal ba
T02D1412:382a-1: 'khor gyi steng du rnga mo la bskyon nas rang
T02D1412:382a-2: gi rkang pa'i drung du ltung bar bsam par bya'o
T02D1412:382a-3: // gseg ma la lan cig bzlas te zhes bya
T02D1412:382a-4: ba ni mi'i thod pa'i dum bu la ba bla
T02D1412:382a-5: dang yung bas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i
T02D1412:382a-6: 'khrul 'khor ming dang spel ba bris te dur khrod
T02D1412:382a-7: dam lam gyi bzhi mdor khru gang tsam brkos te
T02D1412:382a-8: sba zhing kha spub la gseg ma la sngags bzlas
T02D1412:382a-9: shing gang la 'debs pa de rengs par 'gyur ro
T02D1412:382a-10: // // gang du lding ba der 'gro bar 'gyur
T02D1412:382a-11: ro zhes bya ba ni tshub mas khyer ba'i shing

T02D1412:382a-13: gi sgro'i smyu gu byas la 'khrul 'khor bris te
T02D1412:382a-14: tshub ma chen po gyen du ldang ba la bskur
T02D1412:382a-15: na bskrad pa'i gnas der 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:382a-16: gu gul chen pos bdugs na zhes bya ba ni
T02D1412:382a-17: ra thug gi rva dang rmig pa bzhi dang mi'i
T02D1412:382a-18: tshil dang bshad pa cha mnyam la chang gis sbrus
T02D1412:382a-19: te ; dud pas bdugs na sems can thams cad la mkha' 'gro ma 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:382a-20: lag pa g-yon pas chang bkab la g-yon pa'i srin
T02D1412:382a-21: lag khar bcug nas tshigs gsum gyi gnas su lces
T02D1412:382a-22: reg cing gzhi bas na dus su zin pa'i dug
T02D1412:382a-24: mkha' 'gro mas rgyas btab pa la zhes bya ba
T02D1412:382a-25: dur khrod kyi ras la shing aa ti mukta ka'i
T02D1412:382a-26: smyu gus sngar bshad pa'i 'khrul 'khor bris te lte
T02D1412:382a-27: ba'i dbus su ae gru gsum bris la zur gsum
T02D1412:382a-28: du aa ma h'um gsum dang dbus su raksha zhes
T02D1412:382a-29: bya ba bzhin ming dang spel ba bris te bsgrub
T02D1412:382a-31: chu la rkang pa brgyad pa bzlas shing gdon gyi
T02D1412:382a-32: gzugs brnyan byas pa'i snying gar gdon gyi ming bcug
T02D1412:382a-33: la chus yang dang yang du bsnun zhing slar gtor
T02D1412:382a-35: ka ra b'i ra'i lcug ma zhes bya ba ni
T02D1412:382a-36: dur khrod kyi ras la bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel
T02D1412:382a-37: ba'i 'khrul 'khor bris la bud med kyi ro bsregs
T02D1412:382a-38: pa'i thal ba dang tsandan dmar po'i rdul dang bsres
T02D1412:382a-39: pa'i bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar bcug ste
T02D1412:382a-40: ka ra b'i ra'i lcug ma khru do yod pa
T02D1412:382a-41: dur khrod kyi me la gdungs nas slar yang blangs
T02D1412:382b-0: te spyi bo la bskor @382b zhing snga ma'i gzugs
T02D1412:382b-1: brnyan gyi lte bar bsnun na mngal gang du 'dod
T02D1412:382b-3: de la 'khrul 'khor ni 'di yin te ae gru
T02D1412:382b-4: gsum gyi dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bris la
T02D1412:382b-5: / de'i steng du 'khor lo gsum bris te lte bar sna tshogs rdo rje //
T02D1412:382b-6: de'i lte bar padma 'dab ma brgyad pa de'i lte
T02D1412:382b-7: bar bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bon h'um dang yum
T02D1412:382b-8: gyi sa bon bam padma 'dab ma brgyad la rkang
T02D1412:382b-9: pa brgyad pa'i sngags bris la 'khor lo gsum la
T02D1412:382b-10: rang gi lha'i snying po bris la rdo rje dang
T02D1412:382b-11: padma dang 'khor los bskor ba dang sgo dang mtshams
T02D1412:382b-12: su mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po dang dur khrod brgyad
T02D1412:382b-13: kyi gnas su rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags dang rdo
T02D1412:382b-14: rje ra ba dang me 'od kyi bar du ka
T02D1412:382b-15: ra b'i ra'i sngags bri bar bya'o //
T02D1412:382b-16: dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming zhi ba dang rgyas pa
T02D1412:382b-17: la sogs pa dang spel ba'i ming la las bcu
T02D1412:382b-19: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa re mig brgyad du byas
T02D1412:382b-20: shing rdo rje rol pa rta'i 'gros sam gshin rje
T02D1412:382b-21: dbyug pa 'chang ba'am yi dags srin po'i gdong ngam
T02D1412:382b-22: ma mo rigs ldan ma'i 'khor lo dgod par bya'o
T02D1412:382b-24: de ltar las lnga bcu bshad nas phan yon ston
T02D1412:382b-25: pa ni dpal ldan khrag 'thung zhes bya ba la
T02D1412:382b-27: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags mi shes par dngos grub
T02D1412:382b-28: 'dod pa rmongs pa 'bras 'dod pas phub ma brdung
T02D1412:382b-30: gsang sngags 'di med par 'jig rten dang thun mong
T02D1412:382b-31: dang mchog gi dngos grub gsum mi'i rnal 'byor pas
T02D1412:382b-33: gsang sngags 'di mi shes na zhi gnas dang lhag
T02D1412:382b-34: mthong gi rnal 'byor yang ngal ba don med cing
T02D1412:382b-35: / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi 'bras bu yang thob par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:382b-36: ci'i phyir mi 'gyur snyam na sprul pa'i sku'i sngags
T02D1412:382b-37: rkang pa brgyad pa ni gzhan gyi don yongs su
T02D1412:382b-38: rdzogs pa yin no zhes dgongs so //
T02D1412:382b-39: gsang sngags 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyod cing
T02D1412:382b-40: bde bar gshegs pas rgyud sde bzhir gsungs pa'i gsang
T02D1412:382b-41: sngags kyi dngos grub rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags dang
T02D1412:383a-1: grub de lta bu'i 'bras bu ma grub na ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1412:383a-2: bza' dang btung ba la sogs pa //
T02D1412:383a-3: zhes smos te tshogs kyi 'khor los bskyar ba'i cho
T02D1412:383a-4: ga byas nas bsgrubs na zas kyi mchog bcud kyis
T02D1412:383a-5: len dang bcud la sogs pa dngos grub thams cad
T02D1412:383a-7: le'u dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:383a-9: // / rtsa ba'i sngags kyi dngos grub dang las bshad
T02D1412:383a-10: nas snying po'i dngos grub dang las bshad pa ni
T02D1412:383a-11: / de nas he ru ka gnyis med //
T02D1412:383a-13: he ru ka ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D1412:383a-17: de dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba gang gis
T02D1412:383a-18: shes pa tsam gyis sku gsum gyi 'bras bu'i dngos
T02D1412:383a-19: grub dang / 'jig rten gyi dngos grub 'grub par
T02D1412:383a-20: the tshom med pas na re zhig dang por sku
T02D1412:383a-22: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni
T02D1412:383a-23: chos kyi sku can du zhes bya ba gsungs te
T02D1412:383a-24: / gang gi sems kyis 'khor lo bde mchog bsgom
T02D1412:383a-25: pa'i tshe sgrub pa po dngos grub brgyad thob par
T02D1412:383a-26: 'gyur ba na ye shes kyi sku grub pa yin
T02D1412:383a-27: / no // gang gi tshe longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
T02D1412:383a-28: sku lus kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub pa pos bsgoms nas
T02D1412:383a-29: grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe rgyu'i he ru ka
T02D1412:383a-30: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku thob bo //
T02D1412:383a-31: gang gi tshe sprul pa'i 'khor lo bde mchog sprul
T02D1412:383a-32: pa'i sku'i rang bzhin du sgrub pa pos bsgoms na
T02D1412:383a-33: sprul sku thob par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D1412:383a-34: yang na rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dbang du byas nas
T02D1412:383a-35: dbang bzhi pa thob nas sems kyi stong pa nyid
T02D1412:383a-36: rtogs pas chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid rtogs
T02D1412:383a-37: te bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab nas bsam gyis
T02D1412:383a-38: mi khyab par bsgoms na de'i tshe chos kyi sku
T02D1412:383a-40: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba thob nas
T02D1412:383a-41: las kyi phyag rgya la bde stong reg bya'i stong
T02D1412:383a-42: pa nyid rtogs nas gzung ba rang bzhin med par
T02D1412:383a-43: shes pa 'od gsal ba'i stong pa nyid bsgoms na
T02D1412:383a-44: de'i tshe longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:383a-45: gsang ba'i dbang thob nas ro rdo rje ma la
T02D1412:383a-46: sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pas chos kyi phyag rgya
T02D1412:383b-0: @383b la brten nas sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin
T02D1412:383b-1: bdag byin gyis rlob pa'i lam bsgoms na sprul pa'i
T02D1412:383b-2: sku'i rang bzhin thob par 'gyur ro zhes slob dpon
T02D1412:383b-4: yang na rtsa'i 'khor lo bsgoms pas sprul pa'i sku dang /
T02D1412:383b-5: rlung gi 'khor lo bsgoms pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02D1412:383b-6: sems kyi 'khor lo bsgoms pas chos kyi sku thob po zhes kha sbyor las gsungs so //
T02D1412:383b-7: bdag nyid shr'i he ru kar //
T02D1412:383b-9: ces bya ba ni rtsa gsum gyi he ru ka ra gyur pa la the tshom med pa'o //
T02D1412:383b-12: bskyed rdzogs gnyis bsgom pa la snying po'i sngags bzlas
T02D1412:383b-13: pas sku gsum grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i
T02D1412:383b-14: tha tshig go // de ltar mchog gi dngos grub
T02D1412:383b-15: bshad nas 'jig rten gyi dngos grub gsungs pa ni
T02D1412:383b-16: tha tshig go // // gsang sngags kyi ni snying po 'di //
T02D1412:383b-17: 'bras bu bshad kyis sgrub po nyon //
T02D1412:383b-18: zhes bya ba ni dngos grub dang las kyi tshogs nyon cig pa'o //
T02D1412:383b-19: snying po bzlas pas dpag tshad bye bar 'phags par
T02D1412:383b-20: 'gyur zhing 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1412:383b-22: rdo rje mkha' 'gro las yungs kar la bgegs bskrad
T02D1412:383b-23: pa'i ro'i khrag dang zhag gis pa skus la nyi
T02D1412:383b-24: shu bzhi'i zhag skar ma rgyal dang gza' nyi ma
T02D1412:383b-25: 'dzom pa'i dus su dur khrod kyi sa la khrag
T02D1412:383b-26: dang zhag gis sprus te mi'i thod par yungs kar
T02D1412:383b-27: bskyed la smin pa'i tshes la ma lhung bar dmangs
T02D1412:383b-28: rigs kyi bu mo'i lag par bzhag nas de'i mar
T02D1412:383b-29: khu btsir la mi'i thod par sbas la bsrung bar
T02D1412:383b-30: bya'o // de nas 'gegs pa'i ro btsal la dkyil
T02D1412:383b-31: 'khor steng du ro bzhag nas de'i snying gar dur
T02D1412:383b-32: khrod brgyad kyi mkha' 'gro bcug nas sha dang khrag
T02D1412:383b-33: dang ldan pa'i gtor ma byin la skye gnas kyi
T02D1412:383b-34: phyag rgya bcings te dur khrod brgyad kyi bgegs spyan
T02D1412:383b-35: bya'o // drang bar bya'o // de'i tshe ro'i lus las sna tshogs kyi bgegs 'byung ba dang /
T02D1412:383b-36: he ru ka phyag 'bum pa bsgoms la bdud rtsi
T02D1412:383b-37: lnga chang dang ldan pa de'i lce la bzhag nas
T02D1412:383b-38: / rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che //
T02D1412:383b-39: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1412:384a-0: @384a * // rigs rnams myur du thal bar rlog / aom ha
T02D1412:384a-1: na ha na sa ma ya h'um phat ces bya
T02D1412:384a-2: ba dang bcas pas ro'i khar blugs la sngar bshad
T02D1412:384a-3: pa'i mar khus rang gi lus po la byugs te
T02D1412:384a-4: ro'i steng du zhon nas mkha' spyod kyi gnas su
T02D1412:384a-5: khyer cig ces byas na 'gro ba dang 'ong ba
T02D1412:384a-6: thams cad bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:384a-7: gzugs brgya stong du mar byed do zhes bya ba
T02D1412:384a-8: ni yungs kar gyi sa bon la byi tang ka'i
T02D1412:384a-9: khu ba dang khrag gis byugs la nya phyis kyi
T02D1412:384a-10: snod du dur khrod kyi sas bkang la /
T02D1412:384a-11: bsrung ba byas te btsugs nas yongs su smin pa'i
T02D1412:384a-12: dus su 'bras bu de gzhon nu ma'i lag par
T02D1412:384a-13: sa la ma lhung bar bzhag la snying po'i sngags
T02D1412:384a-14: bzlas shing khar bcug na de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur
T02D1412:384a-15: ro // de bzhin du khva dang ces spyang dang rma bya dang /
T02D1412:384a-16: ngang pa dang khyim bya dang rta dang /
T02D1412:384a-17: ba lang dang bong bu dang khyi dang phag dang /
T02D1412:384a-18: lug la sogs pa'i thod par sa bon bskyed nas
T02D1412:384a-19: bsrung ba byas te sa la ma lhung bar dmangs
T02D1412:384a-20: rigs kyi bu mo'i lag par bzhag nas snying po
T02D1412:384a-21: bzlas shing bdag nyid kyi khar bcug na de dang
T02D1412:384a-23: kha nas bton na snga ma bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:384a-24: khang bzangs dang shing dang khyim rnams la 'dzegs te
T02D1412:384a-25: zhes bya ba ni zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes
T02D1412:384a-26: brgyad la skar ma rgyal dang /
T02D1412:384a-27: gza' nyi ma 'dzom pa'i zhag la bil ba'am /
T02D1412:384a-28: ma du lung ga gang yang rung ba'i sa bon
T02D1412:384a-29: blangs la mi'i thod par dur khrod kyi sas bkang
T02D1412:384a-30: la bskyed de / rkang dang thal bas byugs te
T02D1412:384a-31: bskyed la snod mchu can gyis rkang pa brgyad pa
T02D1412:384a-32: bzlas pa'i chu las bcu zhing gshin rje gshed dang
T02D1412:384a-33: la bskyed de / / bgegs mthar byed kyi gtor ma byin te spyan gyi sngags kyis bcus la /
T02D1412:384a-34: m'a ma k'i'i sngags kyis chu blugs /
T02D1412:384a-35: sgrol mas phur ma bsal la /
T02D1412:384a-36: gos dkar mo'i sngags kyis bsrung ba'i 'bras bu de
T02D1412:384a-37: smin pa'i tshe sa bon blangs la lcags gsum gyis
T02D1412:384a-38: dkris te ri lu byas nas khar bcug na rnal
T02D1412:384a-39: 'byor ma dang lhan cig dpag tshad bye bar 'gro
T02D1412:384b-0: ba dang / nam mkha' @384b la 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang /
T02D1412:384b-1: nas bton nas snang bar 'gyur zhing ma bton na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:384b-2: byis pa dang rgan po dang dar la bab pa'i
T02D1412:384b-3: thod par bskyed na de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro
T02D1412:384b-4: zhes gsungs so // 'dod na byis pa dang //
T02D1412:384b-6: dar la bab pa zhes bya ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo ston pa yin te /
T02D1412:384b-7: sa spyod gsung gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i tshe gsung
T02D1412:384b-8: gi 'khor lo'i lha dgu byis pa'am rgan po'am dar
T02D1412:384b-9: la bab pa'i gzugs su bsgom ste tshogs kyi 'khor
T02D1412:384b-10: lo byas na de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:384b-11: 'dod na glang po che dang zhes bya ba sa
T02D1412:384b-12: 'og tu mkha' spyod sku'i 'khor lo sgrub par 'dod
T02D1412:384b-13: pa de'i tshe sku'i 'khor lo'i lha dgu glang po
T02D1412:384b-14: che la sogs pa'i gzugs su bsgoms te tshogs kyi
T02D1412:384b-15: 'khor lo byas na de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro
T02D1412:384b-16: // 'dod na rma bya dang zhes bya ba ni
T02D1412:384b-17: mkha' spyod thugs kyi dngos grub sgrub pa'i tshe rma
T02D1412:384b-18: bya dang khyim bya la sogs pa'i gzugs su bsgoms
T02D1412:384b-20: gang 'dod pa'i gzugs su byed do zhes bya ba
T02D1412:384b-21: ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs
T02D1412:384b-22: pa'i gzugs su bsgoms na de'i gzugs su 'gyur ro
T02D1412:384b-23: // tshig 'phrog pa dang zhes bya ba ni mi
T02D1412:384b-24: rus las byas pa'i sor brgyad pa'i phur bu la
T02D1412:384b-25: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya sarba bandha bandha
T02D1412:384b-26: h'um phat ces bya ba'i sngags 'bum bzlas te /
T02D1412:384b-27: tsandan dmar po'i rgyu las byas pa'i ba sgrub bya'i
T02D1412:384b-28: gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar dur khrod kyi ras la
T02D1412:384b-29: rgya skyegs kyi khu bas 'khrul 'khor bri bar bya
T02D1412:384b-30: ste / 'khrul 'khor ni sgo bzhi sgo khyud dang
T02D1412:384b-31: ldan pa'i dbus su 'dab ma brgyad dang bcu drug
T02D1412:384b-32: rim pa gnyis su bkod la lte bar bsgrub bya'i
T02D1412:384b-33: ming dang spel ba'i yab yum gyi snying po h'um
T02D1412:384b-35: nang ma'i 'dab ma brgyad la phyogs bzhir aom he
T02D1412:384b-36: he ru bzhi dang bum pa bzhi dgod par bya'o
T02D1412:384b-37: // phyi rol gyi bcu rug la ru kam badzra
T02D1412:384b-38: d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ra h'um h'um
T02D1412:384b-39: phat sv'a h'a zhes bya ba bkod la //
T02D1412:384b-40: bsgrub bya'i snying gar bcug nas skye gnas kyi phyag
T02D1412:384b-41: rgya bcings la dgug pa la sogs pa byas na
T02D1412:384b-42: sngar bshad pa'i phur bu lkog mar btab na tshig
T02D1412:385a-1: mig tu btab na mthong ba 'phrog pa dang /
T02D1412:385a-2: rna bar btab na thos pa 'phrog pa dang /
T02D1412:385a-3: sna la btab na dri 'phrog pa dang /
T02D1412:385a-4: lce la btab na ro 'phrog par byed do //
T02D1412:385a-5: gang 'dod pa der khrag 'dren pa zhes bya ba
T02D1412:385a-6: ni tsandan dmar po'i rgyu las byas pa'i bsgrub bya'i
T02D1412:385a-7: lte bar 'khrul 'khor bcug la bud med yin na
T02D1412:385a-8: bha ga nas skud pa 'don pa'o //
T02D1412:385a-9: skyes pa yin na sna bug nas skud pa bton
T02D1412:385a-10: nas skud pa 'thon zhing thabs dang shes rab gnyis
T02D1412:385a-11: su med par bsgoms te snying po'i sngags kyis bzlas
T02D1412:385a-12: par bya'o // de nas tshab gsum dang spa tshil
T02D1412:385a-13: gyis byugs la seng ldeng gi me bdag la bdugs
T02D1412:385a-14: na nges par khrag 'dren par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:385a-15: gnod par byed ces bya ba ni snga ma bzhin
T02D1412:385a-16: du snying po'i 'khrul 'khor bris la bsgrub bya'i rkang
T02D1412:385a-17: rjes dang tsandan dmar po'i rgyu las dur khrod kyi
T02D1412:385a-18: zas kyi lhag ma dang gcig tu byas pa'i lingga'i
T02D1412:385a-19: snying gar 'khrul 'khor bcug la sbyin sreg byas na
T02D1412:385a-22: le'u bcu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:385a-24: // / de ltar snying po dang sngags kyi dngos grub dang las bshad nas /
T02D1412:385a-25: da ni dngos grub kyi yan lag gi rdzas bshad par bya ste //
T02D1412:385a-26: de nas gzhan yang sgrub pa po //
T02D1412:385a-27: gang zhig bsten pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1412:385a-28: zhes bya ba ni dngos grub sgrub pa'i kha zas bshad pa yin te /
T02D1412:385a-29: gang zhig bsten pa tsam gyis dngos grub 'jug cing
T02D1412:385a-30: dngos grub thob pa ni skye ba bdun pa'i 'gro
T02D1412:385a-31: ba sha la sogs pa yin pas de'i thabs bshad
T02D1412:385a-32: par bya'o // de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par
T02D1412:385a-33: bshad pa ni skyes bu gang zhig ces bya ba
T02D1412:385a-35: rdul dri zhim po ni skye ba dang po'i rtags so //
T02D1412:385a-36: bden par smra ba gnyis pa'i rtags so //
T02D1412:385a-39: kha'i dbugs dri zhim pa ni lnga pa'o //
T02D1412:385a-40: nges brjod las gsungs pa'i grib ma bdun ni drug pa'o //
T02D1412:385a-41: bdun pa ngang pa'i 'gros can rnams te skye ba
T02D1412:385a-42: bdun pa'i rtags de rnams shes nas de ji srid
T02D1412:385a-43: 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur gyis bsten pa dang /
T02D1412:385b-0: khyed kyi dngos grub bdag @385b la stsol cig ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1412:385b-1: de kha na ma tho ba med par shi ba dang /
T02D1412:385b-2: de'i snying ga na gi wang yod pa blangs la
T02D1412:385b-3: dpal he ru ka'i snying po 'am nye ba'i snying
T02D1412:385b-4: po la sogs pa gang yang rung ba brgya bzlas
T02D1412:385b-5: nas dpral bar thig le byas na nam mkha' la
T02D1412:385b-6: lding bar 'gyur zhing dpag tshad bye bar 'gro bar
T02D1412:385b-7: 'gyur ro // snying gar thig le byas na gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang /
T02D1412:385b-8: mig tu thig le byas na lha'i mig thob pa dang /
T02D1412:385b-9: rna bar thig le byas na lha'i rna ba 'byung ba dang /
T02D1412:385b-10: rkang par thig le byas na rkang mgyogs kyi dngos
T02D1412:385b-11: grub 'byung ba la sogs pa ni rgyud bla ma
T02D1412:385b-13: de ltar bsten pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni
T02D1412:385b-14: 'jig rten gsum gyi ye shes dang ldan pa'i sangs
T02D1412:385b-16: dpag tshad ces bya ba ni skye ba bdun pa'i
T02D1412:385b-17: sha zos na dpag tshad lnga bcur 'gro ba dang
T02D1412:385b-19: de ni 'jig rten gyi dngos grub po //
T02D1412:385b-20: de'i snying zos na bsam gtan dang gzugs med kyi
T02D1412:385b-21: lus thob par 'gyur ba thun mong gi dngos grub
T02D1412:385b-22: po // dpal he ru ka'i snying po dang nye
T02D1412:385b-23: ba'i snying po gang gis shes pa'i phyis 'chad par
T02D1412:385b-24: 'gyur ba las bcu gnyis po gang dang gang 'dod
T02D1412:385b-25: pa de dang de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro
T02D1412:385b-26: po // // spyod pa dang bya ba dang gnyi
T02D1412:385b-27: ga dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la ni smyung bar
T02D1412:385b-28: gnas pas dngos grub thob pa yin la /
T02D1412:385b-29: 'dir ni sman bcud kyis len nam bdud rtsi lnga'am /
T02D1412:385b-30: skye ba bdun pa'i sha zos nas dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1412:385b-31: ci skye ba bdun pa'i sha 'ba' zhig zos pas thob bam zhi na /

T02D1412:392a-25: g-yas pa ra sa n'a dang g-yon par la la
T02D1412:392a-26: n'a ni rtsa srung thag yin zhing dbus ma aa
T02D1412:392a-27: wa dh'u t'i ni srub shing yin te /
T02D1412:392a-28: lte ba khrag gi thig le gtsub gtan yin pas
T02D1412:392a-29: mi shigs pa nam mkha'i rlung g-yas g-yon gyi rlung
T02D1412:392a-30: gis bsrubs na rlung me'i drod tsam du gyur pa
T02D1412:392a-31: yin no // des na g-yas g-yon gyi rlung la sngags mchog dam pa ste zhes bya'o //
T02D1412:392a-32: mkha' 'gro ma ni sbyor sgrub byed //
T02D1412:392a-33: ces bya ba ni mgo bo nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1412:392a-34: du 'gro bas lte ba'i gtum mo drod la nam
T02D1412:392a-36: sbyor sgrub byed ces bya ba ni g-yas g-yon gyi rlung gis bsrubs pa'o //
T02D1412:392a-37: rnal 'byor mtshan ma gang zlos nas //
T02D1412:392a-38: zhes bya ba ni sa chu la thim pas du ba lta bu dang /
T02D1412:392a-39: chu me la thim pas smig rgyu lta bu dang /
T02D1412:392a-40: me rlung la thim pas srin bu me khyer lta bu dang /
T02D1412:392a-41: rlung rnam par shes pa la thim pas sgron ma lta bu'o //
T02D1412:392a-42: rnam par shes pa nam mkha' la thim pas nam
T02D1412:392a-43: mkha' lta bu'i rtags mthong nas gang zlos pa zhes
T02D1412:392a-44: pa ni srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud pa'o //
T02D1412:392a-45: zla gcig gis ni grub par 'gyur //
T02D1412:392b-0: zhes bya ba @392b ni gtum mo srub shing gis 'khor lo bsrub pa'i thabs kyis so //
T02D1412:392b-2: snying po shin tu dga' ba yin //
T02D1412:392b-3: zhes bya ba ni g-yas g-yon gyi rtsa'i sna ba
T02D1412:392b-4: lang gi rmig rjes lta bu'i rtsa'i nang nas srog
T02D1412:392b-5: dang rtsol ba gnyis aa wa dh'u t'ir chud pa
T02D1412:392b-6: ni gsang ba'i rgyud ces pa'o //
T02D1412:392b-7: de las byang chub kyi sems babs pas dga' ba
T02D1412:392b-8: dang mchog dga' dang lhan cig skyes dga'i rtog pa
T02D1412:392b-9: med pa skyes pa ni shin tu dge ba'o //
T02D1412:392b-10: gang zhig de nas shes pa ni //
T02D1412:392b-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtsa gsum gyi rlung
T02D1412:392b-12: aa wa dh'u t'ir bcug pas rnam par rtog pa'i
T02D1412:392b-13: rkyen ma tshang bas rlung aa wa dh'u t'ir chud
T02D1412:392b-14: pa'i tshe rtog med skyes pa de'i tshe sgrib pa
T02D1412:392b-15: rnam par spangs nas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa
T02D1412:392b-16: la sogs pa dus gsum du shes par 'gyur ro
T02D1412:392b-18: mi g-yo rnam par mi 'khor ba //
T02D1412:392b-19: rnam par mi 'byung gang yang med //
T02D1412:392b-20: sgrib pa lnga ni rnam spangs pa //
T02D1412:392b-21: rang nyid he ru kar gsal 'gyur //
T02D1412:392b-24: the tshom med ces bya ba ni lte ba sprul
T02D1412:392b-25: pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su rgod ma'i kha zhes bya
T02D1412:392b-26: ba ba lang gi rmig rjes lta bu'i rlung bcug
T02D1412:392b-27: na byang chub kyi sems bde ba rtog med skye
T02D1412:392b-28: ba la the tshom med do //
T02D1412:392b-30: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin //
T02D1412:392b-31: zhes bya ba ni dngos grub sgrub pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo bde mchog yin no //
T02D1412:392b-32: le'u bcu bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:392b-34: // / de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshad nas /
T02D1412:392b-35: da ni sgrub pa'i yan lag las kyi phyag rgya ston pa ni /
T02D1412:392b-36: de nas sdom pa thams cad la //
T02D1412:392b-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pas smos te /
T02D1412:392b-38: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo thams cad sgrub pa'i yan lag ye shes las skyes pa dang /
T02D1412:392b-40: sngags las skyes pa gsum gyis bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
T02D1412:392b-41: pho nyas lhan cig skyes dngos grub //
T02D1412:392b-42: mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste //
T02D1412:392b-44: de yang 'dzam bu'i gling gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi
T02D1412:392b-45: nas sprul pa'i sku rgyun mi 'chad par bzhugs pas
T02D1412:393a-0: @393a * // rnal 'byor pa gdul bya dus la
T02D1412:393a-1: bab par gzigs na ye shes las skyes pa'i sangs
T02D1412:393a-2: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bud med kyi gzugs

T02D1412:393a-4: bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin ston par mdzad pa'am /
T02D1412:393a-5: yang na gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhir skyes pa dbang
T02D1412:393a-6: po tshang ba la sogs pa bdag gi 'byor ba
T02D1412:393a-7: dang ldan pas bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin sgrub par

T02D1412:393a-11: kyi bde ba skyes par gyur pas na dang po
T02D1412:393a-12: kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod lam gyi mtshan nyid
T02D1412:393a-13: shes nas yan lag dang nyid lag gi brda dang
T02D1412:393a-14: 'gyur ba 'am / / yi ge dang tshig gi
T02D1412:393a-15: brda dang mig dang mchu'i brdas sgrub pa'i yan lag
T02D1412:393a-16: gi byang chub sems dpa' de shes par bya'o //
T02D1412:393a-18: du ba las ni mer shes shing //
T02D1412:393a-19: chu skyar las ni chu yin te //
T02D1412:393a-20: byang chub sems dang blo ldan gyis //
T02D1412:393a-21: rigs ni mtshan ma rnams las shes //
T02D1412:393a-24: gang zhig brdar ni shes 'gyur te //
T02D1412:393a-25: brda drug shes pas de nyid kyis //

T02D1412:393a-27: spyod lam shes pa des thugs rje chen po dang
T02D1412:393a-28: ldan pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i rnal 'byor ma rnyed nas
T02D1412:393a-29: las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyu rkyen tshogs pa de las
T02D1412:393a-30: ting nge 'dzin sgrub par the tshom med par shes
T02D1412:393a-31: par bya'o // de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:393a-32: da zhes bya ba skyes bur bshad //
T02D1412:393a-34: le'u bco lnga pa ni dag byed kyi brda yin
T02D1412:393a-35: la bcu drug pa ni dag byed kyi lha mo'i
T02D1412:393a-36: mtshan nyid do // de las dang por dag byed
T02D1412:393a-37: kyi lha mo'i brda ston pa la dbang dang dpa'
T02D1412:393a-38: bo dpa' mo dang bkas gnang ba dang kun spyod
T02D1412:393a-39: kyi brda lnga bstan pa yin no //
T02D1412:393a-40: ci'i phyir brda lnga ston ce na /
T02D1412:393a-41: dag byed kyi lha mo ni dung can ma dang
T02D1412:393a-42: ri dags can yin pas sems gzung pa dang dbang
T02D1412:393a-43: bskur ba dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang bkas gnang
T02D1412:393a-44: ba dang khams brta ba kun du spyod pa yin
T02D1412:393b-0: no // de la dang por @393b dbang bskur ba'i brda ston te /
T02D1412:393b-1: da zhes bya ba ni dang bskur ba'i skyes bu'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1412:393b-2: de zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i bud med kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1412:393b-3: spu zhes bya ba ni 'khyud par ston pa'o //
T02D1412:393b-4: su zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i bza' ba ston pa'o //
T02D1412:393b-5: ma zhes bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur ba ston pa'o //
T02D1412:393b-6: las zhes bya ba ni rang gi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1412:393b-7: pi zhes bya ba ni rang dang dus mnyam du dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1412:393b-8: lu ni rang gis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1412:393b-9: sri ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1412:393b-11: so ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i zhi ba'i btung ba'o //
T02D1412:393b-12: pi zhes bya ba ni sman sna brgya rtsa brgyad du bskol ba'i thug pa'o //
T02D1412:393b-13: hi zhes bya ba ni sha lnga'o //
T02D1412:393b-14: bha zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i tshe kha zas 'bras chan la sogs pa'o //
T02D1412:393b-15: nu zhes bya ba ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1412:393b-16: 'di tsam gyis ni dbang gi lha mo'i brda bstan te /
T02D1412:393b-17: da ni dag byed kyi lha mo'i brda ston to //
T02D1412:393b-18: pi zhes bya ba ni sems 'dzin pa'i gnas su khrod pa'o //
T02D1412:393b-19: du zhes bya ba ni skye ba bdun pa'i ro kha zas su za ba'o //
T02D1412:393b-20: de zhes bya ba ni yum rdo rje phag mo'i rig so /
T02D1412:393b-21: da zhes bya ba ni sgrol ma'o //
T02D1412:393b-22: hri zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas spyan /
T02D1412:393b-23: ku zhes bya ba ni m'a ma k'i //
T02D1412:393b-24: ha zhes bya ba ni gos dkar mo /
T02D1412:393b-25: dza zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi lha mo
T02D1412:393b-26: de rnams dang byin pa gnyis kyis 'khyud pa'i sems
T02D1412:393b-27: 'dzin pa'o // da ni dpa' bo'i lha mo'i bshad par bya ste /
T02D1412:393b-28: thog ma phrad pa'i che ba zhes bya ba phyag 'tshal ba ston la /
T02D1412:393b-29: so zhes bya ba ni phyag 'tshal ba'i lan no //
T02D1412:393b-30: ni zhes bya ba ni sha la sogs pa'i bza' bya'o //
T02D1412:393b-31: byo zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lngar byin gyis brlabs nas bza' ba'o //
T02D1412:393b-32: bhi zhes bya ba ni rdo rje chur byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D1412:393b-33: ga zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba la bgrod
T02D1412:393b-34: par bya ba yin gyi ma bskur ba la dam
T02D1412:393b-36: rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang //
T02D1412:393b-37: zhes bya ba ni nyes par byung bas bgrod par mi bya'o //
T02D1412:393b-38: da ni bkas gnang ba'i lha mo'i mchod pa'i lha mo ston te /
T02D1412:394a-0: ka zhes bya ba ni rigs lnga'i lha mo so @394a * //
T02D1412:394a-2: sa zhes bya ba ni skyes pa gzhan gyi gam du mi 'gro ba'o //
T02D1412:394a-3: ra zhes bya ba ni bdag po med pa dang mchod pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1412:394a-4: da ni kun spyod ma ston te /
T02D1412:394a-5: du zhes bya ba ni gzugs 'tshong ba'o //
T02D1412:394a-6: su zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa la dad pa'o //
T02D1412:394a-7: na zhes bya ba ni mu stegs pa la dad pa'o //
T02D1412:394a-8: sa zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba thob pa'o //
T02D1412:394a-9: aa zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba ma ma thob pa'o //
T02D1412:394a-10: y'a zhes bya ba ni dad pas 'ongs pa'o //
T02D1412:394a-11: na zhes bya ba ni dad pa med pas ma 'ongs pa'o //
T02D1412:394a-12: so zhes bya ba ni yid du 'ong ba'i yul du gyur pa'o //
T02D1412:394a-13: yi ge re re'i brda 'di dag tshor ba sdug bsngal dang /
T02D1412:394a-14: btang snyoms spangs nas tshor ba bde ba sgom zhing
T02D1412:394a-15: rtog pa med pa mngon sum gyi lam la dad
T02D1412:394a-16: pa la sbyin par bya'i ma dad pa la mi
T02D1412:394a-17: sbyin pa dang / grol ba'i lam yang ma yin zhes shes par bya'o //
T02D1412:394a-18: le'u bco lnga ba'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:394a-20: // / da ni sems 'dzin pa'i dag byed kyi lha mo'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02D1412:394a-21: de nas bza' dang bza' mi bya //
T02D1412:394a-22: zhes bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya yid du
T02D1412:394a-23: 'ong ba gzugs sngu [*sdu?] gu mig gis bza' bar
T02D1412:394a-24: bya ba dang / sgra snyan pa rna ba dang /
T02D1412:394a-27: nam mkha'i rtsa'i dang reg pa lus kyi bza' bar bya ba ste /
T02D1412:394a-29: bza' bar mi bya ba ni yid du mi 'ong ba'o //
T02D1412:394a-30: de nas rab tu bshad par bya //
T02D1412:394a-31: zhes bya ba ni dag byed kyi lha mo bshad par bya zhes pa'o //
T02D1412:394a-32: mi thub zla ba dang bha ba ba'i zhal snga
T02D1412:394a-33: nas bza' bar bya ba ni gnas nyi shu rtsa
T02D1412:394a-34: bzhi na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D1412:394a-36: de rnams la 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi gzugs kyi
T02D1412:394a-37: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis chos ston pas bzhugs
T02D1412:394a-38: pa la las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor bas mtshan
T02D1412:394a-39: nyid ma rtogs pas mtshan nyid brtags nas sprul pa'i
T02D1412:394a-40: sku'i lha ye shes kyi lha mo de dang snyoms
T02D1412:394a-41: par zhugs pas me long gi gzugs brnyan la de
T02D1412:394a-42: nyid mthong ba bzhin du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
T02D1412:394a-43: char la stong nyid mthong bar 'gyur pas de'i mtshan
T02D1412:394b-0: nyid @394b bstan pa yin no zhe'o //

T02D1412:394b-6: sku'i ye shes kyi lha mo yang yin la gnas
T02D1412:394b-7: nyis shu rtsa bzhir skyes pa dbang po tshan ba

T02D1412:394b-12: gyi mtshan nyid bsdoms nas ston pa ni ye shes
T02D1412:394b-13: kyi lha mo kho na yin zhes mi bya'o ;

T02D1412:394b-15: lhag mthong stong pa nyid kyi ye shes skye'o //
T02D1412:394b-16: sgrub pa mchog tu dam tshig la gnas pa //
T02D1412:394b-17: zhes bya ba ni chags pa'i lam bsgom pa'i rten gyi gang zag go //

T02D1412:395a-41: rang rigs las byung tshig tu smra //

T02D1412:395a-44: g-yon la 'gro ba'i bud med gang //
T02D1412:395b-0: zhes bya ba ni dbang @395b ma bskur ba'i tshe bde ba la mos pa'o //
T02D1412:395b-1: rnal 'byor ma yang g-yon la brtags //
T02D1412:395b-2: zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i rnal 'byor mar
T02D1412:395b-3: gyur nas bde ba bsgom pa ste sems kyi rtags
T02D1412:395b-4: so // de ltar thun mong gi rtag bshad nas
T02D1412:395b-5: thabs kyi mtshan nyid ni lag pa g-yon gyis shes

T02D1412:395b-11: rigs kyi sa bon rab tu bsgom //
T02D1412:395b-13: shes rab kyi sa bon rab tu bsgom pa'i rigs

T02D1412:395b-16: ldan pa'i rang rtags gsungs pa /

T02D1412:395b-20: zhes bya ba smos te lha mo rig bzlos pa'o //
T02D1412:395b-21: lus kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na /

T02D1412:395b-26: // rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni dga'

T02D1412:395b-32: lhan cig skyes dga' mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i dus

T02D1412:395b-39: le'u bcu drug pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:395b-41: // / de ltar dag byed kyi lha mo bshad nas /
T02D1412:395b-42: dbang gi lha mo bshad pa ni //
T02D1412:395b-43: de nas rnyed dka' rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1412:395b-45: ye shes dang gnas dang sngags las skyes pa'i lha
T02D1412:395b-46: mo byang chub kyi sems dus mnyam du 'byin pa
T02D1412:396a-2: de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi //
T02D1412:396a-3: zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas kyi nam mkha' dang lhag mthong gi nam mkhar 'gro ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1412:396a-4: de ltar ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D1412:396a-5: bdud rtsi lnga rnams yang dag 'byung //
T02D1412:396a-7: slob ma'i khar byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi 'bebs pa'o //

T02D1412:396a-9: rgyud 'bum pa las bdun du gsungs te /
T02D1412:396a-11: nye ba'i sangs rgyas spyan dang /

T02D1412:396a-17: de rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs su bshad pas //
T02D1412:396a-18: ya mi ni dang skrag byed ma //
T02D1412:396a-20: kun spyod tshe zad pa su ra //
T02D1412:396a-21: mkha' 'gro ma ni rnam pa bdun //
T02D1412:396a-23: de mdor bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid rgyud phyi ma dang

T02D1412:396a-25: / gzugs can ma dang tsumpa ka / l'a ma yongs 'gyur byis bcas ma //
T02D1412:396a-26: mi ldog lha mo ae hi ka / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1412:396a-27: cung zhig khro ba'i cha byad ston pa ni gzugs can ma dang /
T02D1412:396a-28: nye ba'i gzugs can ma dang /
T02D1412:396a-29: l'a ma dang nye ba'i l'a ma dang /
T02D1412:396a-30: khanda ro ha dang nye ba'i khanda ro ha dang /

T02D1412:396a-33: 'dir bshad pa ni rnal 'byor pa la mngon par

T02D1412:396a-35: sngar bzhin khro ba las phis de zhig gnas 'dzum pa dang /
T02D1412:396a-36: gzugs can ma ste sangs rgyas spyan gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1412:396a-37: dpa' bo dang gnyis su med pa la dga' ba dang /

T02D1412:396a-42: so // zur gyis blta zhing khro gnyer dang smin ma bsgyur zhing sdigs mdzub byed pa dang /
T02D1412:396a-43: ma rangs pas dbugs mi 'byin pa ltar byed pa ni /
T02D1412:396a-44: l'a ma ste rje'u rigs so //
T02D1412:396b-0: phag la @396b sogs pa'i srog chags rnams 'jigs par
T02D1412:396b-1: byed pa ni nye ba'i l'a ma ste rigs gnyis
T02D1412:396b-2: yin no // shin tu rgod pa dang slar gnas
T02D1412:396b-3: nas song nas phyir mi ldog pa khanda ro ha
T02D1412:396b-5: yid kyis kun du sbyor bas snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
T02D1412:396b-6: rkang pa'am gos kyis reg na mi 'tsho ba ni khanda ro ha dang nye ba'i khanda'i rigs so //
T02D1412:396b-7: mkha' 'gro ma ni 'dir zhes pa ni dmangs rigs
T02D1412:396b-8: mtha' yas yin pas mtshan nyid rgya cher ma bshad
T02D1412:396b-9: do // des ci zhig byed snyam na /
T02D1412:396b-10: dbang po'i dbang sogs yin par 'dod //
T02D1412:396b-11: ces bya ba ni dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1412:396b-16: de dag ni khyim du ci zhig 'dri zhe na /
T02D1412:396b-18: nye ba'i gzugs can mas dgra sta /
T02D1412:396b-20: nye ba'i l'a mas ral gri /
T02D1412:396b-22: nye ba'i gos dkar mos rdo rje /
T02D1412:396b-23: mkha' 'gro mas ni dung 'dri ba yin no //
T02D1412:396b-24: mi thub zla ba dang bha ba pa'i zhal snga
T02D1412:396b-25: nas ni sku'i 'khor lo'i brtson 'grus chen po nas
T02D1412:396b-26: brtsams nas // thugs kyi 'khor lo'i rab gtum ma'i bar du nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod pa la /

T02D1412:396b-32: rdo rje nyi ma'i bzhi la byis bcas ma dang /
T02D1412:396b-33: rta mchog gi bzhi la mi ldog pa bzhis byas te /
T02D1412:396b-34: de ltar nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin la ae hi

T02D1412:396b-43: le'u bcu bdun pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:396b-45: // / de ltar dbang gi lha mo bshad nas /
T02D1412:397a-2: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1412:397a-3: zhes bya ba gsungs pa la tshogs kyi 'khor lo
T02D1412:397a-4: byed pa'i yan lag ni dbang bskur bas las gzhan
T02D1412:397a-5: no // mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid ces
T02D1412:397a-6: bya ba ni phyis mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad kyi
T02D1412:397a-7: no // mtshan nyid do // de rnams kyi mtshan
T02D1412:397a-8: nyid shes nas nam mkha' 'gro ma'i dam tshig la
T02D1412:397a-9: gnas pas bde ba rnyed par 'gyur ro //

T02D1412:397a-13: kha dog dmar zhing ser ba dang //
T02D1412:397a-14: spyod lam padma'i dri gtong dang //
T02D1412:397a-15: dbyibs kyi lta stangs zhi ba dang //
T02D1412:397a-16: rnal 'byor pa la zhen pas blta //

T02D1412:397a-21: ni / thugs mi bskyod pa'i rigs so //
T02D1412:397a-22: gang gi dpral bar rtse gsum pa //
T02D1412:397a-23: zhes bya ba ni dpral bar rtse gsum pa'i dbyibs dang /
T02D1412:397a-24: kha dog dmar ser la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang
T02D1412:397a-25: ldan pa ni sgrol ma ste he ru ka'i l'a
T02D1412:397a-26: ma'i rigs so // 'khor lo gang gi dpral ba'am //
T02D1412:397a-27: zhes bya ba ni dbyibs dang kha dog sngon po
T02D1412:397a-28: dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni rnam
T02D1412:397a-29: par snang mdzad kyi rigs so //
T02D1412:397a-30: gang zhig mig sman nag 'dra zhing //
T02D1412:397a-31: kha dog dkar zhing mtho ba dang //
T02D1412:397a-32: zhes bya ba ni dbyibs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1412:397a-33: dang ldan pa'i yum rdo rje phag mo'i rigs so
T02D1412:397a-34: // ser zhing ser ba'i mdog 'drar snang //
T02D1412:397a-35: zhes bya ba'i kha dog dang /
T02D1412:397a-36: mig mi g-yo ba la sogs pa'i dbyibs dang ldan pa'i khanda ro ha'i rigs so //
T02D1412:397a-37: gang zhig rtag par sha la dga' //
T02D1412:397a-38: zhes bya ba spyod lam dang /

T02D1412:397a-40: sprin gyi mdog 'dra'i bud med gang //
T02D1412:397a-41: zhes bya ba'i kha dog dang /
T02D1412:397b-0: so ni mi mnyam par gnas @397b shing ;
T02D1412:397b-2: rtag gdug pa yi las la dga' //
T02D1412:397b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i spyod lam dang ldan pa ni gzugs can ma'i rigs so //
T02D1412:397b-4: mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs 'di dag / ces bya ba ni /
T02D1412:397b-5: rigs gsum yab yum lnga'i tshogs so //
T02D1412:397b-6: zhes bya ba ci'i phyir gsungs she na //

T02D1412:397b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:397b-9: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la phan pa'i phyir ro //

T02D1412:397b-34: dam pa'i chos la dga' ba ni spyod lam gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1412:397b-35: de'i yan lag gi phyag rgya ni rnal 'byor bas mthe chung dang /
T02D1412:397b-36: mthe bo gnyis so sor gshibs la sor mo rnams brkyang ba ni padma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1412:397b-37: lag pa g-yon pas kha spub tu byas pa la
T02D1412:397b-38: g-yas pas de'i steng du kha sbubs nas g-yon pa'i
T02D1412:397b-39: sor mo'i bar du g-yas pa'i sor mo gzhag pa
T02D1412:398a-2: de'i len du rnal 'byor mas padma'i lan ri dags
T02D1412:398a-3: kyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
T02D1412:398a-5: g-yon pa'i khu tshur nu ma g-yon pa'i steng du
T02D1412:398a-6: bzhag pa ni rus sbal gyi lan du rdo rje
T02D1412:398a-7: khu tshur pus mo'i steng du bzhag pa ni byams
T02D1412:398a-8: pa'i phyag rgya'o // tshes bcu la zla mtshan 'byung ba dang /
T02D1412:398a-9: spyod lam ni khyim du padma bri ba'o //
T02D1412:398a-10: de ltar rdo rje rigs kyi l'a ma bshad nas padma rigs kyi l'a ma bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:398a-11: mchu ring zhing mig dkyus ring ba ni dbyibs so //
T02D1412:398a-12: dmar ser ni kha dog go //
T02D1412:398a-13: phyug pa la sogs pa ni yon tan no //
T02D1412:398a-14: ring min thung min ni dbyibs so //
T02D1412:398a-15: sna tshogs pa'i gos la dga' ba ni spyod lam mo //
T02D1412:398a-16: dpral bar ri mo gsum yod pa dang /
T02D1412:398a-17: skra mtshams gyen du bltas pa ni dbyibs so //
T02D1412:398a-18: dgod cing dga' ba la sogs pa ni spyod lam mo //

T02D1412:398a-25: khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa bri ba ni spyod lam mo //
T02D1412:398a-26: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi l'a ma ston pa nas /

T02D1412:398a-28: dmar ser ni kha dog go //
T02D1412:398a-30: dpral ba dar gyis bcings pa ni spyod lam mo //
T02D1412:398a-31: dpral bar ri mo gcig yod cing mgrin pa ring ba ni dbyibs so //

T02D1412:398a-33: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mo bsgrengs nas mdung gi phyag rgya bya ba dang /

T02D1412:398a-37: ma bstan pa ni thung zhing byin pa sbom pa
T02D1412:398a-38: ni dbyibs so // gos ser la dga' ba ni spyod lam mo //
T02D1412:398b-0: bud med de g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyi @398b gung mo bsgreng ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1412:398b-1: gnyis pa dung gi phyag rgya ni sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mo bcu ma pa'o //
T02D1412:398b-2: rnal 'byor mas g-yon nas yongs su ldog pa ni phyag rgya'i lan no //
T02D1412:398b-3: bcu bzhi ni zla mtshan 'byung ba'i dus su //
T02D1412:398b-4: khyim du rdo rje 'dri ba ni spyod lam mo //

T02D1412:398b-7: mig nag cing ser ba ni kha dog go //
T02D1412:398b-8: sbom pa la sogs pa ni dbyibs so //
T02D1412:398b-9: glu mkhas pa ni spyod lam mo //
T02D1412:398b-10: sprin gyi mdog can ni kha dog go //
T02D1412:398b-11: de la rnal 'byor pas lag pa'i sor mo bcu
T02D1412:398b-12: brkyang nas glu'i phyag rgya bstan pa ni khu tshur
T02D1412:398b-13: g-yon nas mdzub mo bsgreng ba mdung gi phyag rgya
T02D1412:398b-14: bstan par bya'o // rnal 'byor mas g-yon nas ldog pa ni phyag rgya'i lan no //
T02D1412:398b-15: tshes bcu gcig ni zla mtshan 'byung ba'i dus so //
T02D1412:398b-16: khyim du rdo rje 'dri ba ni spyod lam mo //
T02D1412:398b-17: le'u bcu dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:398b-19: // / de ltar lha mo gsum gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T02D1412:398b-20: lha mo gsum gyi brda bstan pa ni /

T02D1412:398b-23: de la dang po dbang gi lha mo'i brda bstan te /
T02D1412:398b-24: mkha' 'gro g-yon gyi grva rnams te //

T02D1412:398b-27: lhag mthong stong pa nyid sgom pa ni brda'o //
T02D1412:398b-28: dgos pa ci yin zhe na /
T02D1412:398b-29: spun dang sring mor shes pa'o //
T02D1412:398b-30: kha sbyor dang mnyam sbyor las brda 'di rnams ni
T02D1412:398b-31: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brda yin pas

T02D1412:398b-33: pa'i spyod lam la 'jug pa yin no zhes gsungs
T02D1412:398b-34: so // rgyud 'dir sbyor ba'i dus su spun dang sring mor shes par bya ba dang /

T02D1412:402b-13: ji srid rnal 'byor tshogs rnams ni //

T02D1412:402b-32: thob pa rnams la nam yang sbyin par mi bya'o
T02D1412:402b-33: / // bde can kun zhes bya ba gang yin zhe na //

T02D1412:402b-36: bu mo ni rang gis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1412:402b-37: chung ma ni bla mas gnang ba'o //
T02D1412:402b-38: de rnams shugs kyi rdo rje slob dpon dang bdag
T02D1412:402b-39: nyid dang rang gis dbang bskur ba'i slob ma dang
T02D1412:402b-40: / rnal 'byor ma la ltos te rnal 'byor pa rnams kyang mtshon pa yin no //
T02D1412:402b-41: gang zhig rtag tu sngags sbyin pa //
T02D1412:403a-0: zhes bya ba ni yid skyob par @403a * //
T02D1412:403a-1: byed pa'i sngags de'i dbang byin pa rnal 'byor pa
T02D1412:403a-2: de rnams kyi gtsang sbra gsum po de nyid mngon
T02D1412:403a-3: sum gyi lam gyi cho gar bshad do //
T02D1412:403a-4: de ltar rten gyi gang zag bshad nas /
T02D1412:403a-5: da ni thabs ston pa ni /
T02D1412:403a-6: de nas rnal 'byor rgyud du ni //
T02D1412:403a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:403a-8: rnal 'byor rgyud ni phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di nyid yin te /

T02D1412:403a-10: rnyed dka'i dam tshig nga yis bshad //
T02D1412:403a-11: ces bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po'i ting nge
T02D1412:403a-12: 'dzin dngos su bskyed pa'i thabs ni tshogs kyi 'khor
T02D1412:403a-13: lo yin pas ngas bshad pa yin no //
T02D1412:403a-14: skyes pa bud med g-yon nas 'gro //
T02D1412:403a-15: zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas bde ba dang lhag

T02D1412:403a-19: rigs ldan rnams ni mchod par bya //

T02D1412:403a-23: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo ni zhing ngo //
T02D1412:403a-24: rnam gnas ni dam tshig gi 'khor lo ste gnas brgyad do //
T02D1412:403a-25: de skad du yang kun spyod las //
T02D1412:403a-26: khyim lnga dang ni yul rnams dang //
T02D1412:403a-28: shin tu ring yang shes par 'gyur //
T02D1412:403a-29: zhes bya ba ni kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod
T02D1412:403a-30: lam dang brda rnam pa gsum gyis gnas nyi shu

T02D1412:403a-32: par 'gyur ro // de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshad nas zhi ba'i btung ba bshad pa ni /

T02D1412:403a-36: gzhan med ces bya ba ni zhi ba'i btung ba las gzhan med pa'o //
T02D1412:403a-37: slob dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid yin //

T02D1412:403a-40: no // rgyu 'di rnams su sgrub pa po //

T02D1412:403b-1: legs par gyur pa nyid yin te //
T02D1412:403b-2: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'o //
T02D1412:403b-3: brnyas mi bya zhing spang mi bya //
T02D1412:403b-4: zhes bya ba ni bde ba sgyu ma lta bur
T02D1412:403b-5: rtogs pa'i rgyu yin pas lus ngag gis brnyas par

T02D1412:403b-7: nus pa yis ni mchod par bya //
T02D1412:403b-8: zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i tshe na 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas mnyes par bya'o //
T02D1412:403b-9: de bzhin zhi ba'i btung ba bshad nas pho nya'i gtsang sbra bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:403b-10: k'a ka la sogs brgyad po ni //
T02D1412:403b-12: pho nya'i gtsang sbra'i thog mar zag pa med pa'i
T02D1412:403b-13: sdom pa bsrungs la k'a ka la sogs pa'i lha
T02D1412:403b-14: mo brgyad kyis srung bar byed pa yin no //
T02D1412:403b-15: k'a la sogs pa brgyad ni rnam rgyal la sogs

T02D1412:403b-18: rnam rgyal la sogs khro bo rnams //
T02D1412:403b-19: k'a ka la sogs yang dag sprul //

T02D1412:403b-32: de dag dang kun du sbyor ba ni bsnyen sgrub ma byas par sbyor ba'o //

T02D1412:403b-34: rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang //

T02D1412:404a-16: rgyud rnams kun gyi thun mong ste //

T02D1412:404b-5: 'dres pa ni bskyed rdzogs gnyis ka bsgom pa'o //

T02D1412:405a-0: gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhir rnal @405a * //
T02D1412:405a-1: 'byor pa de rab tu song zhing sgrub pa'o //

T02D1412:405a-3: pa'i yon tan gyi 'khor lo spyod par sgom pa

T02D1412:405a-5: bzhir rgyu zhing rnal 'byor ma 'tshol ba yin no

T02D1412:405a-8: tshe phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba dang pha rol
T02D1412:405a-9: tu phyin pa'i spyod pa bya'o zhes kha sbyor las

T02D1412:405a-13: bcos pa'i bzlas pa 'ang spang bar bya //

T02D1412:405a-15: rnal ma'i sbyor ba'i tshul la min //

T02D1412:405a-18: pho nya'i gzugs su mtshon pa yin //

T02D1412:405a-30: pho nya legs 'dres pas zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1412:405a-31: thams cad las ni sems bsdus nas //
T02D1412:405a-32: nang gi bdag nyid dbye byed pas //
T02D1412:405a-33: gnas pa'i lus kyi reg bya ni //
T02D1412:405a-34: thog ma'i blo ni lhan skyes yin //

T02D1412:405b-0: pa bzhin du bzlas brjod dang bsam @405b gtan med
T02D1412:405b-1: kyang / rnam shes dang ye shes ni rgyu tshogs pa las skye'o //

T02D1412:405b-4: myur ba'i 'bras bu gsum bshad nas /
T02D1412:405b-6: sngags dang phyag rgyas sgrub pa po //
T02D1412:405b-7: mchod pa nyid la rab tu 'jug / ces bya ba gsungs te /

T02D1412:405b-10: phyag rgya ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyag mtshan dang /

T02D1412:405b-17: zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba ste mngon sum gyi lam bstan pa'i snying po yin no //
T02D1412:405b-18: rgyal po ni mi la khur gyis dge slong seng
T02D1412:405b-19: ge ma bsad kyi bar du mtshan nyid kyi theg
T02D1412:405b-20: pa la yang mngon sum gyi lam yod pa yin

T02D1412:409a-2: tshe 'phel ba be sha tva tra zhes bya par 'gyur ro //
