T02D1412:409a-4: mi zad pa bsam gtan gyi bde ba nee ranydza na tvatta zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:409a-5: de la stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pas zag
T02D1412:409a-6: pa med pa'i bde ba bar ma tvatta zhes bya
T02D1412:409a-8: dkar dmar gos ni bsal nas kyang //
T02D1412:409a-9: srog ni nam mkhar chud gyur na //
T02D1412:409a-10: bde ba mi zad rtog med pa /
T02D1412:409a-11: bde ba chen por skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1412:409a-13: dkar dmar gos ni g-yas g-yon gyi rtsa la byang
T02D1412:409a-14: chub kyi sems gnas pa'i chags pas chags bral spangs
T02D1412:409a-15: pa'i bsam gtan gyi bde ba skyes nas bde ba
T02D1412:409a-16: chen po'i rgyas btab nas dbus ma yang 'dor ba
T02D1412:409a-17: yin no // de yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02D1412:409a-18: chags pa ma yin chags bral min //
T02D1412:409a-19: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so //
T02D1412:409a-21: rin chen rdo rje'i zhal snga nas /
T02D1412:409a-22: aa sa ma sa ma zhes bya ba ste mi
T02D1412:409a-23: mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi man ngag yin
T02D1412:409a-24: gyi de yang mngon sum gyi shes pa la nges
T02D1412:409a-25: pa 'dren pa bla ma'i man ngag gis byas nas
T02D1412:409a-26: mngon sum gzhan las nges par 'gyur te //
T02D1412:409a-27: gang la rtog pa med pa skyes kyang snang la
T02D1412:409a-28: nges pas na so sor brtags min ma yin no
T02D1412:409a-29: // gzung dang 'dzin par nges par lhag pa ni
T02D1412:409a-30: chos dang gang zag bdag gi rang bzhin gzung ba
T02D1412:409a-31: dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
T02D1412:409a-32: mngon sum bde ba rtog pa med par skyes pa
T02D1412:409a-33: la nges pa'i shes pa 'dren nus pa ni mngon
T02D1412:409a-34: sum rang las nges pa yin la /
T02D1412:409a-35: gang la ma nges pa des gtsang sbra rnam pa
T02D1412:409a-36: gsum gyis rgyu'i tshogs pas bde ba rtog pa med
T02D1412:409a-37: pa'i nges pa 'dren pa'am bla ma'i mngon sum gyi
T02D1412:409a-38: gzhan don gyis nges pa 'dren pa ni mngon sum
T02D1412:409a-39: gzhan las nges pa yin no //
T02D1412:409a-40: de yang bde ba rtog med rang dang gzhan las
T02D1412:409a-41: nges pa'i bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la stong
T02D1412:409a-42: pa nyid rang dang gzhan las nges pa 'dren pa
T02D1412:409b-0: ni sa dang @409b po'i ye shes yin no //
T02D1412:409b-1: de ltar na gtsang sbra 'di dag rab tu bskyangs pas /
T02D1412:409b-2: gtsang ma dag pa'i rim thob nas //
T02D1412:409b-3: zhes bya ste zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum du skyes pa'o //
T02D1412:409b-5: zhes bya ba ni ci'i phyir 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
T02D1412:409b-6: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:409b-7: de ltar gsang ba'i brtul zhugs dang phan yon dang
T02D1412:409b-8: po bstan nas phan yon gnyis pa rgyud thams cad
T02D1412:409b-9: kyi dngos grub 'grub pa ni de nyid bsdus pa
T02D1412:409b-10: dang bde mchog dang thams cad gsang ba dang dpal
T02D1412:409b-11: mchog dang po dang rdo rje 'jigs byed las gsungs
T02D1412:409b-12: pa'i bzlas pa dang brtul zhugs dang spyod pa la
T02D1412:409b-13: sogs pas grub pa ni 'dir gtsang sbra gsum gyi
T02D1412:409b-14: bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis skad cig gis
T02D1412:409b-16: de ltar phan yon gnyis pa bshad nas /
T02D1412:409b-17: grol ba'i lam pa'i phan yon gsungs pa ni /
T02D1412:409b-18: rnal 'byor lam pa dga' bas kyang //
T02D1412:409b-20: rnal 'byor gyi lam ni chos dang dam tshig gi
T02D1412:409b-21: phyag rgya bsgom pa grol ba'i lam yin pas phyag
T02D1412:409b-22: rgya de nyid la brten nas gtsang sbra 'di yang
T02D1412:409b-24: grol ba'i lam pa de'i bsod nams ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1412:409b-25: gtsang sbra las byung ba'i yon tan rgya chen po
T02D1412:409b-26: de ni gang zag stong phrag du mas kha stong
T02D1412:409b-27: phrag du ma'i sgo nas yon tan brjod kyis mi
T02D1412:409b-28: lang ba'o // yon tan gsum pa bshad nas mchod pa'i phan yon ni /
T02D1412:409b-29: dpal ldan khrag 'thung ye shes che //
T02D1412:409b-31: dpal bde mchog gi rnam shes dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1412:409b-32: rnam dag mtshan nyid ni kun sgrub pa la ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'o //
T02D1412:409b-33: bde ba'i bsod nams chu 'thungs pa'i //
T02D1412:409b-35: byang chub kyi sems bzlog pa'o //
T02D1412:409b-36: dag byed sdig pa 'jig byed yin //
T02D1412:409b-37: zhes pa ni rnam shes kyi bsam gtan gyi sdig
T02D1412:409b-38: pa dag cing sems kyi nyon mongs pa dang shes
T02D1412:409b-40: de ltar chags pa'i lam pa'i phan yon bzhi pa bstan nas /
T02D1412:409b-41: lnga pa chos kyi phyag rgya'i phan yon bstan pa ni /
T02D1412:409b-42: reg pa dang ni smras pas kyang //
T02D1412:409b-43: sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur //
T02D1412:410a-2: smra ba rna bas thos pa nas reg pa lus
T02D1412:410a-3: kyis myong ba'i bar gyis chos kyi phyag rgya la
T02D1412:410a-4: dmigs na sdig pa las grol bar 'gyur zhing mig
T02D1412:410a-5: gi yul gzugs su dag cing skyon med pa'o //
T02D1412:410a-6: gzugs la rtog pa dang bral ba'i bde ba skyes
T02D1412:410a-7: nas gang zhig spyod pa'o zhes bya ba smos te
T02D1412:410a-8: / mchog gi dngos grub bde bar gshegs pa'i sa
T02D1412:410a-9: bcu gcig pa thob pa dang bde bar gshegs pa'i
T02D1412:410a-10: rigs su skyes pa'i lha'i rgyal por 'gyur te /
T02D1412:410a-11: dngos grub 'bring dang mi'i rgyal por gyur ba'i dngos grub tha ma yin no //
T02D1412:410a-12: de ltar brtul zhugs phan yon dang bcas pa bshad nas /
T02D1412:410a-13: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtor ma bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:410a-14: de ltar tu mchod byas nas //
T02D1412:410a-16: mchod pa ni gtsang sbra gsum gyis mchod pa'o //
T02D1412:410a-17: dad pa yis ni gtor ma sbyin ;
T02D1412:410a-18: / zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum la mos pa yid kyi dad pa dang /
T02D1412:410a-19: de'i bstan pa bsrung ba la dad pa dang /
T02D1412:410a-20: de'i bstan pa bsrung ba la dad pas 'khor gsum dag pa'i gtor ma gtang bar bya'o //
T02D1412:410a-21: ji bzhin cho ga'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1412:410a-22: zhes bya ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus su
T02D1412:410a-23: bdag nyid rnal 'byor ba bzhis lhar bskyed pa dang
T02D1412:410a-24: ci 'byor ba'i rdzas la yam las rlung gi dkyil
T02D1412:410a-25: 'khor dang / ram las me'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1412:410a-26: de'i steng du kam gsum las bskyed pa'i thod pa'i sgyed pu dang /
T02D1412:410a-27: yi ge kam las bskyed pa'i thod pa stong gsum
T02D1412:410a-28: gyi tshad tsam bsams la bdud rtsi lnga'i gang bu
T02D1412:410a-30: aom aa: h'um gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1412:410a-31: tha mal ba'i kha zas dag cing lha'i kha zas su zhu ba dang /
T02D1412:410a-32: ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang bar byas pa brtan par byed pa'i sngags 'dis //
T02D1412:410a-33: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rmm'a n'am
T02D1412:410a-34: a'adya nutpa nna tv'ata ces bya ba lan lnga'i bar
T02D1412:410a-36: de'i mdun du ae gru gsum gyi dbus su bhru'um las gzhal yas khang bskyed la /
T02D1412:410a-37: dbus su bcom ldan 'das 'byung bo thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'i phyag tu bum pa bsams la /
T02D1412:410b-1: byang du ru dra chen po /
T02D1412:410b-5: me'i mtshams su mi srun pa /
T02D1412:410b-6: bden bral du dga' ba las 'das pa /
T02D1412:410b-7: rlung du log 'dren te thams cad kyang zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa /
T02D1412:410b-10: kha tv'am ga dang mdung rtse gsum pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D1412:410b-11: gnag pa dang ser ba dang /
T02D1412:410b-12: dmar ba dang dkar ba'i mdog can /
T02D1412:410b-13: mtshams na gnas pa yid 'phrog pa'i gzugs gnyis pa
T02D1412:410b-14: shar phyogs kyi nag po chen po la tsa munda
T02D1412:410b-17: bka' zlog ma bzhis bskor ba'o //
T02D1412:410b-18: byang gi ru dra las rgyal ma dang /
T02D1412:410b-21: gzhan gyis mi thub mas bskor ba'o //
T02D1412:410b-22: nub kyi lha sbyin la bzang mo dang /
T02D1412:410b-25: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis bskor ba'o ;
T02D1412:410b-26: / lhor nag po la dbang mo dang /
T02D1412:410b-29: sdang ba mo rnams kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1412:410b-30: dbang ldan du gtsigs pa la 'phyang ma dang /
T02D1412:410b-33: mar me ma rnams kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1412:410b-34: me mtshams kyi mi srun ma la 'joms ma dang /
T02D1412:410b-37: gzugs chen ma bzhis bskor ba'o //
T02D1412:410b-38: bden bral du dga' ba las 'das pa la mche ba can dang /
T02D1412:410b-41: kha tr'am can rnams kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1412:410b-42: rlung du log 'dren la ral gri can dang /
T02D1412:410b-45: gzhu can ma rnams kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1412:410b-46: de'i phyi rol du dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor pa la phyogs skyong brgyad dang /
T02D1412:410b-51: ma mo brgyad kyis bskor bar bsams la /
T02D1412:410b-52: zhi ba la thams cad dkar po /
T02D1412:410b-53: rgyas pa la thams cad ser po /
T02D1412:410b-54: dbang la thams cad dmar po /
T02D1412:410b-55: mngon spyod la thams cad nag po /
T02D1412:410b-56: lha mo sum cu rtsa gnyis ni thams cad kyang gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pa /
T02D1412:411a-0: dru khrod brgyad kyi phyogs skyong ba ni @411a * //
T02D1412:411a-4: byang du dbyug pa thogs pa /
T02D1412:411a-5: mtshams bzhir rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang /
T02D1412:411a-8: mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa /
T02D1412:411a-9: phrin las bzhi'i mdog can no //
T02D1412:411a-10: ae a'a ralli he zhes bya ba'i sngags dang skye
T02D1412:411a-11: gnas kyi phyag rgyas spyan drangs pa la mchod pa
T02D1412:411a-12: dbul lo // de lta bu'i mgron bsams nas dus nam gyi tshe mchod ce na /
T02D1412:411a-13: mar gyi ngo yi tshes bcu dang //
T02D1412:411a-14: zla ba yar ngor ma gyur pa //
T02D1412:411a-15: myur du 'bad pas mchod bya ste //
T02D1412:411a-17: tshes bcu ni zhag dang po la gnas kyi lha mo dang /
T02D1412:411a-18: gnyis pa la nye ba'i gnas kyi lha mo dang /
T02D1412:411a-20: bzhi pa la nye ba'i zhing dang /
T02D1412:411a-21: lnga pa la tshando ha dang /
T02D1412:411a-22: drug pa la nye ba'i tshando ha dang /
T02D1412:411a-24: brgyad pa la nye ba'i 'du sa dang /
T02D1412:411a-25: dgu pa la dur khrod dang /
T02D1412:411a-26: bcu pa la nye ba'i dur khrod kyi lha mo tshang bar gyur ba'i tshe mchod par bya'o //
T02D1412:411a-27: cis mchod par bya zhe na /
T02D1412:411a-28: rdo rje lha mo myos byed shas //
T02D1412:411a-30: lo bcu drug ma'i snying dang /
T02D1412:411a-33: skye bo dad pas mchod bya zhing //
T02D1412:411a-34: zhes bya ba ste tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i lha mo la'o //
T02D1412:411a-35: ci zhig sgom zhing zhe na /
T02D1412:411a-37: ting nge 'dzin ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1412:411a-38: mngon par dga' ba zhi gnas dang /
T02D1412:411a-39: gus pa'i sems lhag mthong gi ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
T02D1412:411a-40: de rnams la gnas mchog mi 'phrog / ces bya
T02D1412:411a-41: ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang gtor ma byas
T02D1412:411a-42: nas dngos grub gzhan gyis 'phrog par mi nus pa'o
T02D1412:411a-43: // spyod lam ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1412:411a-44: mtshan mo'i brtul zhugs can gtor ma //
T02D1412:411a-45: skra grol gcer bur gyur bas sbyin //
T02D1412:411a-47: phan yon ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1412:411a-48: shr'i he ru ka bdag sbyor bas /
T02D1412:411a-51: dpal he ru ka'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa sa
T02D1412:411a-52: rdo rje thal mo gye na du kha phye la
T02D1412:411a-53: aom kha kh'a hi zhes bya ba nas sa h'a
T02D1412:411a-54: yi k'a bha bantu zhes bya ba'i bar du bsngo
T02D1412:411b-0: zhing mgron rnams kyi lce la rdo rje @411b rtse
T02D1412:411b-1: lnga pa'i sbu gus gtor ma 'thung bar bsam par
T02D1412:411b-2: bya'o // le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:411b-4: // / de ltar rang don phun sum tshogs pa bstan
T02D1412:411b-5: nas gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa ston pa ni
T02D1412:411b-6: / de nas mchod pa rnam dag pa //
T02D1412:411b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1412:411b-8: mchod pa ni sgrub pa'i mchod pa ste gtsang sbra rnam pa gsum mo //
T02D1412:411b-9: rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'o //
T02D1412:411b-10: sprul pa las byung dpa' bo rnams //
T02D1412:411b-11: zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i yul lha mo drug cu'o //
T02D1412:411b-12: de bzhin du bdag nyid dpal he ru ka yab yum la yang mchod pa'o //
T02D1412:411b-13: sangs rgyas kun sogs zhes bya ba ni rnam par
T02D1412:411b-14: snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba
T02D1412:411b-15: mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa bum pa'i gzugs
T02D1412:411b-16: su snang ba'o // sogs zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D1412:411b-18: dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma'o //
T02D1412:411b-19: sras bcas zhes bya ba la sras ni dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1412:411b-20: bcas zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro ma sum cu rtsa drug go //
T02D1412:411b-21: dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1412:411b-22: zhes bya ba ni sngar sras bcas zhes bya ba'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T02D1412:411b-23: brtan pa dang g-yo ba zhes bya ba ni brtan pa ni gzhal yas khang ngo //
T02D1412:411b-24: g-yo ba ni brten pa lha'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1412:411b-25: zla ba 'dus pa la gnas pas //
T02D1412:411b-26: zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i yul de rnams la gtsang sbra gsum gyis mchod pa'o //
T02D1412:411b-27: mchod pa'i yul gyi lha de rnams ji lta bu yin zhe na ;
T02D1412:411b-28: spun dang sdug pa mchod pa yin //
T02D1412:411b-31: me tog gi tshom bu dang /
T02D1412:411b-34: sku phyag rgya chen po bkod pa rnams spangs nas dpa' bo dang /
T02D1412:411b-35: dpa' mo lhar bsgom pa'i lha'i 'khor lo ste spun
T02D1412:411b-36: ni dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang sdug pa
T02D1412:411b-37: ni lha mo sum cu rtsa drug go //
T02D1412:411b-38: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:411b-39: thog mar rten gyi gang zag ston pa las de
T02D1412:411b-40: yang dngos por bya ba'i gang zag bstan pa ni
T02D1412:411b-41: / spun dang bu dang lhan cig tu //
T02D1412:412a-0: @412a * // spun ni 'jig rten du grags pa'o //
T02D1412:412a-1: bu ni rigs rgyud bsrung ba'o //
T02D1412:412a-2: de dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten pa'i bde ba dang /
T02D1412:412a-3: 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad kyi bdag
T02D1412:412a-4: nyid 'byung bas rang la brnyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir
T02D1412:412a-5: sngags te tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D1412:412a-6: de bzhin du phyag rgya ni ba'i btung ba dang /
T02D1412:412a-7: ye shes ni pho nya'i gtsang sbra ste de rnams la bstan par mi bya'o //
T02D1412:412a-8: su la bstan par bya zhe na /
T02D1412:412a-9: dag byed zas la spyod pa ni /
T02D1412:412a-10: rtag tu dam tshig spyad byas 'gyur //
T02D1412:412a-12: dag byed kyi zas ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'o //
T02D1412:412a-13: rtag tu dam tshig byed pa ni /
T02D1412:412a-14: bza' bar byed pa'i dam tshig ste rang bzhin brgyad
T02D1412:412a-15: cu dang bral bas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la
T02D1412:412a-16: spyod pa'o // gsang sngags su la'ang bstan mi bya //
T02D1412:412a-17: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i btung ba mi bstan pa'o //
T02D1412:412a-18: man ngag rnams ni nyams mi bya //
T02D1412:412a-19: zhes bya ba ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i man ngag go //
T02D1412:412a-20: gtsang sbra gsum po de sbyin par bya ba'i gnas ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1412:412a-21: dam tshig rnams la ci rigs par //
T02D1412:412a-23: rig pa'i dbang bskur ba la dpa' bo gcig pu sbyin pa dang /
T02D1412:412a-24: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sbyin pa dang /
T02D1412:412a-25: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la mi zab pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan pa dang /
T02D1412:412a-26: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa
T02D1412:412a-27: la zab pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni ci rigs
T02D1412:412a-29: man ngag rnams kyang sbyin par bya //
T02D1412:412a-30: zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi gzhan don gyis
T02D1412:412a-31: bde ba stong pa nyid la nges par 'dren pa'i
T02D1412:412a-32: thabs / bla mas slob ma'i rna drung du //
T02D1412:412a-33: rab tu 'bad de bshad par bya //
T02D1412:412a-34: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1412:412a-35: de ltar blang bya dang dor bya'i rten gyi gang
T02D1412:412a-36: zag bstan nas sbyor ba'i mchod pa gzhan las bshad
T02D1412:412a-37: pa ni / pho nya ma gtogs gzhan dag la //
T02D1412:412a-39: dbang ma bskur ba dang bsnyen sgrub bzhis ma sbyangs pa'o //
T02D1412:412a-40: 'dod la rmongs pas bgrod mi bya //
T02D1412:412b-0: zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa ni rnam par shes pa la @412b zhen pa'o //
T02D1412:412b-1: rmongs pa ni ye shes la rmongs pa'o //
T02D1412:412b-2: bgrod mi bya ni rnam shes dang ye shes la sems pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi bya'o //
T02D1412:412b-3: de ltar dor bya'i pho nya bsgrub pa mdor bstan nas sa blang bya mdor bstan pa ni /
T02D1412:412b-4: pho nya mo zhen rtag thar pa /
T02D1412:412b-5: lnga pa yis kyang longs spyod bya ;
T02D1412:412b-6: / zhes bya ba la pho nya mo las rtag tu zhen pa las grol ba dang /
T02D1412:412b-7: byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags bzhin du gzung 'dzin gnyis las 'das pa'i longs spyod bya ba'o //
T02D1412:412b-9: dor bya'i rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:412b-10: skye gnas dman la mi gnas la //
T02D1412:412b-11: bsnyen bkur nyid ni bya ba min //
T02D1412:412b-13: skye gnas dman pa ni dbang bskur ba thob pa dang /
T02D1412:412b-14: bsnyen sgrub bzhis ma sbyangs pa'o //
T02D1412:412b-15: mi gnas pa ni 'dod chags kyi zhen pa med pa'o //
T02D1412:412b-16: bsnyen bkur bya ba ma yin pa ni rmongs pas
T02D1412:412b-17: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa gus pas mi bya'o
T02D1412:412b-18: // blang bar bya ba'i rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:412b-19: ma dang sring mo bu mo dang //
T02D1412:412b-20: chung ma pho nya mo nyid gnas //
T02D1412:412b-22: sngar bstan pa'i sngags skyes rnams so //
T02D1412:412b-23: gnas zhes bya ba ni de dang gtsang sbra rnam pa gsum spyod pa la gnas pa'o //
T02D1412:412b-24: pho nya ma gtogs ba la brten pas nyes pa cir 'gyur snyam na /
T02D1412:412b-25: dka' thub nyes pas zad par 'gyur //
T02D1412:412b-27: bsam gtan dang zag med kyi dka' thub gzung 'dzin
T02D1412:412b-28: gyi rnam par rtog pa skyes pa zad par 'gyur
T02D1412:412b-29: ro // blang bar bya bas 'bras bu ji ltar 'gyur ba ni /
T02D1412:412b-30: 'khor lo'am de bzhin grub pa yi //
T02D1412:412b-32: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo tshogs kyi dngos grub bam /
T02D1412:412b-33: de bzhin du 'jig rten dang mchog gi dngos grub bo //
T02D1412:412b-34: mchog dang tha ma lhan cig gus //
T02D1412:412b-36: mchog ye shes las skyes pa'o //
T02D1412:412b-37: tha ma ni sngags las skyes pa'o //
T02D1412:412b-38: shugs kyi bar ma gnas las skyes pa yang bsdu'o //
T02D1412:412b-39: lhan cig 'gugs zhes bya ba ni //
T02D1412:412b-40: srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud pa'o //
T02D1412:412b-41: de ltar rdzas rnams nges pa med //
T02D1412:413a-0: ces bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems dga' bral du ma btang bas bde ba @413a * //
T02D1412:413a-1: rtog pa med pa bsam gtan gyis sdom par nges pa'o //
T02D1412:413a-2: yid ni nang du chud pa yis //
T02D1412:413a-3: 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya //
T02D1412:413a-4: zhes bya ba bshad pa yin no //
T02D1412:413a-5: de ltar sbyor bas mchod pa bshad nas //
T02D1412:413a-6: dngos gzhi brtul zhugs bshad pa ni ;
T02D1412:413a-7: /'jig rten la rtag g-yon nas spyod //
T02D1412:413a-9: padma rdo rje'i zhal snga nas 'jig rten ni mchog
T02D1412:413a-10: tu gyur ba'i 'jig rten tshogs kyi 'khor lo g-yon
T02D1412:413a-11: nas spyod pa ni dga' ba gsum gyi ting nge
T02D1412:413a-12: 'dzin bsgom pa'o // rkang pa g-yon pa sngon du dor //
T02D1412:413a-13: zhes bya ba shes rab la la n'a las byang chub kyi sems phab pa'o //
T02D1412:413a-14: lag pa g-yon pa yongs su bsgyur //
T02D1412:413a-15: zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi la la n'a las byang chub kyi sems 'bebs pa'o //
T02D1412:413a-16: g-yon gyi phyed la rab mchod byed //
T02D1412:413a-17: ces bya ba ni lha mo sum cu rtsa drug
T02D1412:413a-18: dkyil 'khor gyi phyed yin pas dga' ba bzhis mchod
T02D1412:413a-19: pa'o // lus kyi g-yon ni rnam par khyab //
T02D1412:413a-20: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa la la n'a'i byang
T02D1412:413a-21: chub kyi sems phab nas 'khor lo bzhi la khyab
T02D1412:413a-22: pa'o // g-yon pa yis ni tshim dang za //
T02D1412:413a-23: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa la la n'a nas phab nas /
T02D1412:413a-24: g-yas pa ra sa n'a'i rlung gis bzlog nas za
T02D1412:413a-25: ba ni 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi dngos grub dang
T02D1412:413a-26: bcud kyi len gyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:413a-27: brtul zhugs ma nyams brtul zhugs rdzogs //
T02D1412:413a-28: zhes bya ba ni dbus ma aa wa dh'u t'i'i
T02D1412:413a-29: rlung dang sbrags nas byang chub kyi sems gyen du
T02D1412:413a-30: bzlog pas bsam gtan dang zag med kyi sdom pa'i
T02D1412:413a-32: sgrub pa pos ni dam tshig brtson //
T02D1412:413a-33: zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po brtul zhugs spyod pa'i tshe ye shes las skyes pa dang /
T02D1412:413a-34: zhing las skyes pa dang sngags las skyes pa'i dam tshig bsgrub pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1412:413a-35: dam tshig rigs las spyod pa dang //
T02D1412:413a-36: zhes bya ba ni dung can dang padma can dang ri dags can no //
T02D1412:413a-37: lhan cig zas la spyod par byed //
T02D1412:413a-38: ces bya ba ni mchog dga'i dus yin te /
T02D1412:413a-39: dga' ba thab skyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1412:413b-0: mchog dga' shes rab @413b rang bzhin no //
T02D1412:413b-2: rigs lnga ru ni kun spyod pa //
T02D1412:413b-3: zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim par lha'i 'khor lor gnas pa'o //
T02D1412:413b-4: rigs ni rnam pa bzhi ru bsgrags //
T02D1412:413b-5: zhes bya ba ni rgyal rigs la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D1412:413b-6: de ltar bstan bcos las grags pa'i rigs lnga dang /
T02D1412:413b-7: 'jig rten pa las grags pa'i rigs rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D1412:413b-8: gtsang sbra gsum la gnas pa bde ba chen po'i rigs gcig la gnas pa'o //
T02D1412:413b-9: rnal 'byor sgrub phyir rtag tu bskyed //
T02D1412:413b-10: ces bya ba ni gtsang sbra gsum gyi dngos grub kyi brtul zhugs la spyod pa'o //
T02D1412:413b-11: de ltar brtul zhugs bshad nas /
T02D1412:413b-12: rjes kyi spyod pa bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:413b-13: ba lang sha dang rta sha dang //
T02D1412:413b-14: mi dang khyi sha sna tshogs pas //
T02D1412:413b-15: zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga dang dpa' bo lnga'i sreg rdzas so //
T02D1412:413b-16: dkyil 'khor grug sum byas nas ni //
T02D1412:413b-17: zhes bya ba ni ma lha lhar bskyed pa dang /
T02D1412:413b-18: ye shes sems dpa' bskyed la sbyin sreg gis mchod
T02D1412:413b-19: na sangs rgyas kyang nges par 'jig par 'gyur ro
T02D1412:413b-20: // de ltar phyi'i sbyin sreg bshad nas //
T02D1412:413b-21: de bzhin dpa' bo rnams kyi zas //
T02D1412:413b-22: zhes bya ba ni nang gi sbyin sreg bstan pa yin te /
T02D1412:413b-23: lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang nang gi 'khor lo bzhi'i
T02D1412:413b-24: gnas su lha'i 'khor lo bkod la zhi rgyas la
T02D1412:413b-26: lag pa g-yas g-yon dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyi
T02D1412:413b-27: mtshan nyid dang yang dag par ldan pas shr'i he
T02D1412:413b-28: ru ka sprul pa'i 'khor lo lnga dang sprul pa
T02D1412:413b-29: yin no // bstan bcos kun la rnam par mtshon //
T02D1412:413b-30: zhes bya ba ni gzhi dang thabs dang 'bras bu
T02D1412:413b-31: gsum rgyud gzhan las kha bskangs la rtogs par bya
T02D1412:413b-32: ba yin no // de ltar nang gi sbyin sreg bshad nas //
T02D1412:413b-33: gzungs ni rtag tu bsrung bya zhing //
T02D1412:413b-34: zhes bya ba ni grol ba'i lam pa'i gsang ba'i sbyin sreg ste /
T02D1412:413b-35: gzungs ni rlung me'i drod can no //
T02D1412:413b-36: rtag tu bsrung ba ni 'khor lo bzhi la rlung
T02D1412:413b-37: me'i drod can bskyed nas byang chub kyi sems 'dzin
T02D1412:413b-38: pa'o // las rnams dag ni thams cad la //
T02D1412:414a-0: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams @414a * //
T02D1412:414a-3: zhes bya ba ni bar chad med pas 'di dag gzhan dag tu 'gyur ba ma yin pa ste /
T02D1412:414a-4: rlung ni rgyun las bzlog pa srid //
T02D1412:414a-5: nyi zla thang la lhung yang srid de thabs 'dis ni dngos grub gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1412:414a-6: de ltar grol lam gyi gsang ba'i sbyin sreg bshad nas chags pa'i sbyin sreg bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:414a-7: 'di ni pho nya bzhin bzang po //
T02D1412:414a-8: brtson zhing lhan cig ldan pa yin //
T02D1412:414a-9: zhes bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'i bha ga'i
T02D1412:414a-10: dkyil 'khor du gsang ba'i rdo rje dgang gzar gyis
T02D1412:414a-11: dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi blugs gzar gyis
T02D1412:414a-12: byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags bzhin du ma chags
T02D1412:414a-13: dga' ba'i longs spyod rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:414a-15: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgyad cu las rnam
T02D1412:414a-16: par phye nas dga' ba gsum gyi rang bzhin rtogs
T02D1412:414a-17: pa yin no // de yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02D1412:414a-18: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las //
T02D1412:414a-19: ye shes sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //
T02D1412:414a-20: ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba ni //
T02D1412:414a-21: gsal bar de las mtshon par 'gyur //
T02D1412:414a-23: chags lam gyi sbyin sreg bshad nas bla na med pa'i sbyin sreg ni /
T02D1412:414a-24: bla ma'i man ngag la dga' zhing /
T02D1412:414a-25: de yi don mchog mtshungs pa'o //
T02D1412:414a-27: dbang bzhi pa sems kyi stong nyid rtogs pa na /
T02D1412:414a-28: bla ma'i man ngag la dga' zhing /
T02D1412:414a-29: de'i don sems kyi stong nyid kyi mchog yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D1412:414a-31: bde bar gshegs pa rtag tu skye med chos //
T02D1412:414a-32: chos rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs dang 'dra //
T02D1412:414a-34: klu sgrub kyi zhal nas kyang /
T02D1412:414a-35: 'gro ba'i chos kun rnam shes kyi //
T02D1412:414a-36: me yi bud shing yin par 'dod //
T02D1412:414a-37: de dag ji bzhin rnam byed pa //
T02D1412:414a-38: me yis bsregs na myur zhing 'gyur //
T02D1412:414a-40: phyi'i sbyin sreg ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang kha sbyor las blta bar bya'o //
T02D1412:414a-41: gsang ba dang bla na med pa'i sbyin sreg kyang
T02D1412:414a-42: kha sbyor gyi le'u drug par bshad pas 'dir rgya
T02D1412:414a-44: le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:414b-0: // / de ltar le'u @414b dang po'i rgyas par bshad pa le'u gsum gyis bshad nas /
T02D1412:414b-1: dbang bzhi pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lam bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:414b-2: de nas gzhan yang bstan pa ni //
T02D1412:414b-4: gtsang sbra gsum gyi rjes la dbang bzhi pa ston pa na gzhan yang ngo //
T02D1412:414b-5: pho nya'i mtshan nyid rigs rnams te //
T02D1412:414b-6: zhes bya ba ni ye shes las skyes pa'i lha
T02D1412:414b-7: mo padma can dang dung can ma dang ri dags
T02D1412:414b-8: can me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du reg bya'i
T02D1412:414b-9: stong pa nyid ston par nus pa'o //
T02D1412:414b-10: de'i mtshan nyid ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o //
T02D1412:414b-11: dam tshig la gnas mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1412:414b-12: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig ni gnyis te /
T02D1412:414b-13: bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang /
T02D1412:414b-14: zag pa med pa'i sdom pa'o //
T02D1412:414b-16: rtog med bsam gtan gyis nam mkhar 'gro ba dang /
T02D1412:414b-17: gnyis med lhag mthong gis nam mkha' 'gro ba'o //
T02D1412:414b-18: gang gis yang dag shes 'gyur ba ;
T02D1412:414b-19: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang
T02D1412:414b-20: byang chub sems dpar gang gis mtshan nyid dang brda
T02D1412:414b-21: las shes pa'o // de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas
T02D1412:414b-22: par bshad pa ni ye shes las skyes pa'i lha
T02D1412:414b-23: mo'i mtshan nyid ston pa ni /
T02D1412:414b-24: spun dang yang na ma dang ni //
T02D1412:414b-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1412:414b-26: rnal 'byor bas sring mor shes pa dang /
T02D1412:414b-27: rnal 'byor mas ming por shes pas na spun no //
T02D1412:414b-28: yang na rnal 'byor mas phar shes pa dang /
T02D1412:414b-29: rnal 'byor pas bu mor shes pa'o //
T02D1412:414b-30: yang na rnal 'byor mas bdag por shes pa dang /
T02D1412:414b-31: rnal 'byor pas phyag rgyar shes pa'o //
T02D1412:414b-32: lam du mar goms par bya zhe na /
T02D1412:414b-33: skad cig gis mthong zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1412:414b-34: dbang bzhi pa'i dus su so so rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis sems kyi chos nyid rtogs pa'o //
T02D1412:414b-36: pha ni bde ba gang thob pa //
T02D1412:414b-37: bde de rang gis longs spyod bya //
T02D1412:414b-38: 'chi ba'i bde ba gang yin pa //
T02D1412:414b-39: bde 'dir bsam gtan zhes byar brjod //
T02D1412:414b-41: de ltar mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1412:414b-42: lce sbom mig ni dmar ser la //
T02D1412:414b-46: bzhin 'phel che zhing nu rgyas pa //
T02D1412:414b-47: lus pa thung zhing skra yang thung //
T02D1412:415a-2: padma glang chen ma zhes grags //
T02D1412:415a-4: mig dang lta stangs ri dags 'dra //
T02D1412:415a-5: ri dags pa brgyad po'i rkang pa can //
T02D1412:415a-6: skal bzangs padma'i dri dang ldan //
T02D1412:415a-7: mig ni dmar ser la zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1412:415a-8: dmar zhing cung zad ser ba ste /
T02D1412:415a-9: ma li ka yi dri 'byung zhing //
T02D1412:415a-10: bder gshegs 'dus pa nyid dga' ba //
T02D1412:415a-11: bud med dngos grub ster bar byed //
T02D1412:415a-13: rtsub cing yan lag rtsub pa dang //
T02D1412:415a-14: le lo ldan zhing mtshan nyid ngan //
T02D1412:415a-15: skra ni 'khyil zhing kham par gnas //
T02D1412:415a-16: mdo gang na yan lag rtsub pa'o //
T02D1412:415a-17: de ltar glang chen ma dang /
T02D1412:415a-20: dung can ma'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1412:415a-21: des dngos grub ci zhig bskyed ce na /
T02D1412:415a-22: thog mar dga' ba'i stong pa nyid la sems zin
T02D1412:415a-23: pa ni dngos grub kun gyi thun mong du ste
T02D1412:415a-24: / 'jig rten dang thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub bskyed pa yin no //
T02D1412:415a-25: bzlas dang brtul zhugs la rtag dga' //
T02D1412:415a-26: zhes bya ba ni bzlas pa srog aa wa dh'u
T02D1412:415a-27: t'ir bcu ga na brtul zhugs rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D1412:415a-28: kyi dus su dga' ba'i stong pa nyid rtogs nas
T02D1412:415a-29: de la rgyun mi 'chad cing brtan pa yang dag
T02D1412:415a-30: pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1412:415a-31: des phan yon ci zhig 'grub ce na /
T02D1412:415a-32: pho nya mo sogs gnas dang bcas //
T02D1412:415a-34: mkha' 'gro ma bcu gnyis dang gnas nyi shu rtsa
T02D1412:415a-35: bzhin gnas pa dang bcas pa ni sku gsung thugs
T02D1412:415a-36: kyi mkha' 'gro ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1412:415a-37: de dag dang bcas pa'i lha mo sum cu rtsa
T02D1412:415a-38: bdun gyi spyod pa 'jig rten gyi dngos grub dang
T02D1412:415a-39: / thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub ster par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:415a-40: de ltar dga' ba stong pa nyid rnal 'byor bshad
T02D1412:415a-41: nas mchog dga'i stong pa nyid rjes su rnal 'byor
T02D1412:415a-42: bshad pa ni / 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa //
T02D1412:415a-44: dngos grub gsum sgrub par byed pa'o //
T02D1412:415a-45: rtsa ba'i sngags sogs rtag tu bzlas //
T02D1412:415a-46: zhes bya ba ni mchog dga'i rnam par smin pa'i dus su srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud pa'o //
T02D1412:415a-48: rgyud dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum //
T02D1412:415b-1: mi rgyu ba snod kyi 'jig rten no //
T02D1412:415b-2: snod bcud kyi 'jig rten gsum po de dag mchog
T02D1412:415b-3: dga' bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis shin tu stong pa'i
T02D1412:415b-5: de dag las 'byung ba yin zhe na /
T02D1412:415b-8: srog aa wa dh'u t'ir bcug nas mchog dga' shin
T02D1412:415b-9: tu stong pa 'di las snang srid bde ba can
T02D1412:415b-10: gyi rang bzhin du shes pa'o //
T02D1412:415b-11: de ltar mchog dga' shin tu stong pa rjes su
T02D1412:415b-12: rnal 'byor bshad nas lhan cig skyes dga'i tshe stong
T02D1412:415b-13: pa chen po shin tu rnal 'byor bshad pa ni
T02D1412:415b-14: // sgrub pa po ni dngos grub rtsom //
T02D1412:415b-15: zhes bya ba ni yid bde ba lhan cig skyes pa'i stong pa chen po la rtsom pa'o //
T02D1412:415b-16: sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag ldan //
T02D1412:415b-17: zhes bya ba ni srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud pa dang /
T02D1412:415b-18: phyag rgya chen po yid bde ba nyid dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
T02D1412:415b-19: phyag rgya dang bral gsang sngags ni //
T02D1412:415b-20: lus can rnams la byin mi rlob //
T02D1412:415b-22: sems kyi stong nyid kyi phyag rgya dang bral na
T02D1412:415b-23: gsang sngags srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud kyang rnal
T02D1412:415b-24: 'byor pa la phyag rgya chen po bsam gyis mi
T02D1412:415b-25: khyab pas byin gyis mi rlob pa'o //
T02D1412:415b-26: stong pa chen po skyes pa'i rtags ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1412:415b-27: ji srid dro ba'i bya ba dag / ces bya ba smos te /
T02D1412:415b-28: gzung ba bkag nas drod kyi ye shes skyes pa dang /
T02D1412:415b-29: stong pa chen po'i rang bzhin bsam gtan dang po'i
T02D1412:415b-30: bde ba la stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa
T02D1412:415b-32: de yang ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1412:415b-34: sku gsung thugs la 'debs pas na //
T02D1412:415b-35: shes rab phyag rgya rjes su brjod //
T02D1412:415b-38: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02D1412:415b-39: lha yi sku ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1412:415b-41: dro ba'i rtags de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1412:415b-43: dang por shes rab dro ba yin //
T02D1412:415b-44: gnyis pa du mar ldan pa yin //
T02D1412:415b-46: bzhi pa mar me 'bar ba ste //

T02D1412:419a-42: phyag lhag ma drug na lcags kyu dang /
T02D1412:419b-0: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can @419b rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1412:419b-1: g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'jigs byed chen po dang dus mtshan mnan pas /
T02D1412:419b-2: de'i thugs ka'i yi ge h'um las khro bcu skad
T02D1412:419b-3: cig mas sprul la shar du rdo rje gtum po
T02D1412:419b-4: byang du rdo rje nyi ma /
T02D1412:419b-5: nub tu rdo rje gcug hor [*gtsug tor?]/
T02D1412:419b-7: shar lho mtshams su rdo rje gnod sbyin /
T02D1412:419b-8: lho nub tu rdo rje nag po //
T02D1412:419b-9: nub byang du rdo rje stobs po che /
T02D1412:419b-10: byang shar du rdo rje 'jigs byed de /
T02D1412:419b-11: steng du rdo rje gtsug tor /
T02D1412:419b-12: 'og tu rdo rje gnod mdzes de rnams ni zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa /
T02D1412:419b-16: / byang ser ba ni g-yas sngo ba dang g-yon ljang ba'o //
T02D1412:419b-17: nub dmar ba ni g-yas dkar ba dang g-yon ljang ba'o //
T02D1412:419b-18: lho ljang ba ni g-yas dkar ba dang g-yon ser ba'o //
T02D1412:419b-19: shar lho du ba'i mdog can ni shar dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D1412:419b-20: bden bral nag po yang shar dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D1412:419b-21: rlung gi sngo ba yang shar dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D1412:419b-22: byang shar yang shar dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D1412:419b-23: steng dkar po g-yas sngo ba dang g-yon ljang ba'o //
T02D1412:419b-26: byang sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02D1412:419b-28: lhor ni rin po che dril bu dang bcas pa bsnams pas 'khyud pa'o ;
T02D1412:419b-29: / phyag lhag ma rnams kyis lcags kyu dang kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D1412:419b-30: tri sh'u la dang thod pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D1412:419b-31: steng gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'khor lo dang dril
T02D1412:419b-32: bus 'khyud cing 'og gi gnod mdzes ni rdo rje
T02D1412:419b-34: phyag lhag ma ni snga ma rnams dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D1412:419b-35: de lta bu'i khro bo bcu spros pas glo bur
T02D1412:419b-36: gyi bgegs rnams bskrad nas bsdus pas phyogs skyong bcu
T02D1412:419b-37: gdan du bting zhing bgegs gzhom pa'i phyir stod khro
T02D1412:419b-38: bo smad phur bu rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta
T02D1412:419b-39: bu / aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'am h'um h'um phat /
T02D1412:419b-40: k'i li k'i la ya sarba p'a pam h'um h'um phat /
T02D1412:419b-41: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya phat /
T02D1412:419b-42: badzra dha ra a'a dzny'a pa ya ti k'a ya
T02D1412:419b-43: w'a ka tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um h'um phat
T02D1412:419b-44: ces bya bas khro bo bcu bskyed la bgegs kyi
T02D1412:419b-46: aom badzra munggar a'a ko ta ya h'um phat ces brdung bar bya'o //
T02D1412:419b-47: de nas h'um las rdo rje sa gzhi dang /
T02D1412:420a-2: steng du rdo rje bla re dang /
T02D1412:420a-4: phyi rol kun nas me 'od kyi phreng ba bsam par bya'o //
T02D1412:420a-6: khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1412:420a-7: lha brgyad dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02D1412:420a-8: zhes bya ba gnod mdzes kyi spro ba'i sngags bzhi
T02D1412:420a-9: las khro bo bskyed pa dang yang dag ldan pa
T02D1412:420a-10: dang / phur bu'i sku brgyad bskyed pa dang bcas pa ste /
T02D1412:420a-11: de lta bu bsgoms pas rgyud thams cad du thun mong du brjod pa'i sngags 'di dang /
T02D1412:420a-12: bsgom pa'i khro bo'i 'khor lo dang bcas bcu gnyis kyi 'bras bu bskyed pa yin no //
T02D1412:420a-14: btus pa'i sngags 'di nyid gang zhe na /
T02D1412:420a-15: aom sumbha zhes pa la sogs pa ste sumbha ni gnod mdzes la bod pa'o //
T02D1412:420a-16: grihna zhes bya ba ni khro bo bcu la phyogs skyong ba zung zhig pa'o //
T02D1412:420a-17: grihn'a pa ya zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i 'khor gyis zung zhig pa'o //
T02D1412:420a-18: a'a na ya ho zhes bya ba ni khu gcig pa'o //
T02D1412:420a-21: bha ga w'am badzra r'a dza zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1412:420a-22: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rgyal po'i bkas khug cig pa'o //
T02D1412:420a-23: le'u sum cu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:420a-25: // / de ltar gnod mdzes kyi 'khor lo bshad na /
T02D1412:420a-26: dngos grub sgrub pa'i le'u bzhi pa las dang por
T02D1412:420a-27: re zhig rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i 'khor lo
T02D1412:420a-28: le'u nyi shu gsungs pa ni /
T02D1412:420a-29: de nas sha chen 'di dag kun //
T02D1412:420a-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:420a-31: sha chen ni 'chad par gyur pa'i sreg rdzas so //
T02D1412:420a-32: 'jigs byed ni nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal 'joms pas so //
T02D1412:420a-33: rdo rje skyes yin zhes bya ba ni mngon spyod kyi rdzas rdo rje'i rigs dang mthun pa'o //
T02D1412:420a-34: 'di ni dug thams cad 'jigs par byed pa mngon
T02D1412:420a-35: spyod mi bzad sbyin sreg 'di gsungs pa yin no
T02D1412:420a-36: // de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa
T02D1412:420a-37: ni de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D1412:420a-38: // te / khyi ni zhe sdang 'joms pa'o //
T02D1412:420a-40: zangs kyi gtsug phud can ni khyim bya ste 'dod chags 'joms pa'o //
T02D1412:420a-41: gang gi dkyil 'khor la zhen pa la mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba gsungs so //
T02D1412:420a-42: de ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02D1412:420b-0: sbyin sreg ste phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg dang gtor ma rnams @420b bya'o //
T02D1412:420b-1: ma lus lus pa med grub po //
T02D1412:420b-2: zhes bya ba ni las bcu gnyis grub pa'o //
T02D1412:420b-3: rgyal srid thams cad bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D1412:420b-4: de ltar sreg rdzas bshad nas de'i snod bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:420b-5: dung dang nya phyis ju tig ste //
T02D1412:420b-7: dung la sogs pa gsum char yang las dang nyon
T02D1412:420b-8: mongs pa dang khu khrag gi rgyu las byung ba
T02D1412:420b-9: yin no // bsod nams kyi las kyi rgyu rkyen
T02D1412:420b-10: las byung ba'i chos kyi ye shes kyi lus can
T02D1412:420b-11: mi'i thod pas sreg rdzas kyi snod du byas kyang
T02D1412:420b-12: mkhas pa rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams su yang
T02D1412:420b-14: de ltar snod bshad nas bdag nyid lhar bskyed pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1412:420b-15: dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can //
T02D1412:420b-16: zhes bya ba pa smos te /
T02D1412:420b-17: sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin gyi cod pan can /
T02D1412:420b-18: zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas //
T02D1412:420b-19: zhes bya ba ni zla ba phyed pa'i rtags can no //
T02D1412:420b-20: dpa' bo dbang phyug yin par bshad //
T02D1412:420b-21: ces bya ba ni mkha' 'gro ma kun spyod las /
T02D1412:420b-22: sprul pa las byung dpa' bo rnams //
T02D1412:420b-23: yan lag drug cus sems kyis sprul //
T02D1412:420b-24: dag pa'i chos kyi sprul pa rnams //
T02D1412:420b-25: phag mo'i gzugs su bstan pa yin //
T02D1412:420b-26: zhes bshad pas dpal he ru ka las byung ba'i
T02D1412:420b-27: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa bsgom par
T02D1412:420b-28: bya'o // phyag rgya bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:420b-29: brda lnga po ni bstan pa dag / ces bya
T02D1412:420b-30: ba ni sor mo g-yon pa lnga thabs lngar bsgom
T02D1412:420b-31: pa dang / g-yas pa lnga lha mo lngar bsgom pa'i brda lnga'o //
T02D1412:420b-32: de yang de ltar dgod snyam na /
T02D1412:420b-33: sgrub pa po yi lag g-yon gyi //
T02D1412:420b-34: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa'i sgra ni dpa' bo drug gi gnas yin te /
T02D1412:420b-35: shes rab dang thabs ro gcig tu byas nas brda rnams la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1412:420b-36: brda de yang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang gtor ma
T02D1412:420b-37: dang phyi nang gi sbyin sreg dang dbang bskur ba'i
T02D1412:420b-38: dus su lta'i rang bzhin du bskyed nas brda zhes
T02D1412:420b-39: bya ba lus kyi tha snyad de /
T02D1412:420b-40: lag pa'i phyag rgya'i bya ba la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
T02D1412:420b-41: ci'i phyir g-yon pa la gtso bo dang dgod snyam pa la /
T02D1412:420b-42: khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba //
T02D1412:420b-43: 'gro kun g-yon las byung ba yin //
T02D1412:420b-45: lus po phyed ni shes rab tshogs kyi dbyibs las byung ba yin /
T02D1412:420b-46: g-yas pa ni thabs las byung ba yin no //
T02D1412:421a-0: @421a * // ci'i phyir g-yon pa shes rab yin zhe na /
T02D1412:421a-1: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i brdar gyur pa yin te /
T02D1412:421a-2: shes rab thams cad thabs dang shes rab gnyis su 'dus par ston pa yin no //
T02D1412:421a-3: des na g-yon pa'i chos kyi dbyings las snod bcud thams cad 'byung ba yin no //
T02D1412:421a-4: de yang ji ltar na lha dgod par bya zhe na /
T02D1412:421a-5: mthe bong la rdo rje sems dpa'/
T02D1412:421a-6: mdzub mo la rnam par snang mdzad /
T02D1412:421a-7: gung mo la padma gar gyi dbang phyug / srin
T02D1412:421a-8: lag la dpal he ru ka / mthe'u chung la
T02D1412:421a-10: sen mo'i ngos la rta mchog bsgoms la /
T02D1412:421a-11: lag pa g-yon pa bsgyur byas nas /
T02D1412:421a-13: lag pa'i mthil shr'i he ru ka / phag mo kun 'dus dag byed pa yin //
T02D1412:421a-15: lag mthil g-yas g-yon du thabs rnam pa drug dang /
T02D1412:421a-16: shes rab rnam pa drug lag mthil du bkod nas
T02D1412:421a-17: thal mo sbyar bas lus kun dag byed ces bya
T02D1412:421a-18: ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur pa yin no //
T02D1412:421a-19: rgyab tu rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1412:421a-20: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i lag pa'i mthil du
T02D1412:421a-21: padma 'dab ma lnga pa'i 'dab ma la mkha' 'gro
T02D1412:421a-22: ma lnga dang / lte ba la gtum mo dgod par bya'o //
T02D1412:421a-23: de bzhin du lag pa g-yon pa la dpa' bo rnams bkod pa ni /
T02D1412:421a-25: rin chen rdo rje'i zhal snga nas /
T02D1412:421a-26: rgyab tu rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1412:421a-27: zhes bya ba ni sen mo'i ngos la tsandi ka
T02D1412:421a-28: bkod la sor mo thams cad kyi mdza' ba 'dus
T02D1412:421a-30: cho ga des ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D1412:421a-31: de lta'i cho ga'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1412:421a-32: dpa' bo thams cad mchod par bya //
T02D1412:421a-34: nang gi sbyin sreg dang phyi'i sbyin sreg dang /
T02D1412:421a-36: sor mo rnam lha'i rang bzhin du bskyed nas 'byung ba rnams ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1412:421a-37: sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad //
T02D1412:421a-38: ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba lnga lha mo lnga yin par ston zhing /
T02D1412:421a-39: lha de rnams gang du gshegs su gsol zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1412:421a-40: lag pa gzhal yas khang du byas la mkhas pas
T02D1412:421a-41: gzhal yas khang gi steng rgyab tu gshegs su gsol
T02D1412:421a-42: // gsang ba 'di ni mi bshad cing //
T02D1412:421b-0: zhes bya ba ni @421b lag pa'i phyag rgya gsang
T02D1412:421b-1: ba 'di dbang ma bskur ba la mi bshad cing
T02D1412:421b-2: rdo rje spun ma yin pa la yang gsang ba
T02D1412:421b-3: yin no // 'o na dus nam gyi tshe bya zhe na /
T02D1412:421b-4: de ltar bdag nyid dpa' bo rnams //
T02D1412:421b-5: lhan cig zas la spyod pa brtsam //
T02D1412:421b-8: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1412:421b-9: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin //
T02D1412:421b-10: zhes bya ba ni lag pa'i phyag rgya mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde mchog go //
T02D1412:421b-11: le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:421b-13: // / de ltar mi rgyu ba'i sbyin sreg gi 'khor lo bshad nas //
T02D1412:421b-14: da ni yi dags srog song gi 'khor lo bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:421b-15: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste //
T02D1412:421b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:421b-17: gzhan yang ni ro langs kyi sbyin sreg go //
T02D1412:421b-18: phyi'i sbyin sreg gi spyod pa dang /
T02D1412:421b-19: nang gi sbyin sreg cho ga bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1412:421b-22: mchod pa dang 'bras bu dngos grub lang ba dang gshegs su gsol ba'o //
T02D1412:421b-23: rnam pa gang gis cho ga de shes na myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1412:421b-24: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:421b-25: sgrub pos sngar bstan rim pa yis //
T02D1412:421b-27: le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa sreg rdzas dang /
T02D1412:421b-28: snod dang lhar bskyed pa'i phyag rgya'i rim pa'o //
T02D1412:421b-29: phyugs rnams kyi ni 'gugs pa nyid //
T02D1412:421b-30: ces bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'i sreg rdzas kyi
T02D1412:421b-31: steng du kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyugs
T02D1412:421b-38: rta la sogs pa dpa' bo lnga'i sha dngos grub
T02D1412:421b-39: sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du bsgrub pa'i yan lag yin
T02D1412:421b-40: no // khyad par gzhan dag kyang yod dam zhe na /
T02D1412:421b-41: rigs mchog phyugs zhes bya ste mi sha ni bdud rtsi lnga par gyur pas na mchog go //
T02D1412:421b-42: rkang bzhi pa las glang po mchog dang /
T02D1412:421b-44: chu la gnas pa dud 'gro las rus sbal dang /
T02D1412:421b-45: gi wang dang bcas pa'i sha la lha rnams gsol bar bzhed pas chu g-yo ba'o //
T02D1412:421b-46: de rnams ni dngos grub sgrub pa'i yan lag tu
T02D1412:421b-47: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig gi
T02D1412:421b-48: mngon par shes pa rnams la grags pa yin no
T02D1412:422a-0: // khva dang chu skyar dang gzhan @422a * //
T02D1412:422a-1: dang gnyis skyes te khu byug dang /
T02D1412:422a-5: ka dampa la sogs pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sha dang /
T02D1412:422a-6: nang gi sbyin sreg bza' ba dang /
T02D1412:422a-8: phyi rol du sbyin sreg byas nas 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:422a-9: de ltar phyi nang gi thun mong gi sbyin sreg
T02D1412:422a-10: bstan nas ro langs kyi khyad par gyi sbyin sreg
T02D1412:422a-11: ga sreg rdzas bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:422a-12: krishna shva na zhes bya ba ni khyi mo shin
T02D1412:422a-13: tu gnag pa lus gang la yang spu dkar po
T02D1412:422a-15: ma sha'i 'bras nag po phye mar byas pa dang
T02D1412:422a-16: ldan pa'i thug pa sbyar la tshes bco lnga'i dus
T02D1412:422a-17: sku skar ma rgyal dang gza' phur bu 'dzom pa'i
T02D1412:422a-18: dus su rgyal rigs sam rje'u'i rigs sam bram ze'i
T02D1412:422a-19: rigs sha dkar la sma ra ser ba shing punda
T02D1412:422a-20: r'i ka 'am / aa shvattha la 'gegs nas shi
T02D1412:422a-21: ba'i ro blangs la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag
T02D1412:422a-22: r'i ka 'am / ste / dur khrod brgyad kyi
T02D1412:422a-23: mkha' 'gro gang yang rung ba la dgug pa dang
T02D1412:422a-24: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byas la
T02D1412:422a-25: 'jig rten gyi dngos grub grub pa dang /
T02D1412:422a-26: zhing skyod brgyad la gang yang rung ba bcug nas
T02D1412:422a-27: bsam gtan dang gzugs med thun mong gi dngos grub
T02D1412:422a-28: sgrub pa dang / rigs lnga'i ye shes kyi mkha'
T02D1412:422a-29: 'gro ma bcug nas mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par
T02D1412:422a-30: sgrub pa dang / 'gyur ro // de la dang
T02D1412:422a-31: po dur khrod du dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa 'jig rten
T02D1412:422a-32: gyi dngos grub kyi dbang du mdzad nas 'dzem pa
T02D1412:422a-33: med par ro'i khar sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du
T02D1412:422a-35: dang por bsnyen pa'i dus su du ba dang 'bar
T02D1412:422a-36: ba dang 'phar ba mthong nas ro'i lte ba'i dbus
T02D1412:422a-37: su me'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas rkang pa rlung gis
T02D1412:422a-38: g-yabs te lte ba nas 'bar bas mig me'i sgo
T02D1412:422a-39: nas dro ba'i rtags 'byung ba dang /
T02D1412:422a-40: rna ba rlung gi sgo nas 'phar ba dang /
T02D1412:422a-41: sna sa'i sgo nas du ba dang /
T02D1412:422a-42: kha chu'i sgo nas smra ba dang /
T02D1412:422a-44: de'i tshe me lha thugs kar bzhag la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
T02D1412:422a-45: de nas dur khrod kyi mkha' 'gro bkug la 'dzem
T02D1412:422a-46: pa dang bag tsha ba med pas ro'i khar sbyin
T02D1412:422a-48: de nas ro de langs la ci zhes smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:422b-0: de la lha ma yin gyi bu mo 'dod nas @422b 'og tu 'gro ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1412:422b-1: dngos grub gang yang rung ba cig byin cig brjod par bya'o //
T02D1412:422b-2: de nas 'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro des gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bu ga nas zhugs te /
T02D1412:422b-3: rdo rje snying gis ma zin par lha ma yin gyi bu mo'i gnas su 'gro ba'am /
T02D1412:422b-4: g-yul las rgyal ba'i dngos grub bam /
T02D1412:422b-5: mngon spyod kyi cho gas tshar bcad pa 'am /
T02D1412:422b-6: zhi ba dang rgyas pas phan 'dogs pa'am /
T02D1412:422b-7: mig sman gyis bcud len gyi sman rnyed pa'am /
T02D1412:422b-9: dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi rkang mgyogs sam /
T02D1412:422b-10: lo stong la sogs pa thub pa'i bcud kyis len
T02D1412:422b-11: gang yang rung ba cig byin nas rang gi gnas
T02D1412:422b-12: su 'gro ba yin gyi gzhan du ma yin zhes
T02D1412:422b-13: bya ba ni nyi ma dang zla ba ni sa
T02D1412:422b-15: rlung ni rgyun las bzlog kyang srid /
T02D1412:422b-16: ro langs kyi dngos grub ni gzhan du ma yin no //
T02D1412:422b-17: steng dang sa 'og pho nya grub //
T02D1412:422b-18: ces bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:422b-19: rgyud 'dir the tshom med kyang rung //
T02D1412:422b-20: zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar 'grub po zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1412:422b-21: de ltar ro langs kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub bshad nas /
T02D1412:422b-22: ro langs sgrub pa'i tshe rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid lhar ji ltar bskyed par bya zhe na /
T02D1412:422b-23: gnas pa'i rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro bas dang por
T02D1412:422b-24: rten gyi dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni gdul ba drag
T02D1412:422b-25: po 'jigs byed kyi brda'i dbang du byas nas yam
T02D1412:422b-26: las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni lci ba'o
T02D1412:422b-27: // ram las me'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni thal ba zhes bya'o //
T02D1412:422b-28: bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor la lhag ma zhes bya ste /
T02D1412:422b-30: lhag ma rngams su 'bum phrag brgyad //
T02D1412:422b-32: lam las sa'i dkyil 'khor la ni mgo bo skom po zhes bya'o //
T02D1412:422b-33: dung chen po'i ngo bo zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1412:422b-34: ri rab dang ri bdun dang /
T02D1412:422b-35: rol mtsho dang gling bzhi lcags ris bskor ba'o //
T02D1412:422b-36: de yang kha sbyor las mgo bo ri rgyal lhun po yin //
T02D1412:422b-38: sdong pos brgyan pa dang mthun par rlung gi dkyil
T02D1412:422b-39: 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa ram
T02D1412:422b-40: dang bcas pas stong gsum bsregs pa ni /
T02D1412:422b-41: lci ba'i thal ba nyid dag dang //
T02D1412:423a-0: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin spos chu ze ba'i rgyun babs @423a * //
T02D1412:423a-2: rdo rje'i lte ba ram gyi mes bskol bas /
T02D1412:423a-3: lhag ma gser gyi padma bye ba phrag brgyar gyur pa ni de bzhin lhag ma zhes bya'o //
T02D1412:423a-4: de'i sting du gser gyi sa gzhi chags pa ni mgo bo skam po zhes bya la /
T02D1412:423a-5: de'i sting du ri rab bskyed pa'i sa bon du chen po'i ngo bo'am /
T02D1412:423a-6: yang na gser gyi rus sbal gyi gzugs bya'o //
T02D1412:423a-7: he ru ka 'byung bas las ni yang na rus
T02D1412:423a-8: sbal dag gi'o zhes bya ba brten pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1412:423a-9: ston te / dpa' bo dpa' mo yin par bshad //
T02D1412:423a-10: ces bya ba rdzus skyes la ltos nas yang na /
T02D1412:423a-11: rus sbal dag gi ma go //
T02D1412:423a-12: zhes bya ba ni sgong skyes kyi he ru ka ston pa yin no //
T02D1412:423a-13: myung [?] du dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur //
T02D1412:423a-14: zhes bya ba ni rdzus skyes kyi thabs kyis grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:423a-15: des bskyed pa'i lha ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1412:423a-16: des brjod bla ma las 'byung ba bzhin du zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa rdo rje dang /
T02D1412:423a-19: kha tv'am ga bsnams pa sngon po'am /
T02D1412:423a-20: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa yum rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa'am /
T02D1412:423a-21: phyag 'bum pa zhal stong dang ldan pa rdo rje
T02D1412:423a-22: phag mo kun gzugs zhes bya ba zhal nyi shu
T02D1412:423a-23: rtsa gcig dang phyag rgya lnga las 'khyud pa /
T02D1412:423a-24: rdo rje phag mo yang de dang 'dra ba sku
T02D1412:423a-25: mdog dkar po snod bcud thams cad kyi phyag mtshan
T02D1412:423a-26: 'chang ba dang / thod pa'i phreng ba can thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs pa /
T02D1412:423a-27: phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa /
T02D1412:423a-28: cod pan gyi bar nas me tog gi phreng ba 'chang ba /
T02D1412:423a-29: phyag dang po gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu bzung nas phag mo la 'khyud pa /
T02D1412:423a-30: g-yas gnyis pa mdung bsnams pa /
T02D1412:423a-32: ro yi dags chen po'i gdan bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1412:423a-33: de yang ji ltar bsgom par bya snyam na /
T02D1412:423a-34: de nas rtag tu sgrub pa pos //
T02D1412:423a-35: rang gi lha ni shes nas sgom //
T02D1412:423a-37: mi 'jigs na zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa dang /
T02D1412:423a-38: 'jigs na zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis pa dang /
T02D1412:423a-39: ches 'jigs na phyag 'bum pa bsgom par bya ba
T02D1412:423a-40: de lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par shes pas
T02D1412:423a-41: sgrub pa pos dngos grub sgrub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:423a-42: le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:423b-0: // / @423b de ltar ro langs kyi sbyin sreg bshad nas /
T02D1412:423b-1: de ni rnal 'byor ma'i lus la sbyin sreg bya ba bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:423b-2: de nas sgrub pa po rnams kyis //
T02D1412:423b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1412:423b-4: chags pa'i lam sgrub pa po rnams kyis ye shes las skyes pa dang /
T02D1412:423b-5: sngags skyes kyi rnal 'byor ma bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyangs nas ye shes phab pa la 'gro ba dang /
T02D1412:423b-6: du ba dang 'bar ba dang 'phar ba'i tshe /
T02D1412:423b-7: nang gi sbyin sreg bya ba ni //
T02D1412:423b-8: sbyor ba kun las med par bshad //
T02D1412:423b-10: rgyud gzhan du ma bstan pa'o //
T02D1412:423b-11: sreg rdzas ni bza' ba dang bca' pa dang /
T02D1412:423b-12: nya sha dang chang la sogs pa ci nus pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1412:423b-13: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:423b-14: med par gyur kyang bza' ba ni //
T02D1412:423b-16: bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa bdud rtsi lngar bskyed la mchod par bya'o //
T02D1412:423b-17: de ltar rdzas bsags nas de nas ci zhig bya snyam na /
T02D1412:423b-18: de nas pho nya rab sbyin zhing //
T02D1412:423b-19: zhes bya ba bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyangs nas lte ba dang snying ga dang /
T02D1412:423b-20: lkog ma dang spyi gtsug tu 'khor lo brtsegs ma
T02D1412:423b-21: bzhi bkod de ye shes 'bebs pa'i pho nya la
T02D1412:423b-22: rang gi lag pa'i dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyis
T02D1412:423b-23: sbyin sreg bya'o // rang gi pang par mgo bzhag la //
T02D1412:423b-24: dpa' bo gnyis med mchod par bya //
T02D1412:423b-25: zhes bya ba ni yum rdo rje phag mo bskyed nas mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1412:423b-26: slob dpon dag ni rab tu bsgrub //
T02D1412:423b-27: ces bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya byas pa'o //
T02D1412:423b-28: de yang ma dang sring mo dang bu mo dang
T02D1412:423b-29: chung ma ste dbang thob pa'i sngags skyes rnam par
T02D1412:423b-30: 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas mchod pa'i cho ga 'di
T02D1412:423b-31: 'dra ba'i sbyor bas gnyis su med pa dang ldan
T02D1412:423b-32: par byed / de'i phan yon ci zhe na /
T02D1412:423b-33: de nas sngags ni grub 'gyur te //
T02D1412:423b-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:423b-35: srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud pa'i sngags grub pa'i
T02D1412:423b-36: sbyor bas ji srid 'byung ba ma zhig pa'i bar
T02D1412:423b-38: phan yon gnyis pa ni ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro
T02D1412:423b-39: ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi slob dpon gyi lus su
T02D1412:423b-40: gnas nas sgrub pa po las mchod pa len zhing
T02D1412:423b-41: las bcu gnyis mdzad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:424a-0: des bsam gtan gyi dngos grub @424a * //
T02D1412:424a-2: dpa' bo rnams kyi stan dag dang //
T02D1412:424a-3: phyag rgya nyid du the tshom med //
T02D1412:424a-5: stan ni btsun mo yum gyi bha ga na bzhugs zhes bya'o //
T02D1412:424a-6: phyag rgya ni las kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i bsam gtan gyi bde ba bskyed pa'o //
T02D1412:424a-7: de yang thabs ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1412:424a-8: sgrub po shin tu mnyam gzhag pas /
T02D1412:424a-9: glu dang gar la sogs pa bya //
T02D1412:424a-15: reg bya 'khyud ba la sogs pas mchod par bya'o //
T02D1412:424a-16: mchog gi dngos grub ji ltar thob ce na lus
T02D1412:424a-17: can thams cad kyi snyed du rnal 'byor ye shes
T02D1412:424a-18: l'a ma zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1412:424a-19: rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i sems 'od gsal
T02D1412:424a-20: ba'i sems skyes pa de gang zag ji lta bus
T02D1412:424a-21: thob snyam na 'khor ba las skyo ba dang mya
T02D1412:424a-22: ngan las 'das pa la dad pa ste /
T02D1412:424a-24: mya ngan sdug bsngal gyis g-yengs 'di //
T02D1412:424a-25: zhes bya ba 'khor ba las skyo ba'o //
T02D1412:424a-26: kun nas dad pas sgrub pa pos //
T02D1412:424a-27: phyag rgya thams cad mchod par bya //
T02D1412:424a-28: zhes bya ba ni lha dang lha mor bsgoms pas dad pa dang ldan zhing /
T02D1412:424a-29: sgyu ma lta bur mos pas phyag rgyar mchod par bya'o ;
T02D1412:424a-30: / de ltar bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs
T02D1412:424a-31: chen pos ma 'ongs pa na 'khor los sgyur ba
T02D1412:424a-32: la rgyu ba'i rgyal po dang /
T02D1412:424a-33: lha'i rgyal por gyur pas mchod par gyur pa dang /
T02D1412:424a-34: dad pa dang dang ba dang sgyu ma lta bu'i
T02D1412:424a-35: shes pa med pas mi gtsang ba'i rdzas yin no
T02D1412:424a-36: zhes smras na ma 'ongs pa ngan song gsum du
T02D1412:424a-39: ser skya lta bu bsam gtan thob pas dngos grub ji lta bu zhig thob par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1412:424a-40: rnal 'byor rgyud la gus rnams kyis //
T02D1412:424a-41: phyag rgya chen po dang por 'grub //
T02D1412:424a-43: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor rgyud la phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02D1412:424a-44: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang por 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:424a-45: gal te srog aa wa dh'u t'ir ma chud pas
T02D1412:424a-46: stong nyid kyi rgyas ma thebs na ji ji ltar
T02D1412:424a-47: bya snyam na / de bzhin rab tu 'bad pa dang //
T02D1412:424a-48: kun nas dang bas mchod par bya //
T02D1412:424b-1: bsod nams kyi tshogs bde ba bsgom par bya'o /
T02D1412:424b-2: de nas le'u dang po las //
T02D1412:424b-3: yid ni nang du chud pa yis //
T02D1412:424b-4: 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgom par bya //
T02D1412:424b-5: rang rdzas thig les sangs rgyas dang //
T02D1412:424b-6: byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya //
T02D1412:424b-8: de yi 'og tu dpa' bo yis ;
T02D1412:424b-9: / dpa' bo kun du spyod par bya //
T02D1412:424b-10: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa
T02D1412:424b-11: de'i 'og tu dpa' bo kun du spyod pa kha
T02D1412:424b-12: sbyor las gsungs pa bzhin du dpa' bo gcig pu
T02D1412:424b-14: phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
T02D1412:424b-15: pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1412:424b-16: shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pas dngos rjes ro mnyam par bya'o //
T02D1412:424b-17: de ci zhig sgrub snyam na //
T02D1412:424b-18: de ltar mchod byas de nas ni //
T02D1412:424b-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1412:424b-20: sa 'og tu 'gro ba la sogs pa'i las bcu
T02D1412:424b-21: gcig sgrub pa pos dka' ba med cing nyon mi
T02D1412:424b-22: mongs pas 'grub par 'gyur ba las gdon mi za'o
T02D1412:424b-23: // le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:424b-25: // / de ltar rnal 'byor pa'i sbyin sreg bshad nas thun mong gi sbyin sreg bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:424b-26: de nas rnal 'byor ma'i dra ba'i //
T02D1412:424b-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1412:424b-28: bsnyen sgrub pa bzhis sbyangs pa'i dpa' bo dang /
T02D1412:424b-29: rnal 'byor ma'i lus po la phyi rol du lha'i 'khor lo dgod pa dang /
T02D1412:424b-30: nang du lha drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor lo bzhi
T02D1412:424b-31: la rim pa bzhin du bkod pa'i 'khor lo'i cho
T02D1412:424b-32: ga rgyas par byas nas dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor
T02D1412:424b-33: ma nang gi sbyin sreg byed pa'i tshe /
T02D1412:424b-34: aom shantim ku ru sv'a h'a zhes bya ba la sogs pas dpa' bo dang /
T02D1412:424b-35: rnal 'byor ma'i sngags dang spel nas kun du brjod
T02D1412:424b-36: cing sbyin sreg byas nas 'grub pa la the tshom
T02D1412:424b-37: med do // de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par
T02D1412:424b-38: bshad pa ni dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa lnga dang
T02D1412:424b-39: med do // / rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa
T02D1412:424b-40: bdun 'khor lo bzhi'i padma'i lte bar bkod la aa
T02D1412:424b-41: wa dh'u t'i'i gnas su he ru ka yab yum
T02D1412:424b-42: de bzhin du bkod par bya ste /
T02D1412:424b-43: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i bar du dpa' bo yab yum nges par gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1412:424b-44: de ltar lha dgod pa bstan nas me'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni //
T02D1412:424b-45: dpa' bo 'chol ba zhal gyi mer //
T02D1412:425a-1: lte ba nas rked pa rlung me'i drod can no //
T02D1412:425a-2: sreg rdzas ni myos chang dang /
T02D1412:425a-3: ba lang gi sha dang khrag tu bcas pas nang du sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1412:425a-4: gang la sbyin sreg bya snyam na /
T02D1412:425a-5: de nas 'bar ba'i me la ni //
T02D1412:425a-6: bsreg bya dgu ni bya ba yin //
T02D1412:425a-8: rigs lnga re re zhing yang bsreg bya lnga lnga dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1412:425a-9: de nas gtum mo drod 'phel ba //
T02D1412:425a-10: rtsa rnams sreg par byed pa ni //
T02D1412:425a-11: de nas 'bar phreng rgya mtsho yi //
T02D1412:425a-12: kun nas sgo yi 'khor lo bsam //
T02D1412:425a-14: kun nas sgo ni bu ga'i sgo rnams nas me'i 'od zer 'byung ba'o //
T02D1412:425a-15: 'khor lo bzhi'i dbus su ji lta bu bsam zhe na /
T02D1412:425a-16: dpa' bo dpa' mo zhal bzhi pa //
T02D1412:425a-18: bcom ldan 'das zhal bzhi pa phyag bcu gnyis pa /
T02D1412:425a-19: yum zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D1412:425a-21: l'a ma dang du ma skyes ma dang /
T02D1412:425a-22: gzugs can ma bzhi ni phyogs kyi padma la'o //
T02D1412:425a-23: dpa' kun gnyis su med par bde //
T02D1412:425a-24: zhes bya ba ni sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1412:425a-25: khanda ro ha phyi rol sbyar zhes bya ba ni
T02D1412:425a-26: // kun kyang zhal shar du gzigs pas khanda ro ha rgyab tu bzhag pa'o //
T02D1412:425a-27: rang gi gzugs su sngon zhen pa //
T02D1412:425a-28: zhes bya ba ni mi'am ci 'dul ba'i phyir kha gdong ma la sogs pa'i gzugs brgyad do //
T02D1412:425a-29: 'khor lo'i dbus su bstan par bya //
T02D1412:425a-30: zhes bya ba ni gzhal yas khang gi nang du dgod pa'o //
T02D1412:425a-31: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma 'di dag gi 'khor
T02D1412:425a-32: lo bstan pas dngos grub thams cad sgrub par byed
T02D1412:425a-33: do // de gang las btus pa yin snyam na /
T02D1412:425a-35: dpa' bo mdor bsdus nas ni gsungs pa yin /
T02D1412:425a-37: rgyud 'bum pa'i le'u dang po tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i skabs nas /
T02D1412:425a-38: rnal 'byor ma'i sbyin sreg 'di rgyas pa las mdor bsdus pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1412:425a-39: thabs gang gis grub ce na /
T02D1412:425a-40: pho nya gnyis med sbyor ba'i bdag /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
T02D1412:425a-42: dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin gyis /
T02D1412:425b-0: le'u sum @425b cu rtsa bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:425b-2: // / de ltar dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma gnyis ka'i sbyin sreg bshad nas /
T02D1412:425b-4: de nas las kyi mchog rab ni //
T02D1412:425b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:425b-6: las kyi mchog rab ni tshe 'phel ba'i thabs so //
T02D1412:425b-7: ji bzhin rim gyis mchod pa ste //
T02D1412:425b-8: zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyangs nas rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
T02D1412:425b-11: mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i rim gyis dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mchod pa'o //
T02D1412:425b-12: mchod pa gnyis med sbyor bdag nyid //
T02D1412:425b-14: mchod pa gnyis med sbyor bdag nyid ni rang bzhin
T02D1412:425b-15: brgyad cu dang bral ba'i bde ba stong pa nyid
T02D1412:425b-16: du ro gcig pa'i gnyis med sbyor ba'o //
T02D1412:425b-17: las ni so sor sbyor bar bya //
T02D1412:425b-18: zhes bya ba ni las bcu gnyis las bsgom pa dang bzlas pa so sor sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1412:425b-19: de ltar mdor bstan na rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:425b-20: gang yang sgrub par byed pa'i sngags //
T02D1412:425b-21: de yi dbye ba rim ji bzhin //
T02D1412:425b-22: zhes bya ba ni de la zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
T02D1412:425b-23: tshigs bcad gcig gis mdor bstan pa ni las bcu gnyis kyi mdor bstan pa yin la /
T02D1412:425b-26: gang yang sgrub par byed pa'i sngags //
T02D1412:425b-28: sngags ni lus kyi 'khrul 'khor la dbugs 'byung rngub kyi rlung dang sbyor ro //
T02D1412:425b-29: phrin las bzhi'i sngags de'i dbyes bas rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhi ba la dkar po /
T02D1412:425b-37: mngon spyod pa dmangs rigs kyi pho nya'i bye brag dang /
T02D1412:425b-38: sogs zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la chu'i dkyil 'khor nas rgyu ba dang /
T02D1412:425b-41: mngon spyod la rlung gi dkyil 'khor las rgyu ba'o //
T02D1412:425b-42: sngags ji ltar bzlas snyam na /
T02D1412:425b-43: mda' yi shugs bzhin yongs su 'khor //
T02D1412:426a-0: @426a * // zhi ba dang rgyas pa la yum gyi zhal nas yab kyi zhal du zhugs shing /
T02D1412:426a-1: yab kyi lte ba nas yum gyi lte bar zhugs pas 'khor ba dang /
T02D1412:426a-2: dbang dang mngon spyod la yab kyi zhal nas yum gyi zhal dang /
T02D1412:426a-3: yum gyi lte ba nas yab kyi lte bar 'jug
T02D1412:426a-4: cing 'khor ba'i phan tshun sbyor ba'i sngags kyis 'jug
T02D1412:426a-5: cing 'khor bas phreng ba nyid yin no //
T02D1412:426a-6: zhi ba la ni lhod pa ste //
T02D1412:426a-7: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi bzlas pa so dang mchu sbyar nas lce cung zad tsam bsgul ba'o //
T02D1412:426a-8: rlung gi rgyu ba ni sa dang chu dal bar rgyu ba'o //
T02D1412:426a-9: drag cing rtsub pa ma yin no //
T02D1412:426a-10: zhes bya ba ni dbang dang mngon spyod la ngag
T02D1412:426a-11: gi bzlas pa mnyam sbyor nas 'byung ba bzhin du
T02D1412:426a-12: mkhur ba dang dbugs kyi rlung 'byin dang /
T02D1412:426a-13: srin po ngar skad kyis zlo ba dang /
T02D1412:426a-14: me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la drag cing rtsub
T02D1412:426a-15: par zlos pa ltar zhi ba dang rgyas pa la
T02D1412:426a-16: ma yin no // rang rang gi ni phyogs gnas nas //
T02D1412:426a-17: cho ga'i dbye ba bstan pa'o //
T02D1412:426a-18: zhes bya ba ni g-yas nas sa'i rlung rgyu ba dang /
T02D1412:426a-19: g-yon nas rlung gi rlung rgyu ba dang /
T02D1412:426a-20: gnyis ka nas sa'i rlung rgyu ba dang /
T02D1412:426a-21: dal bar rgyu ba chu'i rlung ni dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rang rang gi phyogs kyi dbye ba bstan to //
T02D1412:426a-22: sa bon phreng ba de nas zin //
T02D1412:426a-23: zhes bya ba ni sa bon phreng ba snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1412:426a-24: de nas zin zhes bya ba ni thog mar yi ge aom nas bzung ba'o //
T02D1412:426a-25: h'um ni mtha' ru gnas pa yin //
T02D1412:426a-26: zhes bya ba ni mthar h'um phat sv'a h'a dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1412:426a-27: de ltar bsgom pa dang bzlas pa byas nas bskyed
T02D1412:426a-28: pa'i rim pa'i las la sbyor ba'i tshe ji ltar
T02D1412:426a-30: sgrub pa 'gag par gyur na ni //
T02D1412:426a-32: zhes bya ba ni 'chi bdag gi gzugs byas la
T02D1412:426a-33: dur khrod kyi ras la rkang pa brgyad pa'i 'khrul
T02D1412:426a-34: 'khor dug dang khrag gis bris la dbus kyi 'chi
T02D1412:426a-35: bdag gi bdud kyi ming m'a ra ya dang bcas
T02D1412:426a-36: pa bris te 'khrul 'khor linggar bcug nas sngags kyi
T02D1412:426a-37: 'od zer brgyad kyis bcug na gom pa gcig kyang
T02D1412:426a-38: 'gro bar mi nus par 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:426a-39: 'od zer brgyad gang zhe na kha sbyor bar gyur
T02D1412:426a-40: pa dang zhes bya ba rdo rje phra mo'i 'od
T02D1412:426a-41: zer dkar dmar thogs pa 'phros pas gom pa gcig
T02D1412:426b-0: kyang @426b mi 'gro ba ni dang po'o //
T02D1412:426b-1: 'od zer gyi lha mo rnams phyir log nas dus
T02D1412:426b-2: ma yin par 'chi ba las rgyal ba'i thabs phyag
T02D1412:426b-3: g-yon pas kha tv'am ga bzung nas phyag g-yas pas
T02D1412:426b-4: bdud rtsi lnga'i thod pa bsnams pas rang gi zhal
T02D1412:426b-5: du mchod yon gyi bdud rtsi'i nges par sbyar bas
T02D1412:426b-6: dus ma yin par 'chi ba bzlog nas tshe 'phel
T02D1412:426b-7: bar byed do // de bzhin du rdo rje lu
T02D1412:426b-8: gu rgyud bcings pa'i lha mo brgyad 'phros nas 'chi
T02D1412:426b-9: bdag bcings pas dus ma yin par 'chi ba las
T02D1412:426b-10: rgyal nas kha tv'am ga bsnams shing bdud rtsi'i mchod
T02D1412:426b-11: pa zhal du sbyor ba ni gnyis pa yin no
T02D1412:426b-12: bar byed do // // rdo rjes phye ba nyid dang ni //
T02D1412:426b-13: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thogs pa'i lha mo
T02D1412:426b-14: spros nas 'chi bdag bcom ste slar log pas dus
T02D1412:426b-15: ma yin pa'i 'chi ba las rgyal nas kha tv'am
T02D1412:426b-16: ga bsnams pas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa mchod yon zhal
T02D1412:426b-18: de bzhin du rdo rje kha dog lnga pa'i sgro'i
T02D1412:426b-19: chun po spros nas bsgrub bya 'gog pa ni bzhi
T02D1412:426b-20: pa'o // lcags kyu bsnams pa'i lha mos dgug pa ni lnga pa'o //
T02D1412:426b-21: gtun shing bsnams nas dgug pa ni drug pa'o //
T02D1412:426b-22: rdo rje kha yis za ba ni bdun pa'o //
T02D1412:426b-23: mda' yis bcings pa spro ba ni brgyad pa'o //
T02D1412:426b-24: de ltar phyag mtshan brgyad dang bcas pa'i lha mo
T02D1412:426b-25: spros nas dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bdag las rgyal
T02D1412:426b-26: ba ni phrin las mdzad nas slar bsdus pa'i tshe
T02D1412:426b-27: phyag g-yon pas kha tv'am ga bsnams shing /
T02D1412:426b-28: phyag g-yas pas thod pa bdud rtsi lnga'i mchod yon
T02D1412:426b-29: rang gi zhal du rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar
T02D1412:426b-30: po bsams la bdud rtsi lnga'i mchod yon 'thungs pa
T02D1412:426b-32: 'di skad ston pa yin te thabs dang shes rab
T02D1412:426b-33: snyoms par zhugs pa las lha mo brgyad spros pa
T02D1412:426b-34: ni 'chi bdag gi bdud 'gog cing gom pa gcig
T02D1412:426b-35: kyang mi 'gro bas dus ma yin par 'chi ba
T02D1412:426b-36: las rgyal ba'i phrin las mdzad nas slar sdud pa'i
T02D1412:426b-37: tshe lha mo brgyad kyi phyag g-yon pas kha tva'm
T02D1412:426b-38: ga bsnams shing g-yas pas bdud rtsi'i thod pa bsnams
T02D1412:426b-39: nas tshe 'phel ba'i phyir rang la 'dren par byed
T02D1412:426b-40: pa yin no // de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dbang du byas pa bshad nas /
T02D1412:426b-41: rdo rje mkha' 'gro las kha sbyor ni nyi ma dang zla ba ste wa santi las 'o //
T02D1412:426b-42: rdo rje lu gu rgyud ni las kyi phyag rgya dang 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1412:427a-0: @427a * // rdo rje dbye ba ni aa wa dh'u t'i dang 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1412:427a-1: sgro'i chun pos bskor ba ni h'um phat kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1412:427a-2: lcags kyus 'gugs pa ni bdud rtsi thig le gyen du bzlog pa'o //
T02D1412:427a-3: gtun shing gis dkrugs pa ni sa chu me rlung
T02D1412:427a-4: bzhi'i rtsa bzhag nas a'a na ha'i rtsas grub pa'o
T02D1412:427a-5: ; / rdo rje kha'i bza' ba ni bde ba
T02D1412:427a-6: stong nyid kyis rgyas btab nas shing las skyes pa'i
T02D1412:427a-7: srin bu bzhin du za ba'o //
T02D1412:427a-8: dbugs pa mda' dang sbyar ba ni reg bya'i stong
T02D1412:427a-9: pa nyid kyi steng du stong pa nyid la nges
T02D1412:427a-11: dus min 'chi las rgyal ba ni g-yas par sa
T02D1412:427a-12: n'a nas gyen du bzlog pa ni wa sha ta
T02D1412:427a-13: ta tva zhes byas te bcud kyis len du 'gyur
T02D1412:427a-14: ba'o // kha tv'am ga ni lha'i sku bde ba stong par rtogs pa'i lus so //
T02D1412:427a-15: thod pa'i mchod yon ni btsun mo'i yum gyi bha ga'i byang chub sems so //
T02D1412:427a-16: zhal du mchod yon aa wa dh'u ti'i zhal du
T02D1412:427a-17: byang chub kyi sems 'jug pa yin zhes gsungs so
T02D1412:427a-18: // le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:427a-20: // / de ltar 'chi bdag 'joms pa bshad nas da
T02D1412:427a-21: ni chags pa'i lam gyis gsang ba'i sbyin sreg bshad
T02D1412:427a-23: phyag rgya'i mchod pa chen po dang //
T02D1412:427a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1412:427a-25: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyangs
T02D1412:427a-26: nas btsun mo yum gyi bha ga'i thab khung du
T02D1412:427a-27: gsang ba'i rdo rje'i dgang gzar gyis byang chub sems
T02D1412:427a-28: kyi da gang blugs byed pa ni phyag rgya'i mchod
T02D1412:427a-29: chen zhes bya'o // byang chub sems dga' bral du
T02D1412:427a-30: song na bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin nyams nas sngags
T02D1412:427a-32: nang gi sbyin sreg gi phyag rgya'i mchod pa 'di
T02D1412:427a-33: dag ni las bcu gnyis myur du grub par byed
T02D1412:427a-34: pa yin no // de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:427a-35: mtshan nyid gnyis las sngags sbyar ba //
T02D1412:427a-37: gsang ba'i rdo rje dang bha ga'i dbus su yi
T02D1412:427a-38: ge dhi dang bya zhes bya ba gnyis kyi sngags
T02D1412:427a-39: kyis byang chub sems bzlog par bya'o zhes kun spyod
T02D1412:427a-40: las gsungs so // dpa' bo mkha' 'gro gnyis med pa //
T02D1412:427a-41: blo ldan rnal 'byor ma bsgrub bya //
T02D1412:427b-0: zhes bya ba ni bha ga'i @427b dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'o //
T02D1412:427b-1: rnal 'byor dri med lus ni zhes bya ba ni
T02D1412:427b-2: rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i shes pa rtog
T02D1412:427b-3: pa med pa skyes pa'i lus ni dri med lus
T02D1412:427b-4: so // padma'i phyag rgya gnon pa'i lus rnams ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dga' ba dang /
T02D1412:427b-5: rnam par smin pa'i mchog dga' dang /
T02D1412:427b-6: mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i dus su //
T02D1412:427b-7: de bzhin mtshon cha nyid dang sbyar / zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1412:427b-8: dga' ba'i dus kyi tshe yi ge 'khrul 'khor gyi mtshon cha dang sbyar ba dang /
T02D1412:427b-9: de bzhin du mchog dga'i tshe rlung gi 'khrul 'khor
T02D1412:427b-10: gyi mtshon cha dang sbyar ba de bzhin du lhan
T02D1412:427b-11: cig skyes dga'i dus su gzung 'dzin 'gog pa'i aa
T02D1412:427b-12: sa ma sa ma zhes bya ba nges pa'i shes
T02D1412:427b-13: pa drangs pas rnam par rtog pa las bzlog pa'i
T02D1412:427b-14: mtshon cha dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1412:427b-15: ci'i phyir mtshon cha yin zhe na /
T02D1412:427b-16: kha sbyor las dang po'i shes pa rnams yul gyi
T02D1412:427b-17: bde ba la dga' bral mi 'gro ba'i phyir na
T02D1412:427b-19: sngags pas mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor ba'i snying po rnams
T02D1412:427b-20: kyis de bzhin bya ba ni dpa' bo dang dpa'
T02D1412:427b-21: mo'i snying pos kyang byang chub sems bzlog pa de
T02D1412:427b-22: bzhin du bya'o // dpa' bo mchod pa'i cho ga shes /
T02D1412:427b-23: las kyi 'bad pa nyid kyis bya //
T02D1412:427b-24: zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid mchod pa'i
T02D1412:427b-25: rjes la dgug pa la sogs pa'i las bcu gnyis
T02D1412:427b-26: bya bar gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1412:427b-27: mkhas pa chen po dzny'a na shr'i'i zhal snga nas
T02D1412:427b-28: rlung gi 'khrul 'khor gyis byang chub sems bzlog pa
T02D1412:427b-30: rnal 'byor rang dga'i sngags las ni //
T02D1412:427b-31: zhes bya ba ni phrin las bzhi'i rnam par dbye
T02D1412:427b-32: bas rnal 'byor pa rang dga' ba'i sngags kyis dbang
T02D1412:427b-33: dang mngon spyod la yab kyi zhal dang sbyar bas
T02D1412:427b-35: zhi ba dang rgyas pa la yum gyi zhal nas
T02D1412:427b-36: yab kyi zhal du bzlog nas sbyar bas ni phan
T02D1412:427b-38: de ltar na las kyi dngos grub bcu gnyis la
T02D1412:427b-39: rnam par sgom pa'i thabs de'i dbye ba bcu gnyis
T02D1412:427b-40: kyis phye ba'i sngags kyi phreng ba rtsa'i lam du
T02D1412:427b-41: sbyar bar bya'o // sbyor ba yi ni don rnams la //
T02D1412:428a-2: zhes bya ba ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor la las
T02D1412:428a-3: bcu gnyis kyi 'bras bu'i don rnams bsgom pa dang
T02D1412:428a-4: bzlas pa'i dbye ba 'di yis bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1412:428a-5: lha dang lha min rnams dang ni //
T02D1412:428a-6: mi dang bcas pas bsgrub par bya //
T02D1412:428a-7: zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba ris drag dbang du byed pa la sogs pa 'grub pa'o //
T02D1412:428a-8: le'u sum cu rtsa drug pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:428a-10: // / de ltar gsang ba'i sbyin sreg bshad nas /
T02D1412:428a-11: nang gi sbyin sreg phyir bzlog pa bstan pa ni /
T02D1412:428a-12: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1412:428a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:428a-14: gzugs gnon pa yi cho ga ste //
T02D1412:428a-15: zhes bya ba ni bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyangs pa'i las
T02D1412:428a-16: kyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par zhugs pa'am grol ba'i
T02D1412:428a-17: lam pas chos kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1412:428a-18: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gzugs gnon pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1412:428a-19: phan tshun sbyar ba'i gsang sngags ni //
T02D1412:428a-20: mkha' 'gro ma dang gcig tu sbyor //
T02D1412:428a-21: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa la tshur 'khor ba dang /
T02D1412:428a-22: dbang dang mngon spyod la phar 'khor bas gsang sngags
T02D1412:428a-23: sbyar zhing nang gi sbyin sreg bzlog nas h'um gi
T02D1412:428a-24: sgras dbugs byung ba ni ngal so ba'o //
T02D1412:428a-25: bzlas pa'i mthar skyug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni ngal so ba'i rjes la skyugs pa'o //
T02D1412:428a-26: mtshan mo bdun ni rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1412:428a-27: bza' dang btung ba dag la sbyar //
T02D1412:428a-28: zhes bya ba ni skyugs pa'i kha zas ni sbyin
T02D1412:428a-29: sreg gi thal ba yin pas thod pa kha sbyor
T02D1412:428a-31: tshon sna lnga'i skud pas dkris te mtshon mo bdun
T02D1412:428a-32: sngags bzlas nas gang dbang du bya bar 'dod pa'i
T02D1412:428a-33: kha zas la sbyar na 'di yis ji srid 'tsho'i
T02D1412:428a-34: bar du dbang du gyur par gdon mi za ba
T02D1412:428a-35: yin no // de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:428a-36: ser skya'i mar ni 'thungs nas kyang //
T02D1412:428a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:428a-38: lte ba dang snying ga dang lkog ma dang spyi
T02D1412:428a-39: gtsug tu rtsa drug cu rtsa gnyis tshad pa'i 'khor
T02D1412:428a-40: lo bskyed la / lag pa g-yas g-yon dgang gzar dang blugs gzar du byas te /
T02D1412:428a-41: sar skya'i mar gyis sreg rdzas su byas te mthar
T02D1412:428a-42: wa sham ku ru ho zhes bya ba'i sngags dang
T02D1412:428a-43: spel la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sreg blugs byas nas
T02D1412:428b-0: mthar po son cha'i btud pa @428b skyugs pas rang
T02D1412:428b-1: gi gdong dri bkrus la zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis
T02D1412:428b-2: par bsams te / spyod lam rnam bzhi'i dus thams cad du khros par gyur na rgyal rigs dang /
T02D1412:428b-5: bram ze'i rigs la bltas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:428b-6: las dang po bshad nas gnyis pa bshad pa ni
T02D1412:428b-7: sngar gyi skyugs pa'i steng du til mar dang 'bras
T02D1412:428b-8: s'a lu btags pa dang ldan pas lus la bskus
T02D1412:428b-9: la dril nas 'bras kyi phye ma dang bsres nas
T02D1412:428b-10: khrus byas nas mar la btsos la snum khur du
T02D1412:428b-11: byas te / rigs bzhi gang yang rung ba'i bza'
T02D1412:428b-12: ba la sbyar na rdo rje slob dpon gyi las
T02D1412:428b-13: 'di bsam pa ma btang ba'i bar du dbang du
T02D1412:428b-14: byas te / 'gyur ro // las bcu pa ni
T02D1412:428b-15: til nag po'i chan la nang gi sbyin sreg brgya
T02D1412:428b-16: rtsa brgyad byas nas ske tshe dang bcas pa'i ru
T02D1412:428b-17: rta dang sbyar nas btung bar byas la skyugs pa
T02D1412:428b-18: byas te / 'gyur ro // dang / lag pa'i sen mo dang /
T02D1412:428b-20: rang gi srin lag g-yon pa'i khrag dang /
T02D1412:428b-21: rang gi ru rta dang bcas pa sbyar te rnam pa bzhi'i bza' ba dang /
T02D1412:428b-23: mig sman dang gos la byugs par rab tu sbyar
T02D1412:428b-24: na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du 'gyur ro
T02D1412:428b-25: // las bzhi pa ni ba lang gi sha dang
T02D1412:428b-26: ba lang gi khrag dang nang gi sbyin sreg brgya
T02D1412:428b-27: rtsa brgyad byas na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
T02D1412:428b-28: 'das pa'i lha rnams de'i mod la dbang du 'gyur
T02D1412:428b-29: // ba'am / gal te lha rnams dbang du ma gyur na /
T02D1412:428b-30: ldum bu 'u su'i mdog bzhin du mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:428b-31: 'ongs na ci zhig byed snyam na /
T02D1412:428b-32: bdag nyid de yi mdun du ni //
T02D1412:428b-34: de'i mdun du bkug la rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid
T02D1412:428b-35: de'i mdun du 'dug la mkhas pas sbyin sreg byas
T02D1412:428b-36: pa dang / 'jig rten pa la gtor ma byin
T02D1412:428b-37: nas khams gsum pa khug cig ces bka' bsgo nas
T02D1412:428b-38: mtshan bdun gyis grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:428b-39: de ltar nang gi sbyin sreg phyir skyugs pa ni
T02D1412:428b-40: 'jig rten gsum na rnyed par dka' ba yin te
T02D1412:428b-41: / sngags bsgrubs pa'i thal bar 'gyur pa yin pas 'og nas 'byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1412:428b-42: mi bskyod pa'i thal ba bzhin du steng gi sgo'i
T02D1412:428b-43: thabs kyang dbang du gyur ba'i las byed pa bzhin
T02D1412:429a-2: de ltar dam tshig spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnal
T02D1412:429a-3: 'byor bas rtag tu las bcu gnyis kyi sngags nang
T02D1412:429a-4: gi sbyin sreg phyir bzlog pa'i sbyor ba ni spa
T02D1412:429a-5: zhing rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya'o //
T02D1412:429a-6: dor bya'i gang zag ni nang gi sbyin sreg phyir
T02D1412:429a-7: skyugs pa la yid mi ches pas sbas pa'i don
T02D1412:429a-8: rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing skye ba snga mar sbyangs
T02D1412:429a-9: pa'i skal pa dman pas kyang grub par mi 'gyur
T02D1412:429a-10: ro // blang bar bya ba'i gang zag ni skye
T02D1412:429a-11: ba snga mar sbyin pa ma btang bas bsod nams
