T02D1412:429a-12: chung ba yin yang sgrub pa po nang gi sbyin
T02D1412:429a-13: sreg la yid ches pas mnyes par byas na grub
T02D1412:429a-14: par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas dpal he ru ka
T02D1412:429a-15: nyid nang gi sbyin sreg gis mnyes par bya'o //
T02D1412:429a-16: le'u sum cu rtsa bdun pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:429a-18: // / de ltar rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i sbyin sreg bshad nas /
T02D1412:429a-19: de rnams kyi gnas bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:429a-20: da nas brda dang mkha' 'gro ma'i //
T02D1412:429a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:429a-22: snod du gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ma ni brda dang
T02D1412:429a-23: kha dog dang dbyibs kyi lus kyi mtshan nyid gang
T02D1412:429a-24: yin pa dang / snod du rung pa dang mi
T02D1412:429a-25: rung ba'i dpa' bo'i yan lag gi dbye ba bshad
T02D1412:429a-26: yin pa dang / par bya'o // de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni //
T02D1412:429a-27: dpa' bo'i dbang phyug mi bri zhing /
T02D1412:429a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1412:429a-29: thabs dang shes rab 'khyud pa'i dpa' bo'i dbang phyug
T02D1412:429a-30: ri mor mi bri zhing bris su zin kyang dbang
T02D1412:429a-31: ma bskur ba gang gi thad du yang mi gdon
T02D1412:429a-32: pa dang / nyan thos kyi rigs can gyi mdun du g-yon pa'i spyod pa mi bstan par bya'o //
T02D1412:429a-33: gal te sgrub pa po rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i
T02D1412:429a-34: ched du gsang ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi sku bri
T02D1412:429a-35: zhing mkha' 'gro'i sngags bag med par 'don zhing lha'i
T02D1412:429a-36: sku ston na / de la nga ni mi lta ste //
T02D1412:429a-37: zhes gsungs pas bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis mi
T02D1412:429a-38: rlob cing dur khrod brgyad kyi mkha' 'gro ma stong
T02D1412:429a-39: phrag du mas ngan pa'i bdag nyid can de za
T02D1412:429a-40: bar 'gyur ro // gal te bram ze'i sdom pa
T02D1412:429a-41: dang ldan pa'am nyan thos kyi sdom pa dang ldan
T02D1412:429a-42: na mkha' 'gro mas mi gnod do snyam na /
T02D1412:429a-43: bram ze gsod pas the tshom med //
T02D1412:429b-0: sdig spyod @429b rmongs pa'i bdag nyid ces bya ba
T02D1412:429b-1: ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir lha'i sku ston
T02D1412:429b-2: cing gsang sngags 'don na bde bar gshegs pa bslus
T02D1412:429b-3: par gyur pas ngan pa'i bdag nyid can de za
T02D1412:429b-4: bar 'gyur ro // de la da ni skyabs mi byed //
T02D1412:429b-5: ces bya ba ni nyes pa byas kyang phyis 'gyod
T02D1412:429b-6: pa'i sems mi skye ba de la mi slob po
T02D1412:429b-7: // de ni gsang ba ste rnal 'byor pa'i nang nas bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1412:429b-8: dam tshig srung bar mi nus pa de sreg rdzas kyi phyugs dang 'dra ba yin no //
T02D1412:429b-9: 'jig rten pha rol gnod pa ni //
T02D1412:429b-10: bla ma la 'khu dam tshig nyams //
T02D1412:429b-11: mtho ris 'jig rten las de lhung //
T02D1412:429b-13: dor bya'i gang zag bstan nas blang bya'i gang zag bstan pa ni /
T02D1412:429b-14: he ru ka dpal lha sku'i sngags //
T02D1412:429b-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:429b-16: yid skyob par byed pas na sngags te /
T02D1412:429b-17: lha'i sku phyag rgya chen po dang de'i sngags so //
T02D1412:429b-18: de dag gang zhig srung bar byed pa la mkha'
T02D1412:429b-19: 'gro ma sum cu rtsa drug dang bcas pa'i phag
T02D1412:429b-20: mo dge ba'i gdong can dpal he ru ka dpa'
T02D1412:429b-21: bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang bcas par phan 'dogs
T02D1412:429b-22: par mdzad do // mtshan nyid dang po bla ma la gus pa ni /
T02D1412:429b-23: bla ma rnams ni bsnyen bkur brjod //
T02D1412:429b-24: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1412:429b-25: mtshan nyid gnyis pa dam tshig bsrung ba ni /
T02D1412:429b-26: gsang ba bsrung ba'i sgrub pa po //
T02D1412:429b-29: bde ba'i lam la mos pa ni //
T02D1412:429b-30: mkha' 'gro ma la rtag dga' bas //
T02D1412:429b-33: mtshan nyid bzhi pa sems pa ni /
T02D1412:429b-34: sgrub po po ni bdag nyid 'gyur //
T02D1412:429b-35: khams gsum pa la bya ba'i dag / ces bya ba gsungs so //
T02D1412:429b-36: mtshan nyid lnga pa mchog par 'gyur ba ni /
T02D1412:429b-37: sgrub po dpa' bo nyid 'dod pa //
T02D1412:429b-38: thams cad du ni mchod par 'gyur //
T02D1412:429b-40: / mtshan nyid drug pa sgom pa dang ldan pa ni /
T02D1412:429b-42: yang dag khro ba rigs par 'gyur //
T02D1412:429b-44: mtshan nyid bdun pa brtul zhugs dang ldan pa ni /
T02D1412:429b-45: he ru ka yi brtul zhugs 'dzin //
T02D1412:429b-46: slob dpon dpa' bo thob 'gyur pa //
T02D1412:430a-2: brgyad pa gsang sngags la dga' ba ni /
T02D1412:430a-3: sgrub pa pos ni sngags 'di dag / mthong zhing kun du dga' zhes gsungs so //
T02D1412:430a-4: de'i sngags du yin zhe na /
T02D1412:430a-5: rtsa ba'i sngags kyi yi ge mchog / dpa' bo yi ge bdun pa ni //
T02D1412:430a-8: yab yum gyi snying po bzhi dang /
T02D1412:430a-9: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i snying po dang /
T02D1412:430a-10: gnod mdzes kyi sngags la sogs pa rnams 'dzin par
T02D1412:430a-11: byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang zhig las bcu gnyis
T02D1412:430a-13: aom la sogs pa khyad par dbye //
T02D1412:430a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:430a-18: mngon spyod la phat ces bya ba la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis dbye ba'o //
T02D1412:430a-19: de rnams 'bad de phyag bya zhing //
T02D1412:430a-20: zhes bya ba ni phrin las bcu gnyis byed pa'i
T02D1412:430a-21: lha de rnam la gus par 'bad de phyag bya
T02D1412:430a-23: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la
T02D1412:430a-24: zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas
T02D1412:430a-25: mchod pa byas na rtag tu las bcu gnyis byed
T02D1412:430a-26: pa'o // dpa' bo chen po de rnams dang lhan
T02D1412:430a-27: cig rol pa dang ldan pas bka' bsgo ba nyan
T02D1412:430a-29: de ltar las bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i lha de rnams ji ltar bskyed par bya snyam na /
T02D1412:430a-30: de yi thugs ka nas phag mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1412:430a-31: thugs ka'i chos kyi dbyings las yum rdo rje phag
T02D1412:430a-32: mo sprul ba de dang snyoms par zhugs pa las
T02D1412:430a-33: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang dpa' mo sum
T02D1412:430a-34: cu rtsa gnyis dang bcas pa sprul nas las bcu
T02D1412:430a-35: gnyis bya'o // de yang kun spyod las /
T02D1412:430a-36: sprul pa las byung dpa' bo rnams //
T02D1412:430a-37: yan lag bcu drug sems kyis sprul //
T02D1412:430a-38: dag pa'i chos kyi sprul pa ni //
T02D1412:430a-39: phag mo'i gzugs su bstan pa yin //
T02D1412:430a-41: mtshan nyid brgyad dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas sngags
T02D1412:430a-42: bcu gnyis zlos shing dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis mi 'dra
T02D1412:430a-43: ba sgom pa la phan yon ci zhig yod ce
T02D1412:430a-44: na / de dang gang zhig legs skyes pa //
T02D1412:430a-45: srog chags bsod nams mthong ba yin //
T02D1412:430b-0: phyi nang gi sbyin sreg byed pa'i rnal 'byor @430b
T02D1412:430b-1: pa lha'i sku bsgoms pa de dang de ni 'phags
T02D1412:430b-2: pa'i rigs su legs par skyes shing dngos grub len
T02D1412:430b-3: pa mthong ba'i srog chags de yang bsod nams can
T02D1412:430b-4: yin no // de'i phan yon gnyis pa mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bsrung ba gsungs pa ni /
T02D1412:430b-5: gsang ba 'dus pa ltar dngos grub len pa la bar chad kyi bgegs bzlog pa'o //
T02D1412:430b-6: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i 'khor lo mi dgos par chu'i
T02D1412:430b-7: nang du 'dug kyang rung rgya mtsho'am ri dang ri
T02D1412:430b-8: bo la sogs par mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis
T02D1412:430b-9: bu gcig pa ltar zhen pa'i thugs kyis blta zhing
T02D1412:430b-10: gzigs par gnas pa yin no //
T02D1412:430b-11: de nyid bsdus pa ltar gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyis
T02D1412:430b-12: bsrung ba med par 'jigs pa chen po'i dur khrod
T02D1412:430b-13: la sogs par mkha' 'gro dang ro langs la sogs
T02D1412:430b-14: pa du ma de dang lhan cig tu rnal 'byor
T02D1412:430b-15: pa dpa' bo chen po bka' ji ltar bsgo ba
T02D1412:430b-16: ltar bde bar rol cing rgyu bar mdzad pa yin
T02D1412:430b-17: no // rnam par snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul dra ba
T02D1412:430b-18: ltar lus ngag yid gsum la bsrung ba mi dgos
T02D1412:430b-19: pa'i rnal 'byor pa de ri sul dang tshang tshing
T02D1412:430b-20: na gnas na lus la mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis
T02D1412:430b-21: no // gsang ba dang / ngag la gsang ba'i drang srong rnams kyis gsang ba dang /
T02D1412:430b-22: yid la rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis sbas pa'i phyir
T02D1412:430b-23: phyogs de dang de dag tu sgrub pa po 'gro
T02D1412:430b-24: ba'i tshe mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang sa steng su
T02D1412:430b-26: le'u sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:430b-28: // / de ltar gnas bshad nas dus bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:430b-29: de nas sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor che //
T02D1412:430b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:430b-31: dngos grub len pa'i dus su phyi rol gzugs brnyan gyi 'khor lo'am /
T02D1412:430b-32: nang gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed pa'i tshe /
T02D1412:430b-33: bzhad pa rnam pa brgyad pa dgod //
T02D1412:430b-35: dkyil 'khor gyi lha la ha brgyad kyis sgra grag
T02D1412:430b-36: pa'i thos pa'i mtshan ma 'byung na de'i rjes thogs
T02D1412:430b-37: la rtags 'di yang dag par mthong bas dngos grub
T02D1412:430b-38: stsol bar gdon mi za ba yin no //
T02D1412:430b-39: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:430b-40: 'jigs pa'i sgra ni rnam mang po //
T02D1412:430b-42: rgyud bla ma nas 'byung ba ltar //
T02D1412:431a-1: hi hi dang phem phem dang h'um phat ces bya
T02D1412:431a-2: ba'i sgra mi bzad pa mkha' 'gro drug cu rtsa
T02D1412:431a-3: gnyis kyis 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa'i tshe dpa' bo
T02D1412:431a-5: shin tu 'jigs pa'i phyag 'bum pa bsgoms pas de rnams skrag cing rnam par dbye bar 'gyur ro ;
T02D1412:431a-6: / gal te dpa' bo mi 'jigs na lag pa
T02D1412:431a-7: g-yon pa nas bzung la gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhir
T02D1412:431a-8: rang rang gi gnas su khyer nas mkha' 'gro ma
T02D1412:431a-9: de rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed cing snang
T02D1412:431a-10: ba mtha' yas kyi bde ba can dang 'dra bar
T02D1412:431a-12: dpal he ru ka'i nus pas 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1412:431a-13: pa de mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnas su khyer bar
T02D1412:431a-14: 'gyur ro // byed do // gnas der ma khyer
T02D1412:431a-15: na yang bzhad pa brgyad kyi sgra thos pa'i sgrub
T02D1412:431a-16: pa po sngags kyi lus can de 'khor ba'i rgas
T02D1412:431a-17: pa dang 'chi ba rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa
T02D1412:431a-18: yongs su 'gyur ba thob nas mkha' 'gro thams cad
T02D1412:431a-20: rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang sbyar na 'di skad ston
T02D1412:431a-21: pa yin te thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs
T02D1412:431a-22: pa'i tshe rlung gi 'khor lo ha brgyad kyis gyen
T02D1412:431a-24: dga' ba la sogs pa'i dus su dbugs rgod pa dang /
T02D1412:431a-25: rngam pa 'byung ba la sogs pa 'jigs pa'i sgra rnam pa mang po mi bzad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:431a-26: de la dpa' bo 'jigs pa med par srog aa
T02D1412:431a-27: wa dh'u t'ir bcug na lag pa g-yon pa zhes
T02D1412:431a-28: bya ba'i brdas btags pa byang chub kyi sems kyi
T02D1412:431a-29: rang bzhin gyi gnas spyi gtsug tu byer nas rtsa
T02D1412:431a-30: sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D1412:431a-31: rtag tu bde bas mngon par rtse zhing spyi gtsug dz'a landha ra'i gnas dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:431a-32: de ltar dpal he ru ka'i nus pa 'dod pas
T02D1412:431a-33: mgo nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su khyer nas
T02D1412:431a-34: sgrub pa po rlung bzlog pa'i sngags kyi lus can
T02D1412:431a-35: skye rgan 'chi'i chu bo bzhi las brgal bar 'gyur
T02D1412:431a-36: ro // le'u sum cu rtsa dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:431a-38: // / de ltar dngos grub kyi dus bshad nas dbang du bya ba'i sbyin sreg bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:431a-39: de nas da ni bshad bya ba //
T02D1412:431a-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:431b-0: da ni @431b thabs gang gis rgyal rigs la sogs
T02D1412:431b-1: pa'i mi rnams dbang du gyur pa ni rnal 'byor
T02D1412:431b-2: dang / sngags dang sbyin sreg gi cho ga la
T02D1412:431b-3: gnas pa'i dpa' bos zla ba gcig gis grub par
T02D1412:431b-4: dang / 'gyur ro // de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:431b-5: sgrol ma myos byed bcas pa dang ;
T02D1412:431b-6: nya yi sha dang ldan par ni //
T02D1412:431b-7: zhes bya bas sreg rdzas bstan te /
T02D1412:431b-8: sgron ma ni sha chen lnga'o //
T02D1412:431b-10: nya sha dang ldan pa ni nya sha dang bcas pa'i khrag dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1412:431b-11: dpa' dbang gnas skabs thams cad du //
T02D1412:431b-12: zhes bya ba ni lhar bsgom pa ste /
T02D1412:431b-14: dpa' bo'i dbang po ni dpal he ru kar bsgom pa'o //
T02D1412:431b-15: gnas skabs thams cad ni thun bzhir ro //
T02D1412:431b-16: nyi ma bdun gyis sgrub byed cing //
T02D1412:431b-17: zhes bya ba ni thun bzhir ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg bya ba'am //
T02D1412:431b-18: mtshan mo sbyin sreg byed la gzhol //
T02D1412:431b-19: zhes bya ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed pa'i
T02D1412:431b-20: dus su mtshan mo phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa'i
T02D1412:431b-21: brtul zhugs dang ldan pas nang gi sbyin sreg byas
T02D1412:431b-22: nas dbang du byed pa la sogs pa dngos grub
T02D1412:431b-23: rgya chen po bcu gnyis stsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:431b-24: rgyal rigs la phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg grangs du dang ldan par bya zhe na /
T02D1412:431b-25: brgya rtsa brgyad dang ldan nyid kyis //
T02D1412:431b-27: grangs brgya rtsa brgyad dang ldan pas thun gsum du
T02D1412:431b-28: phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg brgya byed na rgyal
T02D1412:431b-29: po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa
T02D1412:431b-30: zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:431b-31: de'i phyed lnga bcu rtsa bzhis nyi ma bdun sbyin sreg byas na dpa' bo chen po ste /
T02D1412:431b-33: de'i phyed zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun sbyin sreg byas na slob dpon dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:431b-34: rgyal phran rnams la ni grangs sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis nyi ma bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:431b-35: grangs nyi shu rtsa bzhis bram ze rnams la nyi
T02D1412:431b-36: ma bdun gyis sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur
T02D1412:431b-37: ro // de bzhin du rgyal rigs dag la bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1412:432a-1: gdol pa can rnams la rdzas re re zhing thun
T02D1412:432a-2: bzhir sbyin sreg gzhag bdun byas na dbang du 'gyur
T02D1412:432a-3: ro // de ltar dpa' bo'i rigs rim gyis //
T02D1412:432a-4: zla ba gcig ni yang dag spyad //
T02D1412:432a-5: ces bya ba ni gal te zhag bdun gyis ma
T02D1412:432a-6: grub na zla ba gcig gis bskyar ba'i cho gas
T02D1412:432a-7: bskyang bar byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:432a-8: sngags dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos ba sham ku
T02D1412:432a-9: ru ho zhes bya ba'i sngags dang ldan pa'i sgrub
T02D1412:432a-10: pa pos rgyal rigs la sogs pa'i 'gro ba thams
T02D1412:432a-11: cad dbang du 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D1412:432a-12: dpa' bo'i cho ga 'di yis ni //
T02D1412:432a-14: zhes bya ba ni phan yon ston pa yin te /
T02D1412:432a-15: dbang du bya ba'i cho ga 'di bzhin du las
T02D1412:432a-16: bcu gnyis gang 'dod pa la phyi dang nang gi
T02D1412:432a-17: sbyin sreg 'di bsten na grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:432a-18: sa steng 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bzhin //
T02D1412:432a-19: zhes bya ba ni mi'i 'khor los sgyur ba thob pa'am /
T02D1412:432a-20: dpal ldan skal ba bzang por 'gyur //
T02D1412:432a-21: zhes bya ba ni brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i 'khor los sgyur bar gyur pa'am //
T02D1412:432a-22: sgrub pa pos mkha' 'gro ma sum cu rtsa drug gi yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D1412:432a-23: dpal 'khor lo bde mchog lta bu mchog gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:432a-24: le'u bzhi bcu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:432a-26: // / de ltar rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i 'khor
T02D1412:432a-27: lo bcus dngos grub bsgrub pa bshad nas gsang sngags
T02D1412:432a-29: dang por re zhig dpa' bo dang dpa' mo thams cad kyi sngags dgod par ston pa ni /
T02D1412:432a-30: de nas las kyi mchog rab ni //
T02D1412:432a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1412:432a-32: las kyi mchog ni yi ge'i 'khrul 'khor ro //
T02D1412:432a-33: rnal 'byor pa gang gis shes nas dang por bskyed
T02D1412:432a-34: pa'i rim pa la brten nas mthong ba dang reg
T02D1412:432a-35: pa dang thos pa'i mtshan ma thob pa'i sgrub pa
T02D1412:432a-36: pos dngos grub len pa'i tshe dbang du bya ba'i
T02D1412:432a-37: las bcu gnyis byed pa'am yang na rdzogs pa'i rim
T02D1412:432a-38: pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas sa chu la thim
T02D1412:432a-39: pas du ba lta bu dang /
T02D1412:432a-40: chu me la thim pas smig rgyu lta bu dang /
T02D1412:432b-0: me rlung la thim pas srin bu me khyer lta @432b bu dang /
T02D1412:432b-1: rlung rnam par shes pa la thim pas sgron ma lta bu dang /
T02D1412:432b-2: rnam par shes pa nam mkha' la thim pas nam
T02D1412:432b-3: mkha' stong pa lta bu thim pa'i rtags 'byung ba'i
T02D1412:432b-4: tshe / 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags kyis 'khrul 'khor 'di rnams byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:432b-5: de la rang gi mtshan ma thob pa de las dang po'i rnal 'byor pa yin la /
T02D1412:432b-6: mtshan ma thob pa ni ye shes cung zad tsam la dbang ba yin no //
T02D1412:432b-7: mtshan ma thob pa'i rjes la 'jig rten gyi dngos
T02D1412:432b-8: grub bcu gnyis 'grub pa ni phrin las kyi ye
T02D1412:432b-9: shes la dbang ba yin no //
T02D1412:432b-10: las bcu gnyis kyis 'gro ba brtul nas mchog gi
T02D1412:432b-11: dngos grub ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo snod gcig tu
T02D1412:432b-13: zhi ba'i gtsang sbra gsang ba'i dbang bskur gyi gtsang sbra dang /
T02D1412:432b-14: shes rab ye shes pho nya'i gtsang sbras zhi gnas dang /
T02D1412:432b-15: lhag mthong mngon sum du skyes nas phyag rgya chen
T02D1412:432b-16: po chos kyi dbyings la sems kyi stong nyid bsgoms
T02D1412:432b-17: pas mchog gi dngos grub thob pa ni ye shes
T02D1412:432b-18: la yang dag par dbang ba'o //
T02D1412:432b-19: de yang rgyud bla ma las /
T02D1412:432b-20: skye ba stong phrag du ma ru //
T02D1412:432b-21: sgyu 'phrul ye shes kyis bskul ba //
T02D1412:432b-22: sngags dang phyag rgya legs sbyor bas //
T02D1412:432b-23: ye shes la ni dbang thob yin //
T02D1412:432b-25: / de ltar na gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa bcu gnyis ni dbang gnyis pa dgug pa dang /
T02D1412:432b-31: brgyad pa rmongs shing phur bus gdab pa dang /
T02D1412:432b-32: dgu pa tshig 'phrog cing dgug pa dang /
T02D1412:432b-33: bcu pa 'on long du bya ba dang /
T02D1412:432b-34: bcu gcig pa ma ning nyid du bya ba dang /
T02D1412:432b-35: bcu gnyis pa gzugs sna tshogs su gyur pa ste /
T02D1412:432b-36: las bcu gnyis po 'di dag bskyed rdzogs la mtshan
T02D1412:432b-37: ma thob pa'i sgrub pa pos 'khrul 'khor dran pa
T02D1412:432b-38: tsam gyis grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za'o //
T02D1412:432b-39: de yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro las gnod mdzes kyi
T02D1412:432b-40: 'khrul 'khor dang sbyar nas las bcu gnyis 'grub par
T02D1412:432b-41: 'gyur gsungs / gnod mdzes kyi 'khor lo ji ltar dgod ce na /
T02D1412:432b-42: 'jig rten 'khrul 'khor gyi mkhan po gza' chen po brgyad yin la /
T02D1412:433a-1: gza' rgyu ba'i 'khrul 'khor bcings nas las bcu gnyis
T02D1412:433a-2: byed pas de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las khro bo
T02D1412:433a-4: rig pa mchog las gdon gyi gtso bo 'khrul 'khor gyi mtshan ma can zhes bshad do //
T02D1412:433a-5: rdo rje mkha' 'gro las bcom ldan 'das gnod mdzes
T02D1412:433a-6: kyi sngags 'di sgra gcan ltar rdo rje rol pa
T02D1412:433a-8: spen pa ltar yi dags srin po'i gdong gis dgod pa'am /
T02D1412:433a-9: mig dmar ltar gshin rje dbyug pa 'chang bas dgod pa'am /
T02D1412:433a-10: mjug ring sa ltar ma mo rigs ldan ma'i 'khor
T02D1412:433a-11: los dgod pa gsungs pa bzhi po re re la
T02D1412:433a-12: yang 'khrul 'khor bris pa'i gnas mi 'dra ba bcu
T02D1412:433a-13: gnyis dang / bri ba'i snag tsha dang /
T02D1412:433a-14: smyu gu mi 'dra ba bcu gnyis dang /
T02D1412:433a-15: ming dang spel ba'i sngags mi 'dra ba bcu gnyis dang /
T02D1412:433a-16: lingga'i bye brag mi 'dra ba bcu gnyis kyis 'khrul
T02D1412:433a-17: 'khor re re las bcu gnyis byed pas bzhi bcu
T02D1412:433a-18: rtsa brgyad du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'o //
T02D1412:433a-19: rgyud bla ma dang he ru ka 'byung ba dang
T02D1412:433a-20: sbyar nas yab kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying
T02D1412:433a-21: po'i 'khrul 'khor dang yum gyi snying po dang dpa'
T02D1412:433a-22: bo'i sngags dang / dpa' mo'i sngags dang /
T02D1412:433a-23: dpa' bo'i go cha'i sngags dang /
T02D1412:433a-24: dpa' mo'i go cha'i sngags dang /
T02D1412:433a-25: dpa' bo'i rkang pa brgyad pa dang /
T02D1412:433a-26: dpa' mo'i rkang la brgyad pa'i 'khrul 'khor te /
T02D1412:433a-27: 'khrul 'khor bcu la dbus kyi ni mi 'dra ba
T02D1412:433a-28: ming dang spel ba bcu gnyis bkod pa'i dbye bas
T02D1412:433a-29: phye ba yin na 'khrul 'khor brgya nyi shur 'gyur
T02D1412:433a-30: ro // de ltar dngos grub kyi 'bras bu bshad nas /
T02D1412:433a-31: da ni de'i thabs gsungs pa ni /
T02D1412:433a-32: shar dang byang gi gnas sogs la //
T02D1412:433a-33: mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad khyab //
T02D1412:433a-35: dngos grub sgrub pa'i tshe gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi
T02D1412:433a-36: na gnas pa'i las kyi phyag rgya dung can ma
T02D1412:433a-37: dang / ri dags can ma dang /
T02D1412:433a-38: padma can dngos grub kyi yan lag tu bsten par gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1412:433a-39: ye shes ldan par rang skye gnas //
T02D1412:433a-40: zhes bya ba ni ye shes las skyes pa'i byang chub sems ma'o //
T02D1412:433b-0: @433b yul dang yul du mngon par skyes //
T02D1412:433b-1: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gdan nyi shu rtsa bzhir skyes pa'i zhing skyes so //
T02D1412:433b-2: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gtso mo ste //
T02D1412:433b-3: zhes bya ba ni bsnyen sgrub bzhis yum rdo rje phag mor bskyed pa'i sngags skyes so //
T02D1412:433b-4: de ni mkha' 'gro ma ru bshad //
T02D1412:433b-5: ces bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis nam mkhar 'gro bas nam mkha' 'gro ma ste /
T02D1412:433b-6: las bcu gnyis byed pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1412:433b-7: gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi po de dag gang yin zhe na /
T02D1412:433b-8: sku'i 'khor lo ku lu t'a nas thugs kyi 'khor
T02D1412:433b-9: lo pull'i ra m'a la yar thug pa'i gnas nyi
T02D1412:433b-10: shu rtsa bzhi'o // sogs zhes bya ba ni khyim lnga pi li ba dang /
T02D1412:433b-11: nye ba'i pi li pa dang /
T02D1412:433b-13: nye ba'i grong mtha' rnams gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1412:433b-14: yul de rnams kyi bu mo gang //
T02D1412:433b-15: zhes bya ba ni zhing skyes kyi bu mo ste
T02D1412:433b-16: dpa' bo dang gnyis su med par 'gyur pa'i dngos
T02D1412:433b-17: grub kyi yan lag gi rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1412:433b-18: de kun 'dod pa'i gzugs can te //
T02D1412:433b-19: zhes bya ba ni gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhir skyes
T02D1412:433b-20: pa'i ye shes can gyi rnal 'byor ma rnams yid
T02D1412:433b-21: la 'dod pa'i gzugs sna tshogs su bsgyur nas yid
T02D1412:433b-22: mgyogs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pas rnal 'byor pa'i
T02D1412:433b-23: bsam pa rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
T02D1412:433b-24: dag byed dbang gi lha mo dang //
T02D1412:433b-25: dpa' bo'i lha mo bka' bsgo skye //
T02D1412:433b-26: de 'og ma lus kun spyod ma //
T02D1412:433b-27: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma rnams bshad pa dang /
T02D1412:433b-28: 'di la khyad par ci yod ce na /
T02D1412:433b-29: sngar ni thun mong gi sgrub pa dang /
T02D1412:433b-30: dngos grub dang sgrub pa rnams kyi yan lag tu gsungs pa yin la /
T02D1412:433b-31: le'u nyi shu rtsa drug dang rtsa bdun dang rtsa
T02D1412:433b-32: brgyad dang rtsa dgu bar ni dngos grub kyi yan
T02D1412:433b-33: lag tu gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1412:433b-34: le'u gsum pa nas lnga bcu'i bar gyi le'u nyi
T02D1412:433b-35: shus ni las rnams kyi lha mo gsungs pa yin
T02D1412:433b-36: no // de la bsgrub pa'i yan lag ni las
T02D1412:433b-37: dang po la mtshan ma ma thob kyi bar du
T02D1412:433b-39: mtshan ma thob nas mchog gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i yan lag dang /
T02D1412:434a-1: du phrin las bcu gnyis byed pa'i phyag rgya ni
T02D1412:434a-2: 'jig rten gyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i lha mo ci
T02D1412:434a-4: dngos grub grub pa'i yan lag ste /
T02D1412:434a-5: 'khor los sgyur ba'i btsun mo rin po che bzhin
T02D1412:434a-6: du reg bya khyad par can gyi sgo nas bsam
T02D1412:434a-7: gtan gyi lus dang yid kyi bde ba skyed pa
T02D1412:434a-8: dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi dge
T02D1412:434a-9: ba'i bshes gnyen bcom pa mo lha'i bshes gnyen du
T02D1412:434a-10: reg bya'i stong pa nyid rtogs par byed pa yin
T02D1412:434a-11: dang / no // de ltar dngos grub kyi yan
T02D1412:434a-12: lag gi reg bya'i khyad par can las kyi phyag
T02D1412:434a-13: dang / no // rgya dang / ro khyad par can skye ba bdun pa'i sha dang /
T02D1412:434a-14: dri khyad par can bdud rtsi lnga'i dri dang /
T02D1412:434a-15: sgra khyad par can yi ge dang ngag gi brda dang /
T02D1412:434a-16: gzugs khyad par can las kyi phyag rgya'i yan lag dang /
T02D1412:434a-17: nying lag gi brda dang ldan pas dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o zhes kha sbyor las gsungs so //
T02D1412:434a-18: sngon bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling du byon pa'i
T02D1412:434a-19: tshe ye shes kyi lha mo du zhig yod snyam
T02D1412:434a-20: na / rnal 'byor ma drug ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1412:434a-21: mdor bsdu na go cha'i lha'i rigs drug gi bdag nyid do //
T02D1412:434a-22: de yang sku'i 'khor lo'i tha ma ku lu t'a
T02D1412:434a-23: dang ma ru gnyis na brtson chen ma dang 'khor
T02D1412:434a-24: los sgyur ma ni ma mo rnams zhes brdas btags
T02D1412:434a-25: so // sindhu dang nag rar stobs chen ma dang
T02D1412:434a-26: shin tu dpa' mo ni rigs rnams kyi gtso mo
T02D1412:434a-27: zhes bya ba'i brdas btags te /
T02D1412:434a-28: rta mchog gi btsun mo tsandi ka'i rigs bzhi yin no //
T02D1412:434a-29: gser gling dang soo r'ashtar ni 'khor lo'i go cha
T02D1412:434a-30: dang kos rings ma ni rigs kyi lha mo'i brdas
T02D1412:434a-31: btags so // gri ha de ba dang pre ta
T02D1412:434a-32: bu rir ni dum skyes ma dang 'khor lo'i shugs
T02D1412:434a-33: can ma la stobs chen ma zhes bya ste /
T02D1412:434a-34: nam mkha'i snying po'i btsun mo skrag byed ma'i rigs bzhi'o //
T02D1412:434a-35: hi m'a la ya dang k'anytsi ra ni bya gdong
T02D1412:434a-36: ma dang rta rnam la gzugs can ma zhes bya
T02D1412:434a-38: lamp'a ka dang ka linggar shin tu bzang mo dang /
T02D1412:434a-39: sngo bsangs ma ni khyim gyi lha mo'i brtul zhugs
T02D1412:434a-40: 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i brdas btags pa'i he ru
T02D1412:434a-41: ka'i btsun mo bskyod ma'i rigs bzhi'o //
T02D1412:434b-0: @434b ko sa la dang tri sha ku ner ni
T02D1412:434b-1: chang 'thung ma dang rlung shugs ma la sha za
T02D1412:434b-2: ma zhes bya ba'i brdas btags so //
T02D1412:434b-3: k'a ma r'u pa dang ao ter ni 'jigs byed
T02D1412:434b-4: chen mo dang sa srung ma la rdo rje mkha'
T02D1412:434b-5: 'gro ma dang / gtso mo'i dbang phyug ces bya
T02D1412:434b-6: ba ste padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi btsun mo
T02D1412:434b-8: m'a la ba dang de w'i ko t'ir shing grib
T02D1412:434b-9: ma dang langga'i dbang phyug ma la khanda ro h'a
T02D1412:434b-11: r'a me shva r'i dang go d'a wa rir mi'u
T02D1412:434b-12: thung ma dang dpa' bo'i blo gros ma la mkha'
T02D1412:434b-13: 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i brdas brtags te /
T02D1412:434b-14: rnam par snang mdzad kyi btsun mo gshin rje ma'i rigs bzhi yin no //
T02D1412:434b-16: aodyan du sna chen ma dang 'od ldan ma sme sha can zhes bya ba'i brdas btags so //
T02D1412:434b-17: dz'a landha ra dang pull'i ra m'a la yar gtum
T02D1412:434b-18: mig ma dang rab gtum ma bud med ces bya
T02D1412:434b-20: rdo rje sems pa'i btsun mo'i rigs bzhi yin no //
T02D1412:434b-21: de ltar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma las rigs drug
T02D1412:434b-22: dang sbyar bar bshad kyang rtsa ba'i rgyud la ni
T02D1412:434b-23: pull'i ra m'a la ya dz'a landha ra gser gling
T02D1412:434b-24: zhes bya ba'i ming gis btags nas thugs kyi 'khor
T02D1412:434b-25: lo la stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig yod pa
T02D1412:434b-26: yin no zhes bshad pas thugs kyi 'khor lo'i gnas
T02D1412:434b-27: gnyis las drug ni gsal ba med do //
T02D1412:434b-28: lhag ma gzhan dag ji snyed pa //
T02D1412:434b-29: zhes bya ba ni rig drug gis bsdus pa'i gtso
T02D1412:434b-30: mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi las gzhan pa lha mo
T02D1412:434b-31: bcu gnyis kyi rigs ni dpal he ru ka'i 'khor
T02D1412:434b-33: mkha' 'gro ma sum cu rtsa drug po 'di dag ci'i phyir gtso mo yin zhe na /
T02D1412:434b-34: shr'i he ru ka sbyor ba //
T02D1412:434b-35: de yi dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin //
T02D1412:434b-36: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ye shes kyi lha mo sprul pa'i sku yin no //
T02D1412:434b-38: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'gro ba khyab //
T02D1412:434b-39: ces bya ba ni rgyu ba 'gro ba rigs drug gi gdul bya 'dul ba dang /
T02D1412:434b-40: mi rgyu ba snod kyi 'jig rten sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1412:434b-41: zhing khams su byas nas 'gro ba la khyab par
T02D1412:434b-42: gnas pas na sgrub pa po la dngos grub stsol
T02D1412:434b-43: ba yin no // de ltar ye shes grub pa'i
T02D1412:434b-44: lha mo bshad nas mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1412:434b-45: pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag bshad pa ni //
T02D1412:435a-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:435a-3: las bcu gnyis byed pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'ching ba'i sgrub
T02D1412:435a-4: pa po 'di'i dam tshig ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo
T02D1412:435a-6: de yang bsam gtan dang bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg
T02D1412:435a-7: la sogs pa byas nas sa steng 'di ru las
T02D1412:435a-8: bcu gnyis kyi sbyor ba rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:435a-9: bsam gtan de yang ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1412:435a-11: sngags pa rtag tu mnyam gzhag pas //
T02D1412:435a-12: mtshan mo nam mkha'i gos can bya //
T02D1412:435a-14: dpal he ru ka dang yum rdo rje phag mo'i cha byad du bya'o //
T02D1412:435a-15: skyes pa'am zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa lngar bsgoms pa'o //
T02D1412:435a-16: g-yon pa kun zhes bya ba ni lha mo sum cu rtsa bdun bsgoms pa'o //
T02D1412:435a-17: rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo mnyes //
T02D1412:435a-18: zhes bya ba ni srog aa wa dh'u t'ir bcug nas dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa'o //
T02D1412:435a-20: yid ni nang du chud pa yis //
T02D1412:435a-21: 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya //
T02D1412:435a-23: phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis //
T02D1412:435a-24: rang byung rtag tu mchod na ni //
T02D1412:435a-25: zhes bya ba ni dga' bral du song na phung
T02D1412:435a-26: po dang khams dang skye mched kyi lha mchod pa'o
T02D1412:435a-28: rang rdzas thig las sangs rgyas dang //
T02D1412:435a-29: byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya //
T02D1412:435a-31: mchod pa'i 'bras bu ci zhig yin zhe na /
T02D1412:435a-32: ma lus lus pa med grub cing //
T02D1412:435a-33: g-yon pa mchod la rab tu 'jug / ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1412:435a-34: dga' bral du song yang 'jig rten gyi dngos grub ma lus pa grub par 'gyur pa yin no //
T02D1412:435a-35: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D1412:435a-36: srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud nas mi rtog pa
T02D1412:435a-37: skyes na mchog gi dngos grub bam dga' bral du
T02D1412:435a-38: song yang las bcu gnyis kyi 'khrul 'khor dang ldan
T02D1412:435a-39: pas 'jig rten gyi dngos grub grub po //
T02D1412:435a-40: de la 'khrul 'khor 'di yin te zhi ba la gro ga'am shing shun la /
T02D1412:435a-41: rgyas pa la ras sam spang leb la /
T02D1412:435b-0: dbang la bud med kyi smad @435b sham la //
T02D1412:435b-1: mngon spyod la dur khrod kyi ras la gi wang
T02D1412:435b-2: la sogs pas bris nas lha drug cu rtsa gnyis
T02D1412:435b-3: kyi 'khor lo la sngags drug cu rtsa gnyis bris
T02D1412:435b-4: te lha bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa
T02D1412:435b-5: dang go cha bgo ba dang /
T02D1412:435b-11: bstod pa byas nas slar yi ge zhu ba'i 'khrul
T02D1412:435b-12: 'khor bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel ba zhi ba la
T02D1412:435b-13: grog mkhar gyi sa las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan nam
T02D1412:435b-14: // rgyas pa la kham pa las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan nam /
T02D1412:435b-15: dbang la tsandan las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan nam /
T02D1412:435b-16: mngon spyod la dur khrod kyis las byas pa'i gzugs
T02D1412:435b-17: brnyan gyi snying gar bcug la las bcu gnyis byas
T02D1412:435b-19: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:435b-22: // / de ltar dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i sngags kyi
T02D1412:435b-23: 'khor lo bshad nas nye ba'i sngags kyi 'khor lo
T02D1412:435b-24: bshad pa ni / de nas dpa' bo'i me tog chu //
T02D1412:435b-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:435b-26: gro ga 'am ras sam smad sham mam dur khrod
T02D1412:435b-27: kyi ras la gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa'i lha
T02D1412:435b-28: drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi 'khrul 'khor bkod nas snying
T02D1412:435b-29: po re re'i shar phyogs su ha gnyis /
T02D1412:435b-32: lho phyogs kyi he gnyis kyi dpa' bo dang dpa'
T02D1412:435b-33: mo'i snying po thams cad la ha brgyad kyis bskor
T02D1412:435b-34: ba ni dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i nye ba'i sngags
T02D1412:435b-35: kyi 'khor lo ste las bcu gnyis byed par 'gyur
T02D1412:435b-36: ro // 'khrul 'khor de byed pa'i tshe lingga'i snying
T02D1412:435b-37: gar 'khrul 'khor de bcug nas bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i
T02D1412:435b-38: rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1412:435b-39: ji ltar bsgom par bya snyam na /
T02D1412:435b-40: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma bsnyen sgrub bzhi sbyangs
T02D1412:435b-41: la me tog dang chu ni rakta dang shu kra
T02D1412:435b-42: ste aa wa dh'u t'i'i sgor phyin pa 'thungs nas
T02D1412:435b-43: zhes bya ba gyen du bzlog pa la ting nge
T02D1412:435b-45: bzlog pa'i thabs gang yin zhe na /
T02D1412:436a-3: ha ha rnam pa brgyad kyis so //
T02D1412:436a-4: dus nam gyi tshe zhe na /
T02D1412:436a-5: phyag rgya lan cig sgrub pa pos //
T02D1412:436a-6: mtshan mo rtag tu ro mchog spyad //
T02D1412:436a-8: thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe rlung
T02D1412:436a-9: nang du 'jug pa'i tshe ni mtshan mo yin la
T02D1412:436a-10: / rlung gyen du bzlog na byang chub sems kyi ro myang bar bya'o //
T02D1412:436a-11: sngags gsum bya ba 'di nyid kyi //
T02D1412:436a-12: zhes bya ba ni dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang
T02D1412:436a-13: lhan cig skyes dga' ni yid skyob par byed pa'i
T02D1412:436a-14: sngags yin la / dga' ba gsum po de nyid
T02D1412:436a-15: kyi tshe kun rdzob byang chub sems kyi chu'i lus
T02D1412:436a-16: bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par 'gyur ro
T02D1412:436a-17: sngags yin la / // de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:436a-18: 'thungs dang de bzhin sbyin pa dang /
T02D1412:436a-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:436a-20: dpa' mo'i me tog dang dpa' bo'i byang chub kyi
T02D1412:436a-21: sems gyen du bzlog pa 'thungs pa yin la sbyin
T02D1412:436a-22: pa ni dga' bral du gyur pa'o //
T02D1412:436a-23: de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na /
T02D1412:436a-24: reg dang lhan cig nag mo che //
T02D1412:436a-26: reg pa ni aa wa dh'u t'i'i sgo phrad pas dga' ba'o //
T02D1412:436a-27: lhan cig nag mo ni yum rdo rje phag mo
T02D1412:436a-28: bsgom pa'i shes rab bde bas khyab pa ni mchog
T02D1412:436a-29: dga'o // bde bas tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ba
T02D1412:436a-30: ni yid bde ba lhan cig skyes dga' la bde
T02D1412:436a-31: ba'i rgyas btab pas tshangs par spyod pa'o //
T02D1412:436a-32: bzhad pa'i phyag rgyas bsgrub bya ba ni gal te
T02D1412:436a-33: dga' bral du song na ha rnam pa brgyad kyis
T02D1412:436a-34: bzhad pa'i phyag rgyas rlung gyen du bzlog pa'o //
T02D1412:436a-35: lta ba'i bsnyems pas grags ldan pa //
T02D1412:436a-36: zhes bya ba ni mig gi phyag rgyas mig btsum par bya'o //
T02D1412:436a-37: ngag dang mig gi phyag rgyas dus nam gyi tshe bya zhe na /
T02D1412:436a-38: mtshan mo'am de bzhin nyin mo'am /
T02D1412:436a-39: 'di ni bzhad pa dag tu bya //
T02D1412:436a-40: zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo dbugs rngub pa dang /
T02D1412:436a-41: nyin mo dbugs 'byung ba'i dus su gnyi gar yang
T02D1412:436a-42: rlung gi 'khrul 'khor bzhad pa dag gi phyag rgya
T02D1412:436a-43: dang lus kyi 'khrul 'khor bya ba yin no //
T02D1412:436a-44: de ltar rgyas par bshad nas /
T02D1412:436a-45: shin tu rgyas par bshad pa ni //
T02D1412:436b-0: gzugs dang las kyi gsang ba @436b gang ;
T02D1412:436b-1: / ji ltar gnas pa'i dpa' bo nyon //
T02D1412:436b-3: dga' ba bzhi brnyes pa'i gzugs kyi rtog pa dang /
T02D1412:436b-4: byang chub sems bzlog pa'i gsang ba'i thabs gang yin
T02D1412:436b-5: pa ji ltar gnas pa'i lag na rdo rje dpa'
T02D1412:436b-6: bo khyod nyon cig ces pas so //
T02D1412:436b-7: rtag tu de yis mchil ma 'byung //
T02D1412:436b-8: zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'i dus su rdul 'byung ba dang /
T02D1412:436b-10: dga' ba'i rdo rje las byang chub sems bsgom zhing 'da' bar mi byed pa dang /
T02D1412:436b-11: phyogs kyi gos kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02D1412:436b-12: de la gzugs kyi rtags bshad pa ni //
T02D1412:436b-13: g-yon pa'i dbang phyug thams cad kyi //
T02D1412:436b-15: ye shes dang zhing dang sngags las skyes pa rnams so //
T02D1412:436b-16: thams cad du phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag la rim
T02D1412:436b-17: gyis dbugs 'byin pa dang sdud pa dang ldan pa
T02D1412:436b-19: dgod pa ni mchog dga'i rtags so //
T02D1412:436b-20: sgeg pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rtags so //
T02D1412:436b-21: dpa' bo'i ngo mtshar ba ni dga' bral gyi rtags so //
T02D1412:436b-22: de yang dga' ba bzhi'i dus kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D1412:436b-23: sna tshogs dang por byas nas ni //
T02D1412:436b-25: dang po rnam pa sna tshogs so //
T02D1412:436b-26: gnyis pa ni rnam par smin pa'i dus so //
T02D1412:436b-27: gsum pa ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i dus so //
T02D1412:436b-28: bzhi pa rnam par nyed pa'i dus so //
T02D1412:436b-29: phyag rgya dang mnyam par sbyar ba'i tshe dga' bral du gyur na sngags rjes su dran par bya'o //
T02D1412:436b-30: de ltar gzugs kyi rtags bshad nas /
T02D1412:436b-31: las kyi gsang ba gsungs pa /
T02D1412:436b-32: ha ha he he rnam pa brgyad //
T02D1412:436b-34: ha ha dang ho ho h'um h'um he he brgyad do //
T02D1412:436b-35: de dus nam gyi tshe nye bar brtag ce na /
T02D1412:436b-36: sna tshogs dgod dang dbang mchog dga' //
T02D1412:436b-39: dgod pa rnam par smin pa dang /
T02D1412:436b-40: dbang mchog gi mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang /
T02D1412:436b-41: dga' ba ni rnam par spyod pa'o //
T02D1412:436b-42: dus de'i tshe ha brgyad kyis nye bar bstan par bya'o //
T02D1412:436b-43: lta ba'i bsnyems pas mig gi'o //
T02D1412:436b-44: phyag rgya ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1412:436b-45: grub par byed pa rab tu bsngags //
T02D1412:437a-0: @437a * // de nyid kyi dga' bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1412:437a-1: bsam gtan gyi bde ba mi nyams par gyur ba'i sngags dang /
T02D1412:437a-2: phyag rgya legs par sbyar zhes bya ba ni rang
T02D1412:437a-3: bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba'i yid skyob par byed
T02D1412:437a-4: pa'i sngags ni rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1412:437a-5: gnas skabs gang gi tshe zhe na ;
T02D1412:437a-6: gtso bo rnams dang dpa' bo yi //
T02D1412:437a-7: yum dang lhan cig 'byung bde ba //
T02D1412:437a-9: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang dpa' mo nyi
T02D1412:437a-10: shu rtsa bzhi tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed pa'i gnas
T02D1412:437a-11: su dga' ba rnam pa gsum gyis lhan cig 'byung
T02D1412:437a-12: ba'i bde ba'o // rdo rje goms par mi bya
T02D1412:437a-13: ba ni dga' bral du ma gyur bas g-yon pa'i
T02D1412:437a-14: rnal 'byor pas yongs su brtags pa'i bde ba'i ting
T02D1412:437a-15: nge 'dzin bsgoms nas 'khrul 'khor gyi las bcu gnyis
T02D1412:437a-16: ba'i bde ba'o // bya'o // le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:437a-18: // / de ltar ha brgyad kyi 'khrul 'khor bshad nas ;
T02D1412:437a-19: dpa' bo nye ba'i snying po'i 'khrul 'khor gyi las bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:437a-20: de nas lta ba bshad bya ba //
T02D1412:437a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1412:437a-22: bskyed rdzogs kyi mtshan nyid ma thob pa'i rnam pa
T02D1412:437a-23: la yi ge bdun pa'i 'khrul 'khor la sbyor ba'i
T02D1412:437a-24: tshe dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams kyi spyan gyis
T02D1412:437a-25: gzigs nas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:437a-26: dpa' bo dang ni gnyis med min //
T02D1412:437a-27: zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor ba'o //
T02D1412:437a-28: gnas kyi dbye ba cho ga zhes bya ba ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom zhes pa'o //
T02D1412:437a-29: sgom pa rtag tu mngon dga' ba //
T02D1412:437a-30: zhes bya ba ni go cha bskon pa'o //
T02D1412:437a-31: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang dbang bskur ba dang ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa la dga' ba'o //
T02D1412:437a-32: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:437a-33: lam gyi bzhi mdo'am khyim mam ri bo'am gnas gang
T02D1412:437a-34: yang rung bar rnal 'byor pa gnas pa'i tshe mkha'
T02D1412:437a-35: 'gro ma sum cu rtsa bdun gyis ring por gnas
T02D1412:437a-36: kyang gzigs shing byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:437a-37: thabs ji lta bu dang ldan par gzigs zhe na /
T02D1412:437a-38: phyag rgya gcer bus mchod pa yin //
T02D1412:437a-39: phyag rgya dang gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor pa ste /
T02D1412:437b-0: mchod pa'i las de nyid kyis @437b grol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:437b-1: cha byad ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1412:437b-2: gos gzhan dag gis bkab nas su //
T02D1412:437b-4: nam mkha'i gos kyis bkab nas las kyi phyag rgya
T02D1412:437b-5: de dang yang dag par reg cing lus dang yid
T02D1412:437b-6: bde ba'i 'dod pa la spyad par bya'o //
T02D1412:437b-7: de bzhin skra ni grol 'gyur bas //
T02D1412:437b-8: zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo dang dpa' mo skra grol ba'i go cha drug gis rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D1412:437b-9: las rnams thams cad brtsam par bya //
T02D1412:437b-10: zhes bya ba ni yi ge bdun pa'i 'khrul 'khor dang /
T02D1412:437b-11: las bcu gnyis brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1412:437b-12: de ltar rgyas par bshad nas shin tu rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:437b-13: rtsa ba'i sngags dang de bzhin gzhan //
T02D1412:437b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:437b-15: sngon du las bcu gnyis kyi bsnyen pa bshad par
T02D1412:437b-16: bzhed nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor dang de
T02D1412:437b-18: yum gyi nye ba'i snying po bzhi dang go cha'i
T02D1412:437b-19: sngags gnyis dang gnod mdzes kyi sngags gnyis ni gzhan
T02D1412:437b-20: zhes bya'o // 'khrul 'khor de rnams 'ching bas na
T02D1412:437b-21: thog mar phyogs bcing pa dang srung ba'i 'khor lo
T02D1412:437b-22: byas la lha'i yul sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams
T02D1412:437b-23: dang gza' dang skar ma la sogs pa lha'i tshogs
T02D1412:437b-24: rnams kyis mthong bar mi 'gyur gyi 'khrul 'khor gyi
T02D1412:437b-26: bsnyen pa'i lha la mthong ba dang /
T02D1412:437b-28: thos pa'i mtshan ma thob nas snyim pa me tog gis bkang ste /
T02D1412:437b-29: sa la lhung bar ma mthong ba de'i tshe gnas
T02D1412:437b-30: dang nye ba'i gnas na gnas pa'i thugs kyi 'khor
T02D1412:437b-31: lo'i mkha' 'gro ma stong phrag gi gnas mkha' spyod
T02D1412:437b-33: lha'i sku gsung gi thad kar gnas shing sa la
T02D1412:437b-34: mi ltung na gsung gi dbang phyug ma 'grub par
T02D1412:437b-35: 'gyur ro // sa la mi snad na 'og gi
T02D1412:437b-36: dngos grub lha dang lha ma yin gyi gtam shes
T02D1412:437b-37: shing sa 'og gi klu la sogs pa dang skar
T02D1412:437b-38: ma rgyu ba shes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:437b-39: mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa de yul dang
T02D1412:437b-40: dgon pa dang bzhi mdo dang shing gcig dang dpa'
T02D1412:437b-41: bo'i khyim la sogs pa rnams su yi ge bdun
T02D1412:437b-42: pa'i 'khrul 'khor lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil du bris
T02D1412:437b-43: na lha dang mi sus kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur
T02D1412:438a-0: ro // de bas na yul phyogs @438a * //
T02D1412:438a-1: de dag tu sgrub pa po rtag tu gnas kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:438a-2: shing drung kha dog dmar bsams na //
T02D1412:438a-3: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i lus kha dog
T02D1412:438a-4: dmar por bsams nas snying gar yi ge bdun pa'i
T02D1412:438a-5: 'khrul 'khor bkod na mngon par shes par 'gyur ro
T02D1412:438a-6: // mi phyed par 'gyur myur bar zhes bya ba
T02D1412:438a-7: ni bdud dang bar chad rnams kyis byed par mi
T02D1412:438a-8: 'gyur zhing myur du grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:438a-9: sa 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan du min //
T02D1412:438a-10: zhes bya ba rlung ni rgyun las bzlog kyang srid /
T02D1412:438a-11: nyi ma dang zla ba ni sa la ltung yang
T02D1412:438a-12: srid kyis sa 'dzin rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi bka'
T02D1412:438a-13: ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T02D1412:438a-14: snying gar yi ge bdun pa'i 'khrul 'khor bkod nas
T02D1412:438a-15: bden pa bdar nas sa la ku sha'i stan la
T02D1412:438a-16: nyal te sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na lhas bstan
T02D1412:438a-17: pa'i rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:438a-18: de yang dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /
T02D1412:438a-19: gzhan gyi gnod pas 'ching ba dang /
T02D1412:438a-21: rnyed pa dang bkur sti la sogs pa'i bya ba
T02D1412:438a-22: gang yang rung ba rnam pa sna tshogs rmi lam
T02D1412:438a-24: de bzhin du sngags bzlas nas ral gri la yi
T02D1412:438a-25: ge bdun pa'i 'khrul 'khor bkod pa'am chu la bkod
T02D1412:438a-26: pa'am / mthe bong la bkod pa'am /
T02D1412:438a-27: mar me dang me long la bkod nas pra phab
T02D1412:438a-28: na pra se na gsal bar 'bebs par 'gyur ro
T02D1412:438a-29: // byis pa gzhon nu ma'i mig la yi ge
T02D1412:438a-30: bdun pa'i 'khrul 'khor bkod nas sngags lan bdun bzlas
T02D1412:438a-31: na dge ba dang mi dge ba sten par 'gyur
T02D1412:438a-32: // ro // de ltar las gnyis pa bshad nas las gsum pa ni /
T02D1412:438a-33: de nas dpa' bo yi ge bdun //
T02D1412:438a-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1412:438a-35: lag pa'i mthil du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
T02D1412:438a-36: su yi ge bdun pa'i 'khrul 'khor bkod nas yi
T02D1412:438a-37: ge shel gyi phreng ba lta bu 'od zer 'phro
T02D1412:438a-38: bar bsams nas snying gar yi ge kam las nad
T02D1412:438a-39: kyi gzugs rid pa gnag pa /
T02D1412:438a-41: aom dzva la do sh'a ya phat ces bya bas
T02D1412:438a-42: nad mthe bong tsam du zhu nas nad las grol
T02D1412:438b-0: las @438b bzhi pa ni lag pa'i mthil du zla
T02D1412:438b-1: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yi ge la 'khrul
T02D1412:438b-2: 'khor shel gyi rnam pa lta bu bkod na rims
T02D1412:438b-3: dang gdon dang dug gis zin pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1412:438b-4: sdug bsngal phyogs bcur byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:438b-5: las lnga pa ni mtshan ma gsang ba'i gnas su
T02D1412:438b-6: rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gi thab khung byas la me
T02D1412:438b-7: lha'i thugs kar yi ge bdun pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi
T02D1412:438b-8: lha bkod la / ba lang gi sha mngar gsum
T02D1412:438b-9: dang bsres pas brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na
T02D1412:438b-10: gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:438b-11: las drug pa ni rgyas pa'i thab khung de nyid la dpa' bo lnga dang /
T02D1412:438b-12: bdud rtsi lnga'i sreg blugs stong byas na yul 'khor rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:438b-13: las bdun pa ni zhi ba dang dbang dang mngon
T02D1412:438b-14: spyod gang yang rung ba'i thab khung du gsang sngags
T02D1412:438b-15: yi ge bdun pa'i 'khrul 'khor bkod de lha dang
T02D1412:438b-16: mi'i skye ba gang dang gang bsams pa de dang
T02D1412:438b-18: las brgyad pa ni dkar po yis ni zhi bar 'gyur //
T02D1412:438b-19: nag po yis ni nges par gsod //
T02D1412:438b-21: zhi ba la dkar po zlum po dang /
T02D1412:438b-22: mngon spyod la nag po gru gsum dang /
T02D1412:438b-23: dbang la dmar po gzhu lta bu dang /
T02D1412:438b-24: rengs pa la kha dog ser po mche ba'i dbyibs lta bu dang /
T02D1412:438b-25: dpung gnon pa la dbang chen sa'i dkyil 'khor ser skya dang /
T02D1412:438b-26: 'chi ba slong ba la kha dog dkar po 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa lta bu dang /
T02D1412:438b-27: sprul gyis zin pa la lag mthil du zla ba'i
T02D1412:438b-28: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge'i phreng ba bkod
T02D1412:438b-30: las dgu ba'i dug gis brgyal bar gyur pa la
T02D1412:438b-31: lag pa la yi ge bdun pa'i 'khrul 'khor bkod
T02D1412:438b-32: de srin lag gi tshigs gsum la 'khrul 'khor bkod
T02D1412:438b-33: nas khas gzhibs na dgu las thar par 'gyur ro
T02D1412:438b-34: // rims dang gdon la sogs pa yang dag la mthong bas 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:438b-35: las bcu pa ni lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil du
T02D1412:438b-36: 'khrul 'khor bkod la g-yul 'gyed pa'i tshe khu tshur
T02D1412:438b-37: bcangs na mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:438b-38: las bcu gcig pa dbang du gyur pa ni 'bras
T02D1412:438b-39: bu dang me tog dang so rtsi dang zas la
T02D1412:438b-40: sogs pa nang gi sbyin sreg blugs pa'i rdzas la
T02D1412:439a-1: na dbang du gyur pa'am yid kyi 'khrul 'khor bcings
T02D1412:439a-2: nas dbus su ming dang spel ba bris na dbang
T02D1412:439a-3: du 'gyur ro // de bzhin du ngag gis brjod
T02D1412:439a-4: cing bzlas pas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gis gzhi shing
T02D1412:439a-5: dang bcas shing rgya mtsho'i ske rags kyis mtha' bskor
T02D1412:439a-6: ba dbang du 'gyur zhing khams gsum pa'i rgyu ba
T02D1412:439a-7: dang mi rgyu ba thams cad tshar bcad pa dang
T02D1412:439a-9: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:439a-11: // / de ltar yi ge bdun pa'i 'khrul 'khor bshad nas /
T02D1412:439a-12: da ni go cha'i lha mo drug gi 'khrul 'khor bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:439a-13: de nas pho nya mo rnams /
T02D1412:439a-14: yi ge bdun yang ldan 'grub pa //
T02D1412:439a-16: yi ge bdun pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi rtsibs la go
T02D1412:439a-17: cha'i lha mo drug gi sngags bkod na las bcu
T02D1412:439a-18: gnyis gang 'dod pa la brtson 'grus bskyed na myur
T02D1412:439a-20: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:439a-21: de bzhin du ni yi ge bdun //
T02D1412:439a-23: lag pa'i dbus su yi ge bdun pa'i 'khrul 'khor
T02D1412:439a-24: bkod la 'khor lo'i rtsibs drug la rnal 'byor ma
T02D1412:439a-25: drug gi sngags dang spel na dbang du bya bar
T02D1412:439a-26: 'dod pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la sngags zlos shing gzugs
T02D1412:439a-27: brnyan snying gar mnan nas lag pa g-yon pa de

T02D1412:439b-27: brgyad pa la cho ga bya zhing nyin zhag dgu
T02D1412:439b-28: pa la sta gon byas la nyin zhag bcu pa

T02D1412:439b-30: brgya rtsa brgyad bsnun nas nyin zhag bcu gcig pa

T02D1412:445b-24: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:445b-25: go m'am sa dang myos byed bsres //
T02D1412:445b-27: go m'am sa ni ba lang gi sha ste sha lnga la mtshon par byed pa'o //
T02D1412:445b-28: myos byed ces bya ba ni chang gi bye brag mtshon pa ste sreg rdzas so //
T02D1412:445b-29: lag pa g-yon pa ni dpa' bo lnga dgod pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1412:445b-30: de nas dbang gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu
T02D1412:445b-31: la 'dod pa'i me lha bskyed nas de la bdud
T02D1412:445b-32: rtsi lnga dang dpa' bo lnga dang khyad par gyi
T02D1412:445b-33: rdzas dang longs spyod kyi rdzas dang yo byad kyi
T02D1412:445b-34: rdzas dang 'tsho ba'i rdzas dang bcas pas sbyin sreg
T02D1412:445b-35: byas la de'i don 'od du zhu ba'i thugs kar
T02D1412:445b-36: dpa' bo gcig pu dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo
T02D1412:445b-37: bkod la zhag bdun la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D1412:445b-38: byas na brgya byin la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur
T02D1412:445b-39: ro // las gnyis pa ni dkyil 'khor snga ma
T02D1412:445b-40: de nyid las kha chu dang so shing dang rang
T02D1412:445b-41: gi lus mnyes pa'i dri ma dang dbang du byas
T02D1412:445b-42: pa'i ming dang myos byed dang rtug pa'i sbyin sreg
T02D1412:445b-43: byas na sa 'og dang sa bla dang sa stengs
T02D1412:446a-1: ni rang gi khrag dang zhag gi sbyin sreg phyir
T02D1412:446a-2: skyugs pa'i thal ba dang mi'i skra dang ldan pas
T02D1412:446a-3: che ge mo a'a karsha ya zhes zlos shing sbyin
T02D1412:446a-4: sreg byas na rigs gang yang rung ba 'gugs par
T02D1412:446a-5: 'gyur ro // las bzhi pa ni bskrad pa'i dkyil
T02D1412:446a-6: 'khor bris la mngon spyod kyi me bskyed nas nang
T02D1412:446a-7: gi sbyin sreg phyir skyugs pa dang rang gi skra
T02D1412:446a-8: dang nim pa'i shing dang sbyar bas sbyin sreg byas
T02D1412:446a-10: las lnga pa ni rang nyid dpal he ru ka'i
T02D1412:446a-11: skur mnyam par bzhag na rgya'i lang tang la me
T02D1412:446a-12: spar la dug dang khrag dang ske tshe dang yungs
T02D1412:446a-13: kar dang khva'i gshog pa yungs mar la bsgres pas
T02D1412:446a-14: sbyin sreg byas na 'chi ba'am skrod par 'gyur ro
T02D1412:446a-15: // las drug pa ni rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor bris
T02D1412:446a-16: la 'dzin byed kyi mi'i snying gar bde mchog gi
T02D1412:446a-17: 'khor lo bkod nas dpa' bo lnga dang bdud rtsi
T02D1412:446a-18: dang me tog ser po dang tsandan dmar po'i dri
T02D1412:446a-19: dang yung bas byug pa dang sbyin sreg byas na
T02D1412:446a-20: longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur pa'am /
T02D1412:446a-21: rang gi lus la 'khor lo bzhi'i gnas su dkyil
T02D1412:446a-22: 'khor gyi 'khor lo bzhi bkod nas kha dog ser
T02D1412:446a-23: po bsams te / gnyid log pa'am ma log pa'am bza' ba'am 'gro ba'am /
T02D1412:446a-24: 'chag pa la sogs pa'i dus su sngags pas rtag
T02D1412:446a-25: tu yab yum gyi snying po'i mtha' ru pushtim ku
T02D1412:446a-26: ru sv'a h'a zhes dus nges pa med par zlos
T02D1412:446a-27: shing dbang gi sbyin sreg gis sreg blugs brgya byas
T02D1412:446a-28: na zla ba gsum gyi rjes la dbul ba 'jig
T02D1412:446a-29: par 'gyur ro // las bdun pa ni dbang gi
T02D1412:446a-30: dkyil 'khor la sha chen po la sogs pa'i bdud
T02D1412:446a-31: rtsi lnga dang myos byed dang ldan pas thun gsum
T02D1412:446a-32: du sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas steng gi
T02D1412:446a-33: 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:446a-34: las brgyad pa ni snga ma bzhin du tshogs kyi
T02D1412:446a-35: 'khor lo'i lha bsgoms nas zla ba drug gi bar
T02D1412:446a-36: du nyin mo'i thun gnyis la nang gi sbyin sreg
T02D1412:446a-37: byas na rang gi lus de nyid kyis nam mkha'
T02D1412:446a-39: las dgu pa ni wa'i sha dang myos byed du
T02D1412:446a-40: bsres pas mngon spyod kyi dkyil 'khor la sbyin sreg
T02D1412:446a-41: dang gtor ma byas na yul 'khor dang bcas pa
T02D1412:446b-0: las @446b bcu pa ni rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor bil
T02D1412:446b-1: ba dang pa la sha dang au dumw'a ra'i bud
T02D1412:446b-2: shing la me sbar la de nyid kyi yam shing
T02D1412:446b-3: gis sbyin sreg 'bum byas na nor gyi bdag po
T02D1412:446b-4: rnam thos sras dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:446b-5: las bcu gcig pa ni go m'am dang myos byed
T02D1412:446b-6: dang bcas pa la rgyal srid 'dod pas sbyin sreg
T02D1412:446b-7: byas na rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:446b-8: las bcu gnyis pa ni wa'i sha dang bdud rtsi
T02D1412:446b-9: lnga dang dpa' bo lngas sbyin sreg byas na ci
T02D1412:446b-10: bde bar rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:446b-11: wa'i sha dang bcas pa'i bdud rtsi lngas nang gi
T02D1412:446b-12: sbyin sreg byas na myur du nor gyi bdag po
T02D1412:446b-13: dzambha la dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:446b-14: gang gis sbyin sreg de la brtul zhugs dang gtsang
T02D1412:446b-15: sbra mad na yang rgyas pa'i dngos grub thob par
T02D1412:446b-16: 'gyur ro // las bzhi pa ni lhag par tshe
T02D1412:446b-17: 'phel bar 'dod pa na bkru sman dang zhes bya
T02D1412:446b-18: ba sran ma sngon po dang sran ma sha zhes
T02D1412:446b-19: bya ba kha dog ljang ba dang tsa na ka
T02D1412:446b-20: zhes bya ba 'bru phra mo dang sbrang rtsi'i tshigs
T02D1412:446b-21: ma zhes bya ba spra tshil dang ske tshe dang
T02D1412:446b-22: t'a la'i 'dab ma blangs nas dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan
T02D1412:446b-23: byas la nya phyis kyi nang du bcug nas steng
T02D1412:446b-24: g-yogs la mchod rten nag po dong kha thur du
T02D1412:446b-25: bstan pa'i dbus su btsugs la mchod rten nag pos
T02D1412:446b-27: rnal 'byor pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:446b-28: de ltar sbyin sreg bshad nas rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i 'khor lo bcu dang /
T02D1412:446b-29: gsang sngags kyi 'khor lo bcu'i dkyil 'khor gang la bya snyam na /
T02D1412:446b-30: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1412:446b-32: dkyil 'khor nyi shu'i gnas ni snod bcud thams cad
T02D1412:446b-33: dpal he ru ka'i rang bzhin yin pas phyi dang
T02D1412:446b-34: nang gang yang rung bar sbyin sreg dang 'khrul 'khor
T02D1412:446b-35: byas kyang dngos grub thams cad sgrub par gdon mi
T02D1412:446b-38: rnal 'byor ma yi sa dang gnas //
T02D1412:446b-39: he ru ka'i sku'i yan lag / ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1412:446b-40: rnal 'byor ma'i sa ni dag pa'i sa bcu'o //
T02D1412:446b-41: gnas ni ma dag pa'i sa bcu'o //
T02D1412:446b-42: dag pa dang ma dag pa gnyis ka yang dpal he ru ka'i sku'i yan lag ste /
T02D1412:446b-43: sku kun brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can yin no //
T02D1412:447a-1: ma'i lus la ma dag pa'i gnas bcu dag pa'i
T02D1412:447a-2: sa bcu'i bdag nyid la dpal he ru ka'i gzhung
T02D1412:447a-3: lugs la spyod pa'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor sa bcu
T02D1412:447a-4: dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la rnal
T02D1412:447a-5: 'byor ma rnams kyi brda'i skad kyi gnas dang nye
T02D1412:447a-6: ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i ming gis btags pa yin
T02D1412:447a-7: dang / no // gang gi brda yin zhe na /
T02D1412:447a-8: lha dang dri za rnams kyi brdas gnas dang nye ba'i gnas zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1412:447a-9: gnod sbyin dang srin po'i brdas zhing dang tshando ha zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1412:447a-10: klu dang lha ma yin gyi brdas 'du sa dang
T02D1412:447a-11: dur khrod ces bya ba rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi
T02D1412:447a-13: mtho ris thugs dang sa stengs gsung dang sa 'og
T02D1412:447a-14: sku'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni sems 'od gsal ba'i snang
T02D1412:447a-16: dpa' bo yan lag brtan g-yo'i bdag / ces bya
T02D1412:447a-17: ba ji ltar na 'od gsal snod bcud du snang
T02D1412:447a-18: zhe na / thog med dus su gang bstan pa //
T02D1412:447a-19: phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas //
T02D1412:447a-21: thog ma med pa'i dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1412:447a-22: rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung sems 'od
T02D1412:447a-23: gsal ba'i rang bzhin du gnas pa gang yin pa
T02D1412:447a-24: de ni phyi snod kyi 'jig rten dang nang bcud
T02D1412:447a-25: kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid du gnas pa
T02D1412:447a-27: chu khams gser dang nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D1412:447a-28: dag pa bzhin du dag par 'dod //
T02D1412:447a-30: klung nyid dangs par gyur pa las //
T02D1412:447a-31: nya dag myur du 'phar ba ltar //
T02D1412:447a-32: de bzhin stong gsal ye shes las //
T02D1412:447a-35: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D1412:447a-36: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D1412:447a-38: dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che //
T02D1412:447a-39: 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug gtso //
T02D1412:447a-41: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin sems rig
T02D1412:447a-42: pa 'od gsal chos kyi sku la dgongs pa yin
T02D1412:447a-43: no // kun du phyag dang zhabs ldan zhing //
T02D1412:447a-44: kun du bcom ldan 'jig rten na //
T02D1412:447a-45: thams cad g-yogs nas rnam par bzhugs //
T02D1412:447a-46: zhes bya ba ni de nyid bsdus pa las gsungs
T02D1412:447a-47: pa'i rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin dag
T02D1412:447a-48: pa dang ma dag pa'i gnas skabs gnyis ka'i ngo
T02D1412:447b-0: bo sems dang @447b rig pa 'od gsal ba'i ngo
T02D1412:447b-1: bo chos kyi dbyings su gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1412:447b-2: de ltar chos kyi sku'i ngo bos thams cad la
T02D1412:447b-3: khyab pa bde bas na rgyu ba dang mi rgyu
T02D1412:447b-4: ba'i sbyin sreg gi 'khor lo dang gsang sngags kyi
T02D1412:447b-5: 'khor los dngos grub bsgrub par bya ba yin no
T02D1412:447b-6: // de yang ji lta bu la gsungs she na bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1412:447b-8: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i mtshan ma gsum mam /
T02D1412:447b-9: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i mtshan ma lnga thob pa'i sgrub
T02D1412:447b-10: pa pos bsnyen pa byas pa la phan gdags pa'i
T02D1412:447b-11: phyir gsang ba'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i le'u nyi shu
T02D1412:447b-12: gnas dang bcas pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1412:447b-13: le'u lnga bcu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1412:447b-15: // / de ltar dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs bshad nas /
T02D1412:447b-16: bskyed rim bsgom pa'i man ngag gi le'u gsungs pa ni //
T02D1412:447b-17: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02D1412:447b-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1412:447b-19: man ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ba //
T02D1412:447b-20: zhes bya ba la man ngag ni bskyed pa'i rim
T02D1412:447b-21: pa sgom pa'i de nyid bcu bzhi ni shin tu
T02D1412:447b-22: rnyed par dka' bas ni gang zag gi rnam par
T02D1412:447b-23: rtog pas sbyar ba ma yin pa bcom ldan 'das
T02D1412:447b-24: kyis gsungs pa'i nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde bsgom
T02D1412:447b-25: pa'i rim pa bsgrigs pa rnyed par dka' ba'o //
T02D1412:447b-26: dpa' bo'i brda yi skad du ni //
T02D1412:447b-27: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D1412:447b-28: dpa' thams cad kyi brdar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das
T02D1412:447b-29: kyis rgyud 'di ru mi'i skad du sbas pa gsungs
T02D1412:447b-30: pa yin no // de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1412:447b-31: gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs //
T02D1412:447b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1412:447b-33: gos ni stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs glang po che'i pags pa dang /
T02D1412:447b-34: stag gi pags par bsam mo //
T02D1412:447b-35: phyag rgya lnga ni thal ba'i rdul ma gtogs pa'o //
T02D1412:447b-36: la sogs zhes bya ba ni go cha drug bgos
T02D1412:447b-37: shing rdo rje dang dril bu bzung ba'i de nyid
T02D1412:447b-38: dang por bstan nas de nyid gnyis pa ni shes
T02D1412:447b-39: rab yan lag ste khyim pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1412:447b-40: la las kyi phyag rgya'am grol ba'i lam pa'i chos
T02D1412:447b-41: kyi phyag rgya'am dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1412:447b-42: de nyid gsum pa ni thog mar rdo rje'i brda bya ba dang /
T02D1412:447b-43: mthar phur bus gdab pa ste /
T02D1412:447b-44: bgegs bskrad nas dra ba dang mda'i bla re dang
T02D1412:447b-45: rdo rje'i bla re dang me 'od kyi dra ba
T02D1412:448a-0: byas nas phur bus gdab pa @448a * //
T02D1412:448a-2: de nyid bzhi pa ni a'a li k'a li zhes brjod pa ste /
T02D1412:448a-3: snying gar zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la /
T02D1412:448a-4: de'i dbus kyi yi ge h'um las rkang pa brgyad
T02D1412:448a-5: pa'i sngags brjod nas mchod pa dang dpa' bo dang
T02D1412:448a-6: dpa' mo'i sngags kyis brjod pa ni zhes brjod pa
T02D1412:448a-7: ste / aa ste zhes bya ba lnga pa'i sgra
T02D1412:448a-8: yin pas a'a li k'a li'i rjes la brjod ces
T02D1412:448a-11: rgyu sogs stong pa sngon 'gro yin //
T02D1412:448a-12: zhes bya ba ni dpral bar he dang /
T02D1412:448a-15: he ni rgyu tshogs spangs pa ste //
T02D1412:448a-16: ru ni bkod pa dang bral ba //
T02D1412:448a-17: ka ni gang du mi gnas pa ;
T02D1412:448a-18: / zhes bya ba ni he ru ka'i don la
T02D1412:448a-19: mos pa'i rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum bsgoms la
T02D1412:448a-20: yi ge gsum sngon du 'gro ba yin no //
T02D1412:448a-21: de'i rjes la 'byung ba bzhi ri rab dang bcas
T02D1412:448a-22: pa bsgoms nas gzhal yas khang gi dbus su padma'i
T02D1412:448a-23: steng du nyi zla kha sbyor gyi dbus su yi
T02D1412:448a-24: ge h'um gnas pa la rang gi rnam par shes
T02D1412:448a-26: 'jug pa sgra la sogs pa ni //
T02D1412:448a-28: sgra ni yi ge h'um dang bam mo //
T02D1412:448a-29: sogs pa ni rdo rje dang gri gug dang 'od
T02D1412:448a-30: zer spro bsdu rgyu'i he ru ka yab yum du
T02D1412:448a-32: zla ba me long lta bu ste /
T02D1412:448a-33: nyi ma mnyam nyid ye shes yin //
T02D1412:448a-34: yig 'bru phyag mtshan so sor rtog /'od zer spro bsdu bya nan tan //
T02D1412:448a-35: sku rdzogs chos dbyings ye shes so //
T02D1412:448a-37: de nyid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan nyid //
T02D1412:448a-38: ces bya ba ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bsdus nas
T02D1412:448a-39: rgyu'i he ru ka yab yum gyi zhal du zhugs
T02D1412:448a-40: nas mngal skyes kyi 'khor lo bskyed nas rgyu'i he
T02D1412:448a-41: ru ka yab yum zhu nas thig ler bsdus pa
T02D1412:448a-42: la 'khor lo lnga'i lha mo'i glus bskul ba'i sbyor
T02D1412:448a-43: ba dang ldan pa nyid kyi thig ler zhu ba
T02D1412:448a-44: klu dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i he'i tshig gi
T02D1412:448a-45: de nyid brgyad pa bdud rtsi tshim byed ces bya
T02D1412:448a-46: ba gsungs te / de lha mo rnams rgyu'i he
T02D1412:448a-47: ru ka zhu ba'i thabs dang bral ba la 'chi
T02D1412:448a-49: 'bras bu'i he ru ka lha mo rnams yid tshim par byed pas na bdud rtsi tshim byed do //
T02D1412:448a-50: de nyid dgu pa mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa'o //
T02D1412:448a-51: de nyid bcu pa lag pa'i mchod pa zhes bya
T02D1412:448a-52: ba ni dpa' bo dang dpa' mo drug gi go
T02D1412:448a-53: cha bskon pa'o // de nyid bcu gcig pa dbang
T02D1412:448a-54: bskur ba ni chu dang gsang ba dang shes rab
T02D1412:448b-0: ye @448b shes kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1412:448b-1: de nyid bcu gnyis pa go cha chen pos yang
T02D1412:448b-2: dag gsungs zhes bya ba ni lus kyi 'khor lo
T02D1412:448b-3: dang / sems kyi 'khor lo rnam dag bsgom pa'o //
T02D1412:448b-4: de nyid bcu gsum pa sngags rnams zhes bya ba ni gtso bo de'i 'khor gyi sngags bzlas pa'o //
T02D1412:448b-5: de nyid bcu bzhi pa mchod pa yin zhes bya
T02D1412:448b-6: ba ni bdud rtsi lngas mchod pa dang bstod pa
T02D1412:448b-8: nye bar bsdu ba ni ma gsungs kyang smon lam
T02D1412:448b-9: btab nas dkyil 'khor nye bar sgrub pa rgyud bla
T02D1412:448b-10: ma las go bar 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa yin
T02D1412:448b-11: no // de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi bshad nas
T02D1412:448b-12: rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo la smon lam gdab
T02D1412:448b-13: no // pa ni / mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa //
T02D1412:448b-15: sa la 'dod pa'i dbang phyug shog / ces bya
T02D1412:448b-16: ba ste dngos grub dang po bde bar gshegs pa'i
T02D1412:448b-18: dngos grub gnyis pa chos dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1412:448b-19: dngos grub gsum pa sa la 'dod pa'i dbang phyug lha'i dbang po brgya byin lta bur 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:448b-20: de ltar bskyed rim gyi thabs bshad nas bskyed rdzogs gnyis ka'i phan yon gsungs pa ni /
T02D1412:448b-21: dper na mar gyis gang ba'i snod //
T02D1412:448b-22: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1412:448b-23: mar lta bu ni bskyed rdzogs gnyis so //
T02D1412:448b-24: gang ba'i snod ni skal ba dang mnyam pa'i gang zag go //
T02D1412:448b-25: me'i dbus su gzhag pa ni byin rlabs dang mngon sum gyi lam yang dang yang du bsgom pa'o //
T02D1412:448b-26: mar sar nyid du zhu ba ni //
T02D1412:448b-27: bskyed rdzogs kyi mtshan ma thob pa lha'i sku mthong ba'o //
T02D1412:448b-28: snod kyi rim pa 'jig pa ni /
T02D1412:448b-29: tha mal ba'i lus ngag yid gsum nub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:448b-30: phan yon gnyis pa ni dpal he ru ka'i mtshan
T02D1412:448b-31: bzung nas bzlas pa'am bsgom pa'am bsam pa'am thos pa'i
T02D1412:448b-32: shes rab kyi glegs bam bris pas mtho ris kyi
T02D1412:448b-33: lha'i rgyal po'am mi'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba'o
T02D1412:448b-34: // phan yon gsum pa ni 'chi ba'i tshe na
T02D1412:448b-35: phat phat kyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas spyan drangs
T02D1412:448b-36: la skye gnas kyi phyag rgyas thugs kar bcug na
T02D1412:448b-37: dpal he ru ka la sogs pa lha mo'i 'khor
T02D1412:448b-38: lo dang bcas pas glu dang rol mo'i sgra bsgrags
T02D1412:448b-39: nas mkha' la spyod pa 'og min gyi gnas su
T02D1412:448b-41: las bzhi pa nyes dmigs ni de 'dra'i dpa' bo chen por bsgoms pa'i rnal byor ba dang /
T02D1412:449a-0: des gsungs pa'i rgyud chen po la ma dad @449a * //
T02D1412:449a-1: par gyur na mngon par mtho bas dbul zhing phongs pa'i ngan song gsum dang /
T02D1412:449a-2: nges par legs pas dbul ba'i khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1412:449a-3: de ltar phan yon dang nyes dmigs bshad nas don
T02D1412:449a-4: gsum pa'i sku bsgom pa rgyas par bshad pa ni
T02D1412:449a-5: mgul rgyan la sogs pa'i phyag rgya drug dang /
T02D1412:449a-6: gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis gsungs pa'i ska rags sil sil sgra sgrogs pa'o //
T02D1412:449a-7: de nas gang du sgom snyam na /
T02D1412:449a-8: ri dang sna tshogs padma lte bar ro //
T02D1412:449a-9: rgyu gang gis bskyed snyam na /
T02D1412:449a-10: a'a li k'a li skyes zhes bya ba ni mngon par byang chub pa lngas bsdus pa'o //
T02D1412:449a-12: au ma'i bdag po rnam par gnon //
T02D1412:449a-14: de shes rab dang ldan pa yin snyam na /
T02D1412:449a-15: rdo rje dril bus sku la 'khyud //
T02D1412:449a-17: phyag du dang ldan snyam na /
T02D1412:449a-18: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i phyed ldan pa //
T02D1412:449a-20: phyag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1412:449a-21: 'khor ji lta bus bskor zhe na /
T02D1412:449a-22: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs bskor //
T02D1412:449a-24: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang dpa' mo sum cu so drug gis bskor ba'o //
T02D1412:449a-25: ji lta bu'i blos gar bya snyam na /
T02D1412:449a-26: dpal ldan he ru ka rgyal che //
T02D1412:449a-27: go 'phang mchog gis bsgom bar bya //
T02D1412:449a-29: sprul pa'i sku ji lta bu zhig yin snyam na /
T02D1412:449a-31: 'khor lo dbus su sbyor ldan pa //
T02D1412:449a-32: thams cad dgyes shing gnyis med 'gyur //
T02D1412:449a-33: 'byin dang sdud par mdzad pa yin //
T02D1412:449a-35: sprul pa'i sku ji lta bu zhig yin snyam na /
T02D1412:449a-36: dbus kyi gtso bo 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad
T02D1412:449a-37: kyang yab yum gnyis su med cing sems can gyi
T02D1412:449a-38: don du spro zhing mdzad pa rdzogs nas sdud pa
T02D1412:449a-39: yin no // de'i don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D1412:449a-40: ma 'ongs pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod
T02D1412:449a-41: pa rnams kyis dpa' bo dang dpa' mo gnyis su
T02D1412:449a-42: med pa'i 'khor lo bsgoms nas thun bzhir spro bsdu
T02D1412:449a-43: bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T02D1412:449a-44: // don bzhi pa bskyed pa'i rim pa kha sbyor
T02D1412:449a-45: bsgom zhing rdzogs pa'i rim pa mngon sum du bsgoms
T02D1412:449a-46: nas spyod pa goms mi dgos pa'i mantra tantra yantra
T02D1412:449a-47: gsum gyi rgyu tshogs pas dngos grub rnams 'byung zhing
T02D1412:449a-48: gsang sngags kyi sgo la mos pa bskal ba dang
T02D1412:449b-0: ldan @449b pa'i sems can rnams la'o //
T02D1412:449b-1: spyod pa sna tshogs ston mdzad pa ni mantra tantra yantra'o //
T02D1412:449b-2: sna tshogs tshul gyis gdul bya ni //
T02D1412:449b-3: dgod dang blta dang lag bcangs dang /
T02D1412:449b-5: thabs ni sna tshogs ston pa yin //
T02D1412:449b-6: zhes bya ba ni byin rlabs dang mngon sum gyi lam gsungs pa'o //
T02D1412:449b-7: de ltar 'dul ba'i thabs bstan nas don lnga pa cig car 'jug pa'i thabs ston pa ni /
T02D1412:449b-8: zab mo'i chos ni ston pa la //
T02D1412:449b-9: gal te mos par ma gyur kyang //
T02D1412:449b-11: las la dbang zhing las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa dang /
T02D1412:449b-12: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong goms pa las byung ba
T02D1412:449b-13: dang mi mthun pa la yang smod pa dag tu
T02D1412:449b-14: mi bya ste / las kyi rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i
T02D1412:449b-15: rten 'brel gyi tshogs pa dpag tu med pa bsam
T02D1412:449b-16: gyis mi khyab pa bzhin du sngags kyi rten 'brel
T02D1412:449b-17: gyi tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'khrul
T02D1412:449b-18: 'khor gyi rten 'brel gyi tshogs pa bsam gyis mi
T02D1412:449b-19: mi bya ste / khyab pa dang / sman dang nor bu'i mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T02D1412:449b-20: mdo sde las gsungs pa'i chos nyid dran par byas nas smad par mi bya'o //
T02D1412:449b-21: mngon sum dang byin rlabs kyi lam des sangs rgyas
T02D1412:449b-22: dang de'i sras rnams kyi mchog tu gyur ba'i rnal
T02D1412:449b-23: 'byor 'bras bu lam du byed pa'i sngags kyi lam
T02D1412:449b-24: 'di yin pas sangs rgyas rnams byung yang rung ma
T02D1412:449b-25: byung yang rung chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni
T02D1412:449b-27: 'grib pa dang bcas pas 'bri ba med pas gzugs
T02D1412:449b-28: brnyan la sogs pa'i sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad la gang
T02D1412:449b-29: du stong nyid kyi nges pa drangs nas mthong bzhin
T02D1412:449b-30: du shes rab ye shes dang /
T02D1412:449b-31: dbang bzhi pa chos nyid mngon sum du mthong bas gnas pa yin no //
T02D1412:449b-32: de ltar na byin rlabs dang mngon sum gyi lam
T02D1412:449b-33: bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa 'jig rten la me smod
T02D1412:449b-34: cing chos nyid mngon sum du mthong ba'i bgrod pa'i
T02D1412:449b-35: lam cig car 'jug pa'i rnam par thar pa kun
T02D1412:449b-36: bzang sangs rgyas kyi rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab
T02D1412:449b-37: pa bde ba chen po'i lam yin no zhes shes
T02D1412:449b-38: par bya'o // gal te cig car 'jug pa la
T02D1412:449b-39: mi mos pa la ji ltar ba'i lam yin snyam
T02D1412:449b-40: par bya'o // na / ji srid kri ya sogs spyod nas //
T02D1412:449b-41: rnal 'byor gsang mtha'i dbye ba nyid //
T02D1412:450a-1: ba'i mtha' rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rim gyis sems
T02D1412:450a-2: can mos pas 'jug pa rnams la de dang de'i
T02D1412:450a-3: rnam par thar pa la dga' ba la chu bo
T02D1412:450a-4: rgya mtsho chen por 'bab pa bzhin du bde mchog
T02D1412:450a-5: gi lam la rim gyis 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1412:450a-6: dgyes pa'i rdo rje las kyang tha mar dgyes pa'i rdo rje bstan par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D1412:450a-7: rgyu ni rlabs dang mngon sum gyi lam ston pa yin no //
T02D1412:450a-8: rgyal po ni mngon sum gyi lam gsal zhing mdzes pa dang 'bar bas na rgyal po'o //
T02D1412:450a-9: 'bum pa'i nang nas phyung ba le'u 'bum pa dang
T02D1412:450a-10: shloka 'bum pa las phung ba'i phyi ma'i phyi ma'o
T02D1412:450a-11: // dngos grub kyi cho ga ni rgyu ba dang rgyu ba'i sbyin sreg dang /
T02D1412:450a-13: shin tu rmad du byung ba ni bsgom mi dgos pa'i mantra dang yantra'i rten 'brel lo //
T02D1412:450a-14: bstan bcos thams cad pa ni 'jig rten dang thun
T02D1412:450a-15: mong dang mchog gi dngos grub kyi thabs rgyas pa'o
T02D1412:450a-16: // bklags pas grub pa'i rgyal po aindra bh'u ti
T02D1412:450a-17: bzhin du sngags brjod pa tsam gyis bdud bzhi tshar
T02D1412:450a-18: // gcod pa'o // gdod ma nas grub pa ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'o //
T02D1412:450a-20: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
T02D1412:450a-22: de ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1412:450a-24: le'u lnga bcu rtsa gnyis yod kyang le'u lnga bcu
T02D1412:450a-25: pa la gcig tu bsdoms nas grangs shis par mdzad
T02D1412:450a-26: pa yin no // rdzogs so zhes bya ba ni rgyud mthar thug pa'i tshig go //
T02D1412:450a-27: bstod pas mnyes med smad pas mi dgyes med //
T02D1412:450a-28: 'gro ba kun la bu gcig ltar dgongs la //
T02D1412:450a-29: gang gis gnod pa byas kyang bde mdzad pa'i //
T02D1412:450a-30: rje btsun bde mchog sku yi zhabs btud nas //
T02D1412:450a-31: sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa'i spyod yul gyi ;
T02D1412:450a-32: / rtogs bka' bde mchog bshad rgyud la brten nas //
T02D1412:450a-33: bla ma dam pa'i bdud rtsi gdams ngag gis //
T02D1412:450a-34: rgya cher bshad pas 'gro rnams rtogs gyur shog /
T02D1412:450a-35: dpal 'khor lo bde mchog rgya cher bshad pa'i tshig
T02D1412:450a-36: don rab tu gsal pa zhes bya ba slob dpon
T02D1412:450a-37: chen po dpa' bo rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D1412:450a-39: / // / bla ma dri med thugs rje'i shugs las byung //
T02D1412:450a-40: 'bangs kyi smon lam grub pa mi 'gags chos //
T02D1412:450a-41: 'bangs dang grogs kyi don zhus rjes gnang ba //
T02D1412:450a-42: mchog dga'i bsams pa grogs la 'phel bar smon //
T02D1412:450a-43: gar gyi pandi ta pa ra hi ta dang /
